name: Caffeteria Doria
address: Calle Dei Fabbri 4578/C San Marco, Venice Italy

reviews.text: Typische kleine Caffeteria mit dem Charme Venedigs. Wir kommen immer wieder gerne auf einen Caffé herein. Manchmal gibt es auch Prosecco und von gegenüber Käse und Schinken!
reviews.title: So genießt der Venizianer

name: Bar Ai Nomboli
address: San Polo 2117c Calle dei Nomboli, Venice Italy

reviews.text: I had been told by a local that this place had the best sandwiches, and then told by another local when I finally visited for lunch that they had the best paninis in Italy. I can't argue with that! My panini, one of the seasonal specialties was absolutely delicious. The service was very friendly.
reviews.title: Best Paninis!

reviews.text: We were recommended to try this place and almost didn't bother.  It doesn't look anything special.  The panini it produces are very special though.  In a City with thousands of restaurants we went back the next day, to try some of the other recipes.  All the standard Italian combinations but some much more inventive recipes too - pork, figs, honey, mustard narrowly beat prosciutto pears and taleggio.  I am home now and i can still taste it.
reviews.title: Sublime sandwiches

reviews.text: Les paninis y sont très très bons. Afin un bon spritz!!! Ne passer pas à côté, je vous le recommande vivement.
reviews.title: Très bon et abordable

reviews.text: Gironzolando per Venezia ci siamo imbattuti per caso in questo baretto. La scelta di tramezzini ci atratto subito. Cosi ci siamo scorpacciati due tramezzini e dei capuccini. I tramezzini ottimi e freschi, anche i cappuccini buni con una bella schiuma - di solito a Venezia non lo sanno fare il cappuccio :-D.
reviews.title: Tramezzini e cappuccio

reviews.text: Tutte le mattine un caffè e magari un aperitivo prima di cena, e se non si ha voglia di mangiare fuori un paio di tramezzini o fantastici panini da portare a casa, purtroppo stavolta abbiamo beccato l`acqua alta, ieri, 20 nov.ho visto un reportage sulla ZDF con un  intervista al proprietario sig.Favaro che disperato dai danni diceva che pensava di chiudere o vendere, p.f.NOOOOO
reviews.title: Il "nostro" bar a Venezia

reviews.text: We stopped at this quaint bar/ restaurant for a late lunch and we were amazed at how great the sandwiches were. We shared the Ficoso pork sandwich. The best sandwich ever! We also shared a beef, tomato and cheese sandwich that was divine. Had to wait a few minutes to receive our roast beef sandwich as the beef was just coming out of the oven. Can’t get any better than that!
reviews.title: Excellent sandwiches

reviews.text: Spent a happy half hour here, watching the world go by as we explored Venice. Nice spot and not too pricey.
reviews.title: Nice cappuccino, beer stop-off whilst wandering

reviews.text: Les meilleurs paninis du monde sont ici. Le Paolo avec le thon les poivrons et le gorgonzola qui dégouline est à mon goût le meilleur sandwich que j'ai pu manger
reviews.title: Parfait

reviews.text:
Cercato e trovato per pranzo. Panino super buono.
Locale piccolino, ma con tavolini esterni.
Da segnare per il prossimo viaggio,
reviews.title: Panino super buono

reviews.text: Best coffee Americano I had in Italy. Really. Plus, the toasted sandwiches were simple and a perfect breakfast snack.
reviews.title: Fantastic Coffee and Sandwiches

reviews.text:
Oubliez les panini que vous connaissez. ...
Ici rien à voir avec ces sandwichs écrasés et
rechauffés. Ici un pain moelleux et croustillant et la garniture. ... une tuerie.... les notres ce jour là , à base de crevettes , de potiron et de champignons .  Salades ou croques monsieur également. Vins au verre. 
Petit bar avec 6 tables en salle et d'autres à l'extérieur.  Un accueil très agréable et un prix tout doux. Tout proche de l'église Santa Maria Gloriosa dei Frari .
reviews.title: Vaut le détour

reviews.text: The bar is excellent for panini and sandwiches! It is very cosy and the atmosphere is very friendly. The service is great and the panini and sandwiches are the true stars! I had the Penelope and Porky's paninis and they were absolutely delicious. I recommend the place for a quick or slow sandwich with some friends, surrounded by Venetians!
reviews.title: Best sandwiches in Venice!!!!

name: Grancaffe Quadri
address: Piazza San Marco San Marco 121, 30124 Venice Italy

reviews.text:
qu'il est agréable de boire un verre place Saint-Marc, lorsque la lumière baisse et que les ombres s'étirent.
Ce café propose un service stylé dans le plus merveilleux des lieux.
reviews.title: Belle expérience

reviews.text: L’emplacement n’excuse pas tout. Nous avons commandé deux spritz et ils étaient vraiment mauvais, on aurait dit un peu d’aperol avec bcp d’eau. Ce n’était même pas un quartier d’orange mais de citron. Quelques chips mais franchement pas bons. Le tout facturé plus de 30 euro...
reviews.title: L’emplacement n’excuse pas

reviews.text:
Aperitivo rinforzato spritz e pizza margherita soffice e gradevole oltre ad alici con pane tostato e burro.
La location in piazza San Marco poi
reviews.title: Location perfetta per un'aperitivo a piazza san marco

reviews.text: One of the best pastries I have ever had in my life. Have the pistachio filled croissant. Great spot to watch the world go by
reviews.title: One of the best pastries I’ve ever had

reviews.text: In questo locale è possibile gustarsi un'ottima colazione al bancone del bar. Per chi si siede i prezzi sono un abbastanza proibitivi
reviews.title: Ottima colazione

reviews.text: Das Cafe liegt gegenüber dem Cafe Florian, das bei unserem Besuch leider nur bis 21:00 Uhr geöffnet hatte. Also sind wir in Quadri gegangen. Es ist genau so schön, auch mit Klavierspieler nur sind die Preise noch höher als im Florian. Wir haben für den Aperol Sprizz satte 19,00 EUR bezahlt. Dafür war auch fast ein ganzes Essen an kleinen Knabbereien dabei. Man muß halt wissen, was man tut. Es war aber trotzdem ein schöner Abend
reviews.title: Schöner luxeriöser Ausklang

name: Handay
address: Rio Tera San Leonardo Cannaregio 1382, 30121 Venice Italy

reviews.text:
Vendeurs très sympathiques et qui prennent le temps de bien expliquer. 
Merci pour vos quelques mots de français !
Glaces délicieuses et bon rapport qualité-prix
reviews.title: Excellentes glaces

name: Osteria Al Ponte
address: Castello 930, Rio Tera San Giuseppe. Ponte San Isepo, 30122 Venice Italy

reviews.text: We had a great time ther the spot is teally nice. The food was great with especially wide choice of sea food which I don't eat but tasted some of my boyfriend's and even I liked it. We would definitely return again.
reviews.title: Great time for both romantic date or group of friends

reviews.text: We stopped here for dinner, and the place was very quiet. The wine wasn't great, but we replaced our drinks with a better quality one at no extra cost. The food is as it almost always is in Venice, DELISH...But we did feel that the prices were marginally higher than we were paying elsewhere for the same food.
reviews.title: A bit overpriced but it's Venice!

reviews.text: Beautiful presentation and $10 carafe of prosecco! This place is cozy and quaint with amazingly friendly staff. Alvise took exceptional care of our group!
reviews.title: Prosecco

reviews.text: It is possible to combine good wine (or excellent cocktails) with various types of appetizers (maybe also a platter of cheese). It's almost like sitting at home for a drink. There are not many seats inside, but you can still use the bridge in front.
reviews.title: Good place for a light dinner or a quick lunch. Great spritz.

reviews.text: Geweldige zelfgemaakte borrelhapjes met lekkere drankjes bij een authentieke sfeer. Je kan het buiten opdrinken op de brug in de zon!
reviews.title: Geweldige zelfgemaakte borrelhapjes

reviews.text:
This is a really cosy and friendly little cicchetti bar off the beaten track in northern Venice. We received a warm welcome, and patient and enthusiastic descriptions of the food on offer from the owner. The cicchetti was amazing value- as were the €2.50 spritzes! 

But best of all... taking your snacks outside, and enjoying them with a view!
reviews.title: Friendly, authentic and cheap!

reviews.text: Am Rande eines kleinen Kanals nahe den Giardini liegt die ruhige Osteria al Ponte, die vor allem von den Anwohnern des Castello besucht zu werden scheint, denn wir haben mehrmals die gleichen Gäste gesehen, was ja für diese Osteria spricht. Man sitzt nett, abseits von dem Touristentrubel, kannin Ruhe eine Kleinigkeit essen und den Durst stillen.
reviews.title: Keine Touristenbar

reviews.text: Buona scelta di assaggi, originali e buoni. Poco spazio all'interno ma è normale usufruire della scalinata del ponte adiacente, i prezzi sono leggermente più economici della media, può essere una alternativa al pranzo. Buon appetito
reviews.title: Ottimo assortimento

reviews.text: Perfecto para picar algo , magnífico sitio y muy amables , sándwiches muy buenos , paninis , y unas “flores de calabacín rellenas de anchoa 🤤 deliciosas
reviews.title: Bar auténtico y de barrio

reviews.text: Это место стало нашим фаворитом и топом посещаемости, так как все дороги во время нашей прогулки, приводили нас к этому мостику и в эту уютную остерию :) Самые выгодные цены на Prosecco и Aperol Spritz, непринужденная атмосфера, френдли-сервис и многие другие достоинства можно перечислять, описывая это заведение. Но главная фишка — это напитки на вынос! Можно спокойно выйти с бокалом, неспешно опереться на мостик или же сесть на ступеньки, и любоваться венецианским видом на соборы, дома, канал и бегающих туристов :) Именно в такие моменты ты ощущаешь себя счастливым!
reviews.title: Youth place

reviews.text:
Мы с друзьями назвали это заведение просто - «барчик на мостике». Посещали его ежедневно на протяжении всего отдыха. Тут очень душевно, вкусно и недорого.
Обязательно посетите этот бар в Венеции! Вы не разочаруетесь.
reviews.title: Место, которое западает в душу

reviews.text:
Forse il migliore bacaro di Venezia, ampia scelta di cicchetti e di vini.
Prezzi onesti.
Tappa obbligatoria quando vado a Venezia
reviews.title: Il miglior bacaro..

reviews.text:
Petite osteria bien placée proposant une large carte orientée fruits de mer.
Portions généreuses et service agréable, adresse à retenir pour un déjeuner à Venise.
reviews.title: Excellentes spécialités fruits de mer

reviews.text: Spirits délicieux et pas Chers barman au top et on peut boire  sur le pont face au canal et en face d une magnifique église 👌
reviews.title: Top

reviews.text: Osteria classica veneziana dove poter gustare i classici cicchetti veneziani. Ci sono molte varietà di gusti dal pesce al formaggio, affettati sui cui si può sbizzarrire ,tutti gustosi e freschi.Anche il personale è gentile e veloce. Il prezzo è più che onesto visto la città dove ci troviamo. Consigliatissimo.
reviews.title: Pranzo a Osteria Al POnte

reviews.text: В Венеции не просто найти ресторан или кафе с настоящей едой, а не пицца-паста. Этот ресторанчик один из них. Хорошо приготовленное мясо со всякими добавками, салаты и картофель, вино и пиво. Нормальное качество и размер порции. Не обсчитали. Редкость для Венеции
reviews.title: Просто  еда

reviews.text:
Fizemos um happy hour nesse pequeno bar descontraído, com bons vinhos e ótimos aperitivos! Frequentado por locais e turistas que se encontram para conversar e
Apreciar um bom prosecco ou vinho. Ah.. tem cerveja também!Adorei!
reviews.title: Lugar ótimo para um happy hour

reviews.text: Un piccolo bacaro ideale per una sosta pranzo o un aperitivo. La ragazza dietro al banco è gentilissima, vasta selezione di assaggi: molto buone le tartine con il baccalà e le polpette, ma si trova davvero di tutto da accompagnare con una bella selezione di vini al bicchiere da tutta Italia. Ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo (con dieci euro ho mangiato diverse tartine da 1,50 euro l’una, polpette, uno spirito). Nelle belle giornate si può anche prendere il bicchiere e consumare l’aperitivo direttamente sul ponte che dista pochi metri.
reviews.title: Buon bacaro per una sosta pranzo veloce o un aperitivo

reviews.text:
イタリアの居酒屋のようなところ行ってみたく、こちらを選びました。
おつまみは2ユーロくらいが相場。ワインは詳しくないので、自分の好みを伝えておすすめしてもらいました。
席は小さなテーブルが２つくらい、2人座れるカウンターが２つくらい。
飲むだけの人はワインを買ってグラスごと外にもって、外でのんでました。
reviews.title: 気軽に飲みたいなら

reviews.text:
Went to this place about 5 years ago on a previous trip and definitely wanted to try it again when we returned to Venice.
I am pleased to report it was just as good as the last time! I had the arrabiatta and it was hands down the best pasta I had in Venice. I also had the chicken breast which was really good as well. Hubby had the cheese gnocchi and the thin cut steak which were also really good.
The staff were all friendly and funny and there was a great vibe in the restaurant. 
Do not walk past this one!
reviews.title: Did not disappoint!

reviews.text: Siamo stati in questo locale su consiglio di amici. Grazie del consiglio. Buoni sia i cicchetti e sia le"ombre", ad un prezzo più che onesto. Proprietario e ragazze molto gentili e disponibili. Il locale non è grandissimo ma puoi gustare le sue specialità anche fuori dal locale. Di sicuro sarà una tappa obbligata quando verrò a Venezia. Bravi.
reviews.title: Ottimo bacaro

reviews.text: Ganz toll und autenthisch. Einfach schön für eine Kaffeepause zwischendurch mit was Süssem dazu, oder aber fürs Apero mit ein paar Tramezzini, die ebenfalls für den kleinen Hunger zwischendurch dienen. Herrliche Aussicht von der Aussenbestuhlung direkt am Kanal, einfach herrlich.
reviews.title: Wo die Einheimischen pausieren, lässt es sich wohl verweilen

reviews.text: Good place for a snack just across the bridge from a massive church. Great selection of local wine and good cicchetti.
reviews.title: Great place for a snack-quick service

reviews.text: Ottimo locale dove poter gustare piatti della tradizione , cucinati molto bene . Magari non proprio light ma certamente gustosi. Frequentato anche per i famosi cicchetti veneziani con aperitivo.
reviews.title: Pit stop

reviews.text: Siamo tornati a distanza di anni e confermo la qualità alta. Un primo viene tra i 12 e i €30. Io ho preso della polenta con baccalà mantecato squisito. 18€.
reviews.title: Buono ma caro

reviews.text: Siamo andati su consiglio di un amico della Zona. Un posto veramente top, “cicchetti “( che sarebbero delle fette di pane con affettati , formaggi o pesce sopra) buonissimi con prezzi davvero atipici per Venezia da 1,50 a 2,50.Vino della Casa altrettanto buono,(1 litro 9 euro). Personale gentilissimo e cordiale. P.s: consiglio il cicchetto con lardo e pomodori secchi .
reviews.title: TOP!

name: Sagra Rooftop Restaurant
address: Isola delle Rose, Laguna di San Marco JW Marriott Hotel, 30133 Venice Italy

reviews.text:
We ate a light lunch outside near the pool and had dinner that night inside. The lunch was expensive (43 euros) for a small hamburger, scoop of bad gelato, and iced tea. 

The dinner was more expensive (almost 200 euros) and had even more disappointing food. Although the wait staff was adequate, the taste and quality of the food did not match the outrageous prices. The food wasn't even close to the quality you would get at a random spot in Venice, but you don't have to take an hour round-trip to eat it. 

I am not averse to paying for convenience, so I would have grumbled about the food and the inflated prices, but left a 3-star review. What added insult to injury was the ambience of the interior of this restaurant. It honestly looks like a cheap cafeteria with incredibly bright, blaring lights that they said cannot be dimmed and cheap furniture that you would expect in an Ikea restaurant. 

Such a lovely hotel deserves an equivalent restaurant. This is sadly deeply deeply lacking.
reviews.title: Expensive, poor quality food with an unpleasant interior

reviews.text: Had a very enjoyable dinner at Sagra and much of it was very well done. Especially the sea bass tatare, schia (Venetian baby prawns fried) and a good wine selection. The taglioni alla busara was only ok and had expected more taste to it. But worth a visit if you’re at the hotel.
reviews.title: Reasonably good food, but pricey

reviews.text:
Venezia e' magica, ma quest' isoletta e' un incanto. Fuori dai soliti percorsi classici, si raggiunge con una Lancia a disposizione dei clienti e si raggiunge l'hotel. 
in terrazza c'e' questo ristorante dove tutto e' curato nei particolari, ma la cosa che colpisce e rimane nel cuore e' la vista....non c'e' nulla che possa competere , anche se e' tutto perfetto. Cibo, location e servizio sono ottimi, ma la vista che si gode da questa terrazza, ti fa dimenticare qualsiasi cosa, anche quello che hai mangiato o bevuto.
reviews.title: UN ISOLA PRIVATA

reviews.text: le rapport qualité prix n'est pas présent. Très cher comparé aux restaurants de Venise. Pour profiter de la vue il suffit de boire un verre au bar ou aller à la piscine!
reviews.title: Pâtes excellentes mais..

reviews.text:
This is just disappointing, and I wouldn't come here for the drinks or the food other than if there is an urge to take an amazing scenic shot for instagram.  Dopolavoro is on property but apparently a world away in terms of service and quality.  

Pricing is outrageous too.
reviews.title: Crazy prices for mediocre items

reviews.text:
We were at the pool and it started to get very windy and they closed the area so we decided to grab a bite at the attached restaurant 
I ordered the hamburger as I wanted something other than fish ,seafood ,pizza or pasta as that’s all we have eaten on our trip (by choice)
My wife ordered the burrata and tomatoes 
It took a very long time for the food to arrive and I was concerned as I asked for my burger medium rare When the food did arrive the burger I cut right away in half and of course it was well done .Our waitress saw and offered to order another and as we had waited 30 minutes I didn’t feel like waiting.
My wife’s salad was delicious and perfectly presented in a fresh tomato purée 
Ps the fries with the burger we’re excellent 
Very unusual shape and perfectly seasoned and crisp
The moral in Italy don’t order a hamburger lol
reviews.title: Lunch at the pool in our hotel

reviews.text: Celebrating our marriage with 2 of our best friends that were in Venice for the night. Read reviews and noticed the trend of “small plates” so we ordered kind of tapas style. 4 different apps, 2 different first course, and no main course. We did get 4 desserts and 2 bottles of champagne. The crab dish was not quite what we were expecting, but the risotto was so good that it balanced it out!
reviews.title: Amazing views for 'smart casual' dinner!

reviews.text: Das Rooftop-Restaurant bietet einen guten Blick auf Venedig. Das Essen ist gut, aber deutlich zu teuer. Vielleicht Venedig typisch; aber es sei trotzdem erwähnt: Viele Stechmücken verleiden das Essen im freien.
reviews.title: Essen ok - aber überteuert

reviews.text:
The hotel itself is extraordinary. Located on a private island. Reachable by "boot shuttle". The easy elevator access to the rooftop bar, Sagra is amazing.

Food: Burger with fries. Simple but flavorful and juicy.

Views: the views from the rooftop were stunning.

Service: Marina and Emanuele C. were so friendly and attentive, quick and efficient.
It was really a 5 star service experience, which made me feel welcome.
reviews.title: Great meal, great views & great service

reviews.text: The weather was perfect and so was the sunset.   The service was 5 star and the food was as well.  This place is described as casual dining but the food, service and atmosphere where top notch.
reviews.title: Lovely rooftop sunset view, great food and service !

reviews.text: This restaurant is located on the 4th floor of the JW Marriott Venice Resort, where my wife and I are currently staying on her birthday trip. The food is excellent; I had the scallops appetizer and grilled octopus while my wife had the Tagliolini with lobster (which I got to finish). Service from our server Giorgia and restaurant manager Emanuele was impeccable! And the view is spectacular especially when you are able to sit on the rooftop deck. It is a bit of a journey if you are not staying at the JW but they do have a free shuttle service to the resort (which is on its own island in the Venetian lagoon) to San Marco.
reviews.title: Excellent food; spectacular view

reviews.text: Senza dubbio una location eccezionale e un livello di servizio adeguato alla classe dell'albergo. Buona la qualità del cibo, a un prezzo che ci si poteva aspettare, ma lascia perplessi il "cover charge" di €16.00 per un pranzo a bordo piscina. Giudicate voi.
reviews.title: Perplessi

reviews.text:
The restaurant is located on the roof of JW Mariott. Amazing view for sunset over Venice. 
The  view is fabolous. Food very nice but caprese from foam amazing experince. The pasta also very good. Drinks and wine a good selection.
Bery good place to be there.
reviews.title: Amazing caprese.  Must have experience

reviews.text: Nonostante la prenotazione abbiamo atteso il tavolo oltre 30 minuti e ci è stato offerto un aperitivo nell'attesa solo dopo mia "provocazione" e lamentela. Per un ristorante dopo paghi 26 euro un piatto di pasta e dove lo chef fa il giro tra i tavoli accompagnato è inaccettabile.
reviews.title: Non all'altezza

reviews.text: My husband and I made a reservation at Sagra while we were in Venice for part of our honeymoon. The staff were so friendly and the food was delicious. Views were beautiful. Highly recommend.
reviews.title: Honeymoon dinner

reviews.text: Great food and service was even better! We had lunch and dinner here and both were great. I’m a red meat person and I was jealous that my husband got the chicken. Smaller portions but the chicken was the best I’ve ever tasted.
reviews.title: Great experience

reviews.text: We had the pleasure of dining at the Sagra Rooftop Restaurant. Alessandro was able to accommodate us with a last minute reservation and provided us with great recommendations throughout the night. The cocktails and dinner were 5 stars, but the most memorable part of the meal was dessert, be sure to try their unique take on the traditional Tiramisu!
reviews.title: Beautiful views and even better food!

reviews.text: I’m reviewing the dinner experience we had at the restaurant (menu is tapas style), not the lunch or patio bar menu/experience. Our dinner was terrible. The selections on the menu (8-12 Euros each) consisted of a BITE or a few bites of food. They were NOT anywhere close to a typical small plate, certainly not enough for two adults to taste the dish. We ordered the gnoccho with duck as one of our selections and it was one dumpling, flavor was fine. We also tried the risotto, which was fine (I’ve had much better risotto at other restaurants in Italy). We tried a few other things, same comments... one tasted like a spoon full of guacamole on the plate. The prices were exorbitant...AND they charged an 8 Euro/person cover charge. This was the first time I felt completely ripped off while traveling and dining throughout Italy. I woke up in the middle of the night hungry... maybe I’m crazy to think 170 Euros should buy a nice dinner for a family; even in Venice. Two of the tables around us got up and left before ordering, we should have done the same.
reviews.title: Terrible, worst dining experience in Italy

reviews.text: Quand il fait frais, le restaurant ne fonctionne qu’à l’intérieur. Aucune vue sur le lagon. Les plats sont inégaux à midi. Le soir uniquement des « tapas » à 10€ pièce ! Une bouchée 10€, si on a faim cela fait au moins 50€ !!! Concept à revoir complètement. Service inégal.
reviews.title: Pas de vue de l’intérieur et cuisine inégale

reviews.text:
Sono stata al Mariott JW Resort - Isola delle Rose, come espositore di TRAVELUX, una fiera del turismo di lusso a livello internazionale, organizzata da una primaria società di eventi in modo ineccepibile.
La seconda sera, liberi da impegni di lavoro decidiamo per una cena leggera in hotel e chiediamo informazioni al responsabile dell'area bar, il quale ci presenta due alternative: uno il ristorante al piano terra, presentandolo come più tradizionale e anche pizzeria, il secondo al 4 piano dedicato alla cucina regionale italiana, in forma di vari assaggi (ci consiglia di prenderne quattro-cinque).
Decidiamo per il SAGRA al 4^piano: siamo 4 donne.
Appena entrate in sala colgo subito un'aria di grande disorientamento tra il personale, tanto,ma affatto coordinato, gira a vuoto in lungo e largo nella sala., dove si percepisce subito che manda un coordinamento.
Portano 4 menu e ordiniamo: 3 fagottini di melanzana e mozzarella di bufala alla parmigiana, 1 fiore di zucca ripieno di ricotta, basilico,pomodoro secco e olive, 1 crudo  di ricciola, limone, caviale e lattuga di mare, 1 gnocco di patate al ripieno di ragù d'anatra gratinato con pecorino toscano, 1 pacchero di Gragnano con ricotta, spinacino e gambero rosso di Mazzara del vallo, 1 filetto di vitello, con purea di patate novelle e fave. Per dessert 1 panna e fragole, con coulis di fragole fresche e meringa, 1 Rocher con mousse al cioccolato gianduia, nocciole del Piemonte caramellate e chantilly al caramello.
Voi direte: "Allettanti e variegate offerte" !!!!!!
In tempi cadenzati difformemente tra un commensale e l'altro, in ordine sparso, senza alcuno stile, si presentano con piatti dove dentro c'è la pietanza ordinata, la cui quantità totale ha una permanenza in bocca più breve del tempo impiegato a leggere la descrizione sul menu !!!!!
Un vero e proprio insulto.
Specifico meglio: il fagottino di melanzana è freddo da frigorifero, presentato con un riccio in rilievo di mozzarella affettata con la mandolina, sopra una indistinta purea grigiastra (presumo polpa di melanzana passata) sdraiata sopra un altro disco affettato come sopra, di bufala. Diametro totale presunto 6 cm. Non c'è tempo per assaporare !
Lo gnocco di patate è 1 singolo gnocco 2x2 cm e il gusto ugualmente non può riconoscersi nè definire gli ingredienti, vista la dimensione dell'intera porzione....
Il crudo di ricciola, resta un'idea !
Il pacchero di Gragnano: 1 pacchero e mezzo, ......
Non voglio tediare i lettori di questa recensione, che forse crederanno sia tutta opera di una mente paranoica.
Invito lo staff di Tripadvisor ad indagare la situazione oltraggiosa !!!
reviews.title: Un insulto congiunto: alla clientela,alla ristorazione, all'accoglienza !

reviews.text:
We have been in this hotel for 3 days when we decided to try this restaurant. This restaurant was highly recommended by the front desk and its location is unbeatable. Rooftop with a great cityview.   What could go wrong?  We ate inside and the view could not be seen from the lack of windows. There is not much to see when you are inside the restaurant. 

We made reservations and was promptly seated upon check in. The waiter told us about the small plates and it can be shared. There were three of us and we ordered 7 dishes. When the food arrived it was quite amusing as the portions were really small. The description should have stopped at SMALL plates. There was nothing to share among ourselves. Perhaps we misunderstood nevertheless the food was average.
reviews.title: Small plates and not much to share

reviews.text: My wife and myself where at the JW Marriott for our 40th birthday celebrations, we ate in the sagra on the Saturday night, 23rd March, from the offset the staff where extremely professional and very friendly, the lady that assisted us explained all the dishes and what was best to order, she didn’t disappoint as we order from the taster menu to sample true Italian food. The food was exceptional and bursting with flavour, they truly helped make our trip a memorable one. Exceptional service
reviews.title: Exceptional food and service

reviews.text: The food was ok.  The View and the ambiance was excellent.  Nice relaxing music.  A little cold since we were there in October, but blankets were available for guests to use.
reviews.title: Beautiful View...

name: Bar Ai Artisti
address: C. Lunga S. Barnaba, 2771, 30123 Venice Italy

reviews.text: Leider konnten wir nicht in den Genuss des Angebots der Bar kommen, da nachdem wir uns um 7:45 Uhr an einen der bereits gedeckten Tische im Außenbereich gesetzt haben, von der Bedienung unfreundlich abgewiesen wurden mit den Worten „Chiuso”. Die Bar öffnet anscheinend erst um 8:00 Uhr. Das hätte man auch anders handhaben können. An 3 zahlungsbereiten Kunden ist man hier anscheinend wenige Minuten vor Ladeneröffnung nicht interessiert. Schade.
reviews.title: Keine Kundenorientierung.

reviews.text: Ci siamo fermati in questo bar per una piccola pausa pranzo prima di continuare la nostra visita alla città. Trovando posto a sedere esternamente, abbiamo goduto di un'atmosfera rilassante dove poter mangiare panini davvero molto buoni e con una bella varietà di scelta. Il prezzo non era affatto eccessivo, il personale cordiale.
reviews.title: Piacevole pausa pranzo

reviews.text: Situé sur le Campo San Barnaba ce café traditionnel vénitien est idéal pour une pause déjeuné autour d'un cappuccino ou d'un spritz. La nourriture est locale et du jour. Les sandwichs, foccacia et paninis sont délicieux. Un peu à l'écart du Pont de l'Accademia, on est loin des attrapes touristes et les tarifs sans ressentent. On profite d'une jolie vue sur un petit canal ainsi que des gondoliers qui discutent et harangue les badauds.
reviews.title: Petit café traditionnel et sympa

reviews.text:
Voilà une adresse pour qui veut être loin des bars à touristes et profiter d’authenticité 
J’ai pu goûter toutes les formes de spritz pour 3,50 euros ! 
Serveur très agréable et des pigeons et des italiens comme compagnie sur cette place : que demander de plus ?! 
C’était très bien ainsi !
reviews.title: Simple authentique et bon

reviews.text: Nous y sommes tombés bien par hasard ! Et le hasard fait bien les choses . Sur la place Barnaba le spritz y est pas cher et excellent . C est le lieu de rencontre de vénitiens . Le service y est efficace . Vraiment bien
reviews.title: Spritz perfect

reviews.text: piacevolissima sosta all'aperto, dopo una lunga passeggiata per Venezia. Ordinati 1 spritz e 1 analcolico; fatto molto bene lo spritz. Personale molto bravo e cortese, e prezzo assolutamente onesto (7 euro in due).
reviews.title: molto bene

reviews.text: First bar we went to in venice as it was close to our hotel.one of the best prices for spritz in the evening. Morning coffee was good too. Great service all week we stayed in the area. Would recommend it here
reviews.title: Hidden treasure

reviews.text: Staff is rude and unfriendly, act like I entered their private home and bothering then with silly orders. Very unprofessional
reviews.title: Rude staff, ordinary coffee

reviews.text: Pour passer vraiment un bon moment.Sur le campo San Barnaba typiquement Vénitien,animé,une grande terrasse sous parasols où les places sont chères,il faut souvent attendre.Ambiance Vénitienne garantie.Bar et restauration rapide mais de qualité.Service toujours aussi agréable,attentif et efficace malgré le monde.Quelques artistes viennent s'y perdre pendant la Mostra;les touristes aussi mais surtout beaucoup de Vénitiens habitués des lieux dont c'est le rendez vous.Spritz et Prix très corrects
reviews.title: Pour nous c'est au moins une visite chaque année que l'on soit ou non dans le quatier.Vaporetto Ca'Rezzonjco

reviews.text: 十分放松开心的一间咖啡吧，很典型的意大利式，站着喝杯浓缩咖啡就可以走的var, 驻足了半个多小时，盯着进出的行人看，都是很有些艺术气质的老炮。
reviews.title: 悠闲的Bar

reviews.text:
Dans ce magnifique quartier vous allez rencontrer les vénitiens dans des bars et restaurants pas trop touristiques situé entre la place le Campo San Barnaba et le campo santa margherita. 
Bar et terrasse très sympa et jeune
reviews.title: sympa pour l'apéro

reviews.text: если хотите пообедать без шума и суеты и при этом вкусно то вам понравится.персонал ресторана вежлив и услужлив
reviews.title: все было просто вкусно

reviews.text:
Hier trinkt man zwischendurch seinen Kaffee und kommt am frühen Abend zum Aperol (3,50!!!). Super nettes Personal, gute Qualität.
Mein Hotel liegt nur ein paar Häuser weiter und komme daher bei meinen Aufenthalten in Venedig mehrfach am Tag dort vorbei.
reviews.title: Seit Jahren meine Bar um die Ecke

reviews.text:
Dropped in here before moving in to the excellent La Bitta.

For the experienced Negroni artiste (as I am) I never avoid the opportunity when presented.

This was a Negronj of serious proportion and quality.

Expertly prepared and served.

We had in addition, Spritzer and a couple of glasses of white (usual decent choice of whites by the glass).

Thoroughly enjoyed our 30 minutes early evening - the place must be humming later in the evening.

For me, it’s a real Venice experience - a must visit for those seeking a  real Italian bar.

Very competitive on the pricing too.

Have a Negroni - it will not disappoint.
reviews.title: Like Negroni?

reviews.text: Nos paramos a comer ya que nuestro bar preferido cierra los domingos. Pedimos unos spritz aperol y 3 tramezzi ( atún con olivas, atún con puerro y calabacín crujiente) Buenisimos! No llegó ni a 20€. El personal amable.
reviews.title: Tramezzi buenísimos

reviews.text: We were lucky enough to stumble across this hidden treasure! Extremely friendly and welcoming staff (particularly when a thunderstorm descended upon us!) and great price for Aperol spritz for Venice! Would definitely recommend!
reviews.title: Aperol o’clock

reviews.text: Such a lovely bar that we found whilst travelling around Italy! Venice is known for being expensive but this bar is such good value for money and the staff cannot do enough for you. Only €3.50 for an Aperol Spritz!! They have outdoor seating and snacks are given for free with your drinks! We loved this bar and came back night after night, it feels a lot more authentic than some of the other bars in Venice. Definitely worth a visit!
reviews.title: Best Bar in Venice!!

reviews.text: Ci siamo soffermati qui che eravamo stanchi di camminare per fare una pausa, personale giovane e molto simpatica
reviews.title: Piacevole pausa

reviews.text: This place at the lovely Campo San Barnaba ist the Perfect spot for a Spritz or a Cocktail. You can sit outside at the tables or stand  in front of the door. At least the male staff is very friendly and welcoming, the Spritz is exactly as it should be!
reviews.title: Perfect for a Late-night-Drink

reviews.text: Pour bien démarrer une journée de canicule par un petit déjeuner au calme et à l’ombre avec en plus un excellent croissant italien !
reviews.title: Petit déjeuner au calme

reviews.text: This area feels full of locals rather than tourists and the prices reflect it - so much cheaper than the area around Piazza San Marco. Nice too.
reviews.title: Off the main tourist routes

reviews.text: Un bar de quartier avec une terrasse place San Barnaba. Des serveurs agréables et des prix abordables. Nous y sommes allés chaque jour pendant notre séjour à Venise.
reviews.title: Un endroit très agréable

reviews.text: A wide range of food and drinks. ideal for a lunch time break or evening drink. Friendly, helpful staff.
reviews.title: Good sarnies and coffee

reviews.text:
This is a great place to sit and to sip your favourite drink.
It is away from the main tourist spots and so it is more relaxing.
We sat outside in the sunshine and listened to a very good busker. 
Service was exceptional. The lady was friendly helpful and patient.
reviews.title: Great place to relax.

reviews.text: One of our very favorite stops to grab a grappa, beer or spritz, the staff is super friendly and the location is great.  You can sit outside (you will pay just a little more) and enjoy good people watching in the Campo and a lovely view of the canal or sit inside and enjoy good music in a friendly atmosphere.  3 stars on the bathroom.
reviews.title: Great spot, Fun people!

reviews.text: Personale molto alla mano. Molto gentili rapidi e svegli, ambiente piacevole e tranquillo. L’unica pecca è che di sera i tavoli all’esterno sono poco illuminati
reviews.title: Ambiente piacevole

reviews.text: Always when we go to Venice we drink an Aperol here, because it is a very cozy place where it is. <3
reviews.title: Lovely Place with super terrace

reviews.text:
Very good spritz in a nice environment with tables and chairs outside in a lovely little square.

Try the Campari and the Select versions - forget about the Aperol one!
reviews.title: Very good drinks and bites

reviews.text: Bellissimo bar personale squisito . gentile disponibilità e professionalità insomma un locale dove andare sempre
reviews.title: Colazione

reviews.text: They do have outdoor tables in Campo san Barnaba but I usually stop in for drinks either before or after dinner.  Always treated very well by the staff.
reviews.title: Great place for drinks

reviews.text:
Venivo quando ero allo IUAV.
Spritz buono, servizio giovane, velocissimo e alla  mano, prezzi onesti e poi campo San Barnaba è sempre meraviglioso. Ciao
reviews.title: Aperitivo in campo San Barnaba

reviews.text: Great place in nice square. . .. come here for quick Spritz or nice Italian drink! We hung out and had great time!
reviews.title: Great place for aperitivo and drink!

name: Ristorante Wildner
address: Riva Dei Schiavoni Castello 4161, 30122 Venice Italy

reviews.text: Grilliata di pesce buonissima, bel posto con dei tavolini fuori con vista al isola si San Giorgio, molto consigliabile
reviews.title: Grilliata di pesce buonissima,

reviews.text: I am a travel writer and usually eat in a different place each night.  We went three times in five nights and ate from the short menu.  Each one a treat, especially local clams, razor clams and the gnocchi made to the recipe of the manager's mother - I didn't know gnocchi could be really tasty, not just a filler!
reviews.title: Real Local Food & Home recipes

reviews.text:
Unscheinbar und unaufgeregt, dafür um so leckerer. Unbedingt nach Tagesempfehlungen fragen und mutig sein. Wein Spezialitäten auf Nachfrage. 
Perfektes Risotto.
reviews.title: Kulinarischer Geheimtipp in erster Reihe

reviews.text: Cenato in quattro. Abbiamo preso due risotti al Go' e due spaghetti con le vongole (ricetta Wildner con zenzero e jalepena). Finito con tiramisu' e panna cotto. Tutto eccellente. Ovviamente prezzi medio alti in linea con la posizione del ristorante a due passi da San Marco ma giustificati anche dalla qualità del cibo e dalle ricette particolari
reviews.title: Ottimo Risotto al Go'

reviews.text: Lekkere risotto en dito wijn. Prima en vriendelijke bediening. Toplocatie en daardoor wellicht relatief duur voor wat je krijgt weliswaar.
reviews.title: Lekker maar net iets te prijzig?

reviews.text: Mise en place senza pretese, servizio di qualità accogliente e dispensatore di ottimi consigli. Un cicheto, baccalà mantecato, saltata di cozze, due ottimi risotti al gò, 3 calici di buon vino, due bottiglie di acqua 100€ che a Venezia fatichi a spendere molto meno. Se all’aspetto “friendly” fosse stato abbinato un conto più contenuto avrei dato una palla in più
reviews.title: Servizio accogliente cucina buona

reviews.text:
Veniamo in questo ristorante su indicazione di un conoscente veneziano. Consiglio che si è poi rivelato essere azzardato e l’amico il giorno dopo ampiamente redarguito (probabilmente era più amico dell’oste che nostro...).
Menù ridotto ai minimi termini, con proposte imbarazzanti e prezzi al di fuori della grazia di Dio; carta dei vini con ricarichi pazzeschi.
Vista la posizione è probabilmente uno di quei locali “tipici” verandati, dove vengono immolate le orde di turisti sbarcanti dai traghetti senza fine.
Abbiamo cercato di limitare i danni prendendo una sola portata a testa, per poi scappare in cerca di cicchetti che ci sfamassero.
Salvo solo il servizio, professionale e cortese.
reviews.title: Trappola per turisti

reviews.text: The staff is friendly! great location! right in the central, 5 minutes walk from St Mark plaza!!!!!!
reviews.title: Great location!!

reviews.text: terrible service!!! took almost two hours to get our food..will not be coming back, dont waste your time on this place!!! food was overpriced and not worth the money. Put a damper on the trip :/
reviews.title: terrible service!!! took almost

reviews.text: Abbiamo pranzato in questo locale mangiando pizza. Qualità buona e servizio discreto. Location carina. Prezzi nella norma per essere in riva agli Schiavoni. Credo però che si possa migliorare sul prezzo del caffè al termine del pranzo, un tantino esagerato.
reviews.title: A due passi dal Ponte dei sospiri...

reviews.text: We came to this restaurant for lunch on New Years Eve and it did not disappoint.  Lovely basket of warm bread and two delicious pasta dishes with a glass of wine.  Staff were courteous and efficient. Intend returning this trip for sure 👍
reviews.title: Last lunch of the year!

reviews.text: Siamo sul Canal Grande e ti potresti aspettare un classico locale acchiappa turisti con cibo mediocre. No tutt'altro , a parte il servizio e il personale gentilissimo, qui si mangiano anche piatti classici veneziani e ben fatti . Su tutti le moechee le masanete. E per di più farete una spesa giusta per Venezia e il posto.
reviews.title: Non è solo per turisti....

reviews.text:
I had been recommended to eat here by a friend, I braved the torrential rain to find myself only the second person in the restaurant I ordered the mussels to start 14 euros and the tagliata Manso 22 euros and a Coke Zero 4 euro I asked for some tap water but was told only bottled was available.
The mussles were fantastic as well as the warmed bread selection then main course beef was perfectly cooked the food was fantastic .
The bill arrived with 2.50 euro Coperto charge and Service charge not included ,well I feel as I was unable to get a glass of tap water I did not receive service so for the first time in my life I didn’t give any .
I have still given a five star review as I saved myself 5 Euros service charge an expensive glass of tap water
reviews.title: Water water everywhere but not a drop to drink

reviews.text:
difficile de manger correctement sur les quais
c'est pourtant le cas ici 
beau restaurant et vue imprenable
la cuisine est aussi au rendez-vous avec des plats frais et bons
friture de la mer, spaghetti mongole notamment
service sympathique et très professionnel
reviews.title: joli restaurant

reviews.text:
Tornato dopo diversi anni.
La piovra con lenticchie, patate saltato in padella veramente straordinaria. Inutile dire che il tiramisù è spaziale. Buono anche il fegato alla veneziana. Luca sempre super attento e servizio attento. Vista super essendo a riva degli schiavoni
reviews.title: Ottimo come sempre

reviews.text: Buscabamos un restaurante cerca de nuestro ferry, y nos topamos con el Wildner, que es parte de un hotel. No esperabamos mucho, y nos sorprendio ligeramente... el servicio entre malo y mediocre, pero la comida estaba mejor de lo q esperabamos. Hay de todo, y es buena opcion si buscas donde comer cerca de los ferrys.
reviews.title: Muy practico

reviews.text: Set on the Fondamenta overlooking the Basin just a few steps down from the Piazza San Marco, it is not surprising that this restaurant is an attraction for lots and lots of tourists, if not to eat, then to wonder by in hordes.  And the food reflects all of that.  Bland and uninspiring, it is not a place that we would go to again.  The service was pleasant but that was not enough to overcome tasteless food.
reviews.title: Barely Average

reviews.text:
Attirato dalla recensione letta su una importante guida culinaria mi sarei aspettato qualcosa di più tipico nella cucina.
È sicuramente un buon ristorante con una bella veranda sulla Riva degli Schiavoni, con una buonissima accoglienza ma non aspettatevi nulla di particolare.
reviews.title: Speravo meglio

reviews.text:
Haben während unseres Aufenthaltes (im angeschlossenen Hotel) 2x zu Abend gegessen. Speisen waren sehr gut (zB Fegato veneziana frisch gebraten, Pasta ebenfalls frisch). Service sehr freundlich (vor allem die Abendkellnerin)! Ambiente hätte noch Luft nach oben, aber wird durch die Lage kompensiert. Preis/Leistung der Speisen absolut ok.
Negativ: Getränkepreise überteuert, 1 Glas normaler Valpolicella € 7,-; 1 Flasche Bier 0,3ml € 8,-!
reviews.title: Top-Lage, Preis/Leistung (Speisen) ok

reviews.text:
My son and I went to this restaurant because we arrived late at night in Venice and it was  near our hotel. The pasta ( I believe it was called beef "paccheri") was icy cold in the middle. I told them we do not want the plate anymore. They took the dish away and were very rude.
I am a medical doctor and know that partially cooked frozen food may  a serious infectious health issue.
reviews.title: Frozen food

reviews.text:
At the end of a long day exploring Venice, we were looking for someplace to have a nice dinner without a lot of fuss. The Ristorante Wildner was a few blocks along the Canal from our hotel.

I had a pizza and my wife had pasta. Both dishes were good without being exceptional. The menu was varied and there were several daily specials. The restaurant was relatively busy; yet the service was good.
reviews.title: Easy dining along the Grand Canal

reviews.text:
Endroit sur les quais où l’on peut manger rapidement pour pas cher, plus une question de remplir l’estomac que autre chose !!! 🤷🏻‍♂️
Personnel sympa ...
reviews.title: Sur les quais mais ... !!!

reviews.text:
Almocei no restaurante e foi mal recebido desde a minha entrada. Não sei se foi Por ter um bebê comigo.
Empregados antipaticos, não me traziam uma cadeira para o bebê, não tinham menu para criança e não gostaram quando pedi para aquecer um boião de bebê para ele poder comer visto que não tinham nem sequer uma sopa.
O meu bebé começou a chorar e trouxeram a conta para eu sair, nem sequer tinha terminado de almoçar.
Super antipaticos, comida normal e preços excessivos. Não recomendo
reviews.title: Queriam que saísse por bebê chorar

reviews.text: avons mangé en terrasse face au grand canal et face au gondoles avec en prime le passage d'un bateau de croisière. très bien reçus. Deux Spritz et deux salades. A faire faire
reviews.title: en voyage en couple

reviews.text: Having visited Venice 3 times now we've tasted a lot of Aperol Spritz and this restaurant has the best! We had the caprese salad which was fantastic. Light. Fresh. Just perfect. The view is gorgeous. Definitely recommend!
reviews.title: The best Aperol Spritz in Venice

reviews.text: We stumbled in to this restaurant by chance and were pleased to find such good reasonably priced food so near the main square.
reviews.title: Surpising

reviews.text: Di passaggio durante il mio soggiorno veneziano,ho pranzato in questo ristorante posto sulla Riva degli Schiavoni nelle vicinanze di Piazza San Marco.L'ambiente e' di grande tradizione (il luogo e' segnalato nei negozi storici),con tavoli disposti in un bel dehor e seguiti da personale gentile e assai disponibile.Dalla carta ridotta del mezzogiorno, abbiamo diviso una validissima pizza margherita con lievito madre,per scegliere poi dei buoni spaghetti alle vongole e un ottimo galletto con patate fritte e misticanza.Nota di merito per la cuoca che ci ha omaggiato di una ulteriore porzione di ottime patate fritte.Conto finale,senza vino, di 44 euro per una pizza,un primo e un secondo,godendo della stupenda vista della Laguna.
reviews.title: Tradizione e buona cucina

reviews.text: So sad, we were regulars for eight years - one of the best seafood restaurants in Venice. Now panini.🤷‍♂️
reviews.title: Wildner e morto

reviews.text: This ristorante serves the worst pizza ever! It was eatible but tasteless. Feels as you are chewing the gum. Awfull! I can’t believe that someone gave this ristorante the Michelin star! 🤮
reviews.title: Denis&Denis

reviews.text:
Ein paar nette Worte zum Kellner und schon taut er auf...
Wir waren schon öfters zu verschiedenen Jahreszeiten und mit verschiedenen Leuten da, die Qualität des Essens ist schön konstant. Ich hatte als Vorspeise Baccalà mantecato, sehr empfehlenswert! Die Linguine mit Telline waren für meinen Geschmack etwas zu salzig, vielleicht war noch etwas zuviel Meerwasser an den Muscheln. Auch das Essen meiner Frau war tadellos.
reviews.title: Gute Lage und wettergeschützt

reviews.text: Brasserie « à l’ancienne », accueil charmant. Rapport qualité / prix un peu élevé mais bon, compte tenu de l’emplacement les tarifs semblent assez logiques. Dans l’assiette, c’est bon mais pas inoubliable.
reviews.title: Efficace mais un peu cher

name: Murovenezia
address: Campo Bella Vienna, Venice Italy

reviews.text:
Pates a la carbonara et pates façon lazagne, juste delicieux !!! 
Je n’ai jamais mangé de pates a la carbonara aussi bonne avec de la vrai viande et du fromage qui a du gout !! 

Merci encore pour ce repas
reviews.title: Pates a la carbonara et pates

reviews.text: Capitati per caso in questo locale, siamo stati accolti con gentilezza dal personale. Il cibo ci è piaciuto molto: abbiamo pranzato con bigoli al sugo e selezione di cicchetti veneziani su polenta. Ottimi entrambi! Porzioni abbondanti! Rapporto qualità - prezzo molto buono. Consigliato!
reviews.title: Ottimo pranzo

reviews.text:
Wir waren zwei Abende auf Venedig und beide Male dort essen gewesen, da es so gut war.
Das essen ist typisch italienisch. Sehr lecker und alles frisch. Wir hatten Pizza, Nudeln und Vorspeisen. Alles war top!!!
Die Preise waren völlig im Rahmen, für Venedig sogar günstig! Es gab auch keine versteckten Preise für Bedienung, Besteck oder ähnliches. Weiterempfehlung !!!
reviews.title: Sehr lecker und nicht teuer!

reviews.text: Top Preis-/Leistung. Sehr individuelle Pizzakreationen. Empfehlenswert Tropea. Spaghetti a la vongole mit reichlich Muscheln. Tartar vom Thunfisch, (15,-€) große Portion sehr schmackhaft!!
reviews.title: Top Preis-/Leistung.

reviews.text: Sommes tombés par hasard, dés le premier soir, sur ce restaurant, et n'avons pas hésité à y retourner 2 jours +tard. Propre et coquet, cuisine bonne, fournie, copieuse et très raisonnable en prix. De+ accueil excellent. Je recommande!
reviews.title: Super resto à VENISE

reviews.text: Good bruscheta. Good pizza. Good pasta. Good lasagna. Nice & tasty freshly prepared dishes. Very good service. Reasonable price.
reviews.title: Fam of 3

reviews.text:
Siamo arrivati nel primo pomeriggio presso la struttura dove abbiamo alloggiato, ed abbiamo visto questo ristorante sul percorso e siamo andati a pranzare.
Locale bello, personale gentile ma pranzo deludente, abbiamo preso un risotto che era più che altro una purea di riso, con sopra un gamberetto che abbiamo dovuto lottare non poco per pulirlo dal guscio, probabilmente non era sufficientemente cotto ....
reviews.title: Deludente

reviews.text: Family of 3 with mixed taste.  1 veggie.  Had a wonderful meal, homemade Ravioli for the veggie which was very tasty.   Would recommend to family and friends visiting Venice
reviews.title: Lovely evening meal

reviews.text: This restaurant enjoys a central location, mere feet from a major church, loading station for the gondolas , a favorite pastry shop and the corner grocery store.  Each time you walk by you are pulled into the shop by the wonderful smells emanating from the kitchen..  The pizza was my weakness.  They serve cocktails and have an extensive menus.  The prices run $$
reviews.title: Hard to Pass By these Delectible Aromas

reviews.text: We visited with the familyin October 2019,  was very quite when we found it but looked great...and it was great.  By the time we left it was packed outside, quite inside.   Pizza were  AMAZING.  Lovely beers.  Nice outside location, very nice inside.  (Only slight negative ws that the toilet seat was missing, although generally had been refurbished and clean.)  Otherwise wonderful.  Would definitely return.  I would highly recommend.
reviews.title: Amazing

reviews.text:
Early Friday evening, we hadn't booked, pleased we got a table for four. Very welcoming.
Fresh bread with oils and balsamic were placed on the table. We ordered lasagne, mushroom rissoto and side salads, with house wine. Only a short wait and the food was delicious. The staff were attentive, friendly and  humorous. We really did enjoy our enening. Would return and recommend.
reviews.title: Good atmosphere

reviews.text:
Ci fermiamo a mangiare in questo bel locale.
Pizza ottima ben cucinata e ben farcita. Cozze veramente speciali, la prossima volta chevtorneremo le assaggeremobdi nuovo.
Appuntamento alla prossima serata.
reviews.title: Serata molto positiva

reviews.text: Merita una (buona) recensione perchè siamo arrivati fuori orario con un'altra coppia e hanno riaperto la cucina per noi. Forse il forno aveva perso un po' di temperatura, per cui la pizza non è risultata eccezionale. Però gli avventori rimasti - peraltro anche qualche veneziano - erano tutti soddisfatti delle proposte del menù ristorante. quindi darò loro volentieri un'altra chance
reviews.title: Pizza così così, ma il posto merita

reviews.text: We tried daily special ravioli and risotto. Both of them was like a gourmet food. We enjoyed so much our food. I felt like a whole new experience in the middle of Venice trying new food. Service was really cool too. I recommend this place
reviews.title: Simply Great

reviews.text:
My host at Airbnb suggested this place as it was one of her favourite pizza places, shes not wrong!   The choice of pizza's were by far the best I had seen since I stayed in Venice, so many to choose from!   
My children and I both had a pizza and really enjoyed it!  I wouldn't rate it as the best I had in in Italy but it was still good, and service was great!  We sat outside, and saw lots of locals coming in and out (sign of a good restaurant!)  
Only wish they did serve slightly smaller pizzas for the little ones.....a full pizza is just to much for a small 7 year old!
reviews.title: Good!

reviews.text: Take the time and find your way to this amazing restaurant ! While visiting the local sights this is where you NEED to eat ! Delizioso.. nicely priced and authentic ! The fresh tomato sauce and home made pasta .. crispy pizza ... just top notch !
reviews.title: Delicious !!

reviews.text: E' stata una piacevolissima scoperta trovare questo ottimo ristorante. Pesce fresco, cozze speciali tanto da fare una super "scarpetta"! Anche il servizio non è da meno, le ragazze sono davvero simpatiche e professionali. Da suggerire sicuramente.
reviews.title: MUROvenezia ristorante a S.Croce Campiello Spezier

reviews.text:
Right around corner from our hotel.  Excellent food, service and atmosphere. We sat outside.  We did make reservations.  Very casual atmosphere with Venice flare.  I had rissotta with scrimp and my wife had black rissotta with squid.  Outstanding.  If you have not had black spaghetti, you have got to try.  Finished dinner with gelato.  
Very good prices.  With several drinks....$ 52.
reviews.title: Great Restaurant

reviews.text: Best meal in Venice hands down. A fillet steak you could cut with a spoon covered in white truffle was divine. As a non risotto liker the risotto was also to die for. Good service and very pleasant dinner.
reviews.title: Deliciouso

reviews.text: J’ai du mal à comprendre la note de ce restaurant. Pâte à pizza à peine cuite, plat de pâtes des plus commun et un service peu aimable. Le tour pour un tarif pas abordable. Franchement, passez votre chemin
reviews.title: Surcôté

reviews.text:
The best meal we had in Venice, fantastic service from the staff and great price.
I have no idea why this place is ranked so low, we ate at a few of top 20 places and they were not a touch on this place.
We had the calzone pizza which was fantastic and the chicken curry.

Definitely worth a trip here
reviews.title: Best meal of the trip

reviews.text: Una pizzeria con una bella location, una buona pizza e buoni prezzi, cosa rara a Venezia, dove costa tutto tantissimo. Personale gentile. Consigliata.
reviews.title: Bella location e buoni prezzi

reviews.text: On one of the many tourist streets a light casual restaurant.  Selection  of pizza, salads, pasta, etc. Tables inside and out with friendly fast service.  Pizza and salad selected delivered fast and nice presentation with reasonable size portions.
reviews.title: Pizza and salads

reviews.text: I picked this place after seeing high average reviews and we were happy with the choice. My boyfriend picked the parma pizza with a side of bolognese (his invention) which was deeee-lish. Everyone should give it a try! Pizzas are very big - you have been warned. I had the pastry ravioli and the calamari polenta. I chose this over pizza as I wasn't too hungry but I prefered his pizza. The calamari was really, really small with the polenta mash so it felt like baby food... The pastry was fine but nothing to shout about.
reviews.title: Easy choice for lunch

reviews.text: walking around the area we had seen this restaurant and it looked great, so the next night we walked in no reservation which was not a problem. great attentive service, fantastic Pizzas and no pressure to up sell. really enjoyed the atmosphere and the food.
reviews.title: great local restaurant

reviews.text: mangio in questo ristorante da 8 ani, pizza, carne e pasta, sempre torvato benissimo, mi ero dimenticato di recensirlo!
reviews.title: sempre ottimo

reviews.text: Garçons grosseiros x comida ótima. Uma constante em toda a Itália... A escolha é sua... O lugar é simpático, mas não se engane... Não conseguirá uma boa mesa; parece que brasileiros nunca são dignos...
reviews.title: Atendimento ruim

reviews.text: Très bon accueil . Prix correct et bonne cuisine. Endroit calme et propre. Parle français. Personnel très sympathique
reviews.title: Par hasard

name: Boresso
address: Santa Croce 1908, 30125 Venice Italy

reviews.text: Un caffè buonissimo, una briosche ottima per una colazione veloce in un posto piccolo ma pieno di simpatia, GRAZIE!
reviews.title: Colazione veneziana

reviews.text:
Abbiamo fatto una sosta in questo piccolo bar con dei tavolini all'esterno.
4 Spritz con il select fatti come Dio comanda per 14 euro... cicchetto pane prosciutto e Carciofo offerto
reviews.title: Spritz prima di cena
reviews.userLocation: Province of Monza and Brianza, Italy

reviews.text:
Locale molto curato e accogliente, ampia scelta di cicchetti e personale cortese.
Un ottimo posto per un break od un aperitivo con gli amici. Super consigliato!
reviews.title: Ottimo bacaro

reviews.text:
You will this place as very friendly.. not a big place, but this helps to create a feeling of friendlyness, care and good service as you are seen from the bar easily. We jumped for a coffe and stayed for 2 hours..
1. Food quality - you will find lot of snacks/tapas; everything with the taste, well prepared and served
2. Location: this is easy to find, although you might pass it, if you will not look for its logo..
3. Interior - great, i made several photos.
4. Prices:Acceptable pricing. We liked the price of wine.
5. Clean or not. Clean... 
6. Value: 9 out of 10.
reviews.title: We jumped for a coffe, but stayed for 2 hours...

reviews.text: eh...ottimo...alle 11 di mattina bianco con pane&baccala' ... promosso, personale gentile, baretto top
reviews.title: colazione del campione

reviews.text:
I was in urgent need of a toilet.
The patron did not allow me to use the toilet, because I was not a customer. Even after I offered 50 cent. He claimed it the toilet was occupied. After 25 years visiting, this never happend to me in Venice.
We than went to San Leonardo, and payed happely 1.50€ in the, clean, public toilet.
Next time I stop at San Stae, I will walk passed this unfriendly bar, even if i'm hungry.
reviews.title: Toilet

reviews.text: Perfekt, um morgens dort zu frühstücken. Leckere Brötchen und Croissants, viele verschiedene Sorten. Sehr guter und günstiger Kaffee (1,50 €). Wir waren während unserer 3 Tage in Venedig zweimal dort. Einmal für 6,60 und einmal für 7,10 (mit frischem Orangensaft) gefrühstückt:)
reviews.title: Sehr nettes kleines Café!

reviews.text: Piccolo bar-ristorante gestito da Alessandro con cura e attenzione costanti, e una predilezione particolare per le varianti combinatorie dei panini, associati a tipi di formaggi spesso rari ed altre chicche, nel fantastico mondo degli affettati e affini. Mozzarelle ottime, polpette di tonno e carne assai gustose.
reviews.title: Venezianità doc

reviews.text: Close to the vaperetto stop at San Stae, next to the museum of Mocenigo this very friendly cafe/ bar has lots to offer, some very tasty ciccheti big variety of fillings, excellent coffee plenty of wines and beers , whether on short sprint like the baker from across the Calle, or lingering longer in the afternoon as we were well worth the visit.
reviews.title: Whether breakfast , lunch or just a drink super cafe/bar

reviews.text: This quaint little café is a must-visit when you're in Venice.  Tucked away in the back alleys of Santa Croce, this friendly place has everything from pizza to pastry and the best cappuccino I've ever had!  They speak English and the food is delicious (try the meatballs and the quiche-like pie and cream croissant).  There was not one thing that our party of 5 ordered that wasn't perfectly seasoned and delicious- and we ate for under 20 Euros for all of us!  Friendly service and great food- worth the hunt to find this place!  We'll be back next time we're in Venice! Thanks, Alessandro!
reviews.title: EAT HERE WHEN IN VENICE!

reviews.text: This is a great café in Venice, where you can have an outstanding "continental" breakfast. If you go early enough in the morning, you will find a generous selection of croissants, and you can order different types of coffee, including good decaf. Later in the day, the place turns into a bar, with typical Venetian appetizers and a great choice of wines and other drinks. At certain evenings, there are small, free concerts of classical chamber music, on the street right in front of the café/bar, and you can buy your appetizers and/or drinks and listen to the music. A really wonderful Venetian experience!
reviews.title: Excellent neighborhood bar/café in venice.

reviews.text: Back again in this cosy cafe with local newspapers, good cicchetti and locals. Good coffe and nice white wine and a friendly staff. Perfect for your morning coffee after leaving your garbage bag at San Stae or in the afternoon just passing.
reviews.title: genuine cafe venetian style

reviews.text: Un bar piccolino ma carino.  Personale gentile, italiano ( visa rara perché anche a Venezia ne ho visti molti gestiti da Cinesi)e onesto.... Il caffè a 1,10€ Non si trova ovunque a Venezia!!!!!!
reviews.title: Piccolino ma carino

reviews.text: Superbe endroit pour se décontracter. Un accueil chaleureux et cicchetti très bon fait maison. Juste en face un glacier pour les plus gourmands.
reviews.title: Detente

reviews.text: Parfait pour combler un petit creux, avec un bon verre de vin, en plein milieu de l apres-midi. Toute la famille y trouve son compte, sucré et salé!
reviews.title: Un encas.

reviews.text: Unico bar italiano (e probabilmente veneziano) decente in zona san stae. Offre un po' di tutto dal dolce al salato
reviews.title: Unico sopravvissuto

reviews.text: Needed to find somewhere to sit after a long day walking around Venice. Found Boresso and enjoyed some Aperol spritz for only €2.50. Staff were lovely and friendly. Too full to try and food but all looked delicious.
reviews.title: Lovely

name: Bistro da Cici
address: Sestiere Dorsoduro 222, 30123 Venice Italy

reviews.text: Ambiente elegante ma piuttosto “freddo”, servizio impeccabile, curato e cordiale, piatti raffinati, gustosi e ben presentati. Il Bistrot è parte di un Hotel, il che’ fa perdere un po’ di atmosfera, ma i piatti al palato sono talmente buoni che qualcosina si puo’ anche perdonare
reviews.title: Raffinato

reviews.text: Be’ che dire... tutto perfetto! Ottime pietanze, ottimo vino, ottimo servizio e ottima cucina. Piatti della cucina veneziana completamente rivisitati da un giovane chef che oltre farlo per lavoro lo fa’ per passione! Bravo continua cosi’!
reviews.title: Cena Speciale

reviews.text: Tout est très bon. Le chef (grand chef) fait des merveilles. La carte des vins est remarquable. Le décor moderne est très agréable. Le service soigné et attentif.
reviews.title: Extra

name: Bacaromi
address: Fondamenta San Biagio Giudecca 810, 30133 Venice Italy

reviews.text: Ce restaurant jouit d'une magnifique terrasse donnant sur le canal de la Giudecca, permettant ainsi de profiter du ballet incessant des bateaux Le bâtiment est également majestueux
reviews.title: Jolie terrasse

reviews.text:
Livello dei piatti non sufficiente e non adeguato alla location e ai prezzi richiesti.
Una delle paste alle vongole peggiori che abbia mai mangiato.
Buono, invece, il servizio.
reviews.title: Livello dei piatti non sufficiente

reviews.text: Cuisine et ambiance  excellente. J ai pris le cochon de lait grillé. C etait excellent. Service de qualité par Rocco. Meilleur restaurant dans le coin. Je recommande vivement.
reviews.title: Tres bon restaurant a prix raisonnable

reviews.text:
Ho cenato in questo ristorante assieme a dei clienti, per una cena di affari. La qualità delle pietanze è ottima, cibo fresco, cucinato benissimo, molto gustoso, ma non pesante. Menù vario ed interessante e porzioni abbondanti. Il locale è molto carino, di dimensioni ridotte, molto coccolo. Il servizio è ottimo, il personale molto gentile e disponibile.
I prezzi sono piuttosto elevati, ma in linea con buona parte dei ristoranti veneziani.
reviews.title: Cucina ottima, in un bellissimo ambiente.

reviews.text:
We took the bost from outside our hotel across to the restaurant which is attached to the Hilton hotel. It is small, 30 covers, and is decorated like a cafe with a deli counter at the front. The head waiter had our booking and showed us to our table. We had had the obligatory bread as our starter and chose a prosecco which was good. We selected the specials: lamb stew, potatoes and grilled vegetables which tasted amazing, and the seafood lasagne which was good but not great. No dessert as we wanted to head up to the roof bar of the hotel for cocktails. 
Worth a trip across from Zattere for the evening.
reviews.title: Worth the trip.

reviews.text: Sono passato con mia moglie ad inizio Novembre. Il servizio è stato molto confuso - tipo camerieri che hanno buttato via una bottiglia di vino quasi piena mentre eravamo fuori a fumare, boh - ed il piatto di cicchetti certamente non economico palesemente preparato il giorno prima se non peggio. Pur avendo uno stomaco di ferro sono stato davvero molto male la mattina dopo, non tornerei assolutamente. Peccato perché qualche anno fa era tutto buonissimo, non so cosa sia successo dal 2015 ad oggi.
reviews.title: Sono passato con mia moglie

reviews.text:
Location molto bella e raffinata. Porzioni abbondanti ma ben presentate e cibo ottimo.
Siamo stati molto bene e il servizio è davvero ottimo!!
reviews.title: FANTASTICO

reviews.text:
Leggendo le recensioni su TripAdvisor abbiamo riservato al bacaromi, avevo ospiti importanti . Siamo arrivati al ristorante nonostante ciò avevo prenotato e mancava la nostra prenotazione , il cameriere FRANCESCO scortese dicendoci che non c’era la nostra prenotazione , ci hanno abbondato nel atrio del ristorante , facendoci aspettare. Finalmente dopo 1 ora abbiamo avuto il nostro tavolo non accogliente . Cibo discreto e ci aspettavo di meglio , servizio scadente da parte di tutto lo staff , nonostante ciò avevo richiesto più volte il richiamo del cameriere ROCCO e di un altra ragazza che facevo finta che non ci fossimo . Non è un posto dove ritornarci sopratutto avendo ospiti importanti e dovete VERGOGNARVI .
SERVIZIO SCADENTE ( VERGOGNATEVI )!!!!
reviews.title: Da non ritornarci

reviews.text:
Location ricercata e buona l’offerta culinaria ma il
Servizio non è’ all’altezza. Data la lungs attesa ci è’ stato offerto il dolce e l’amaro.
reviews.title: Location ricercata e buona

reviews.text:
Ingredienti ottimi e combinati fra di loro alla perfezione. Personale educato e preparato.
Assolutamente consigliatissimo!
reviews.title: Mai mangiato così bene in viaggio!!

reviews.text:
Nous avons séjourné à l’hôtel Hilton Molino lors d’une visite de Venise et nous avons choisi pour dîner de mangé à ce restaurant qui est affilié à l’hôtel.  Celui-ci est séparé de l’hôtel avec une salle à manger intérieur, mais aussi une magnifique terrasse extérieur à la hauteur du canal avec une vue sur Venise.  Juste pour la vue et l’ambiance ce restaurant m’avait déjà conquis.  

Côté nourriture le menu est simple et j’ai choisi la pieuvre et le calmar grillé sur polenta.  Vraiment très bien cuit et succulent comme plat.  Ma conjointe a moins aimé son plat de pâtes et boulette de viande, mais mon fils a adoré le pain, ses pâtes blanches et la sauce aux tomates « à part ». 

Pour ce qui est du service, tout le personnel était accueillant et sympathique.  Vraiment une belle soirée.  Je le conseil à tous ceux qui reste quelques nuits à cet hôtel.  Ce n’est pas le charme du Grand canal et du pont Rialto, mais après 3 jours de visite, ce resto adjacent à l’hôtel est très agréable.  Bon appétit.
reviews.title: Excellente ambiance avec vue sur le canal Giudecca et Venise

reviews.text:
We visited on 25th August 2019 while staying at the Hilton. In summary, the restaurant is simple, well price with good food. We also experienced excellent service. 

We booked directly on the Fork app, I’d definitely recommend booking as we saw people being turned away. 

For a starter we had the shared antipasti. It was huge, plenty for three or four people.

For mains, my partner had the special of the day, a lasagna which was good - good but nothing to write home about. She did mention the pasta was fresh and very tasty.

I had the T-bone stake (medium rare). It was outstanding, a good cut which was perfectly cooked. It was massive (probably 700 - 800G) so i struggled to finish it. The side of grilled aubergine wasn’t a good paring if I’m honest! Grilled tomato or even some rocket would be better. 

For desert, we shared the pavlova. It was brilliant, just right! We both really enjoyed it. Wine selection was small but what we did get was brilliant. 

The service throughout was excellent, the waitress spoke perfect English and deserves special recognition. 

If your staying at the Hilton and don’t want to waterbus over to the main islands, I’d definitely recommend this place for an evening.
reviews.title: Very good - recommended

reviews.text: Bellissimo ristorante consiglio di prenotare anche se ha posto anche fuori con bellissima vista sulla laguna. La cucina tipica Veneziana con tradizioni di una volta. Spaghetti (fatti a mano freschi) alle vongole con un attimo sughetto al limone. Branzino con patate e funghi davvero buono. Personale cordiale e attento. Ci tornerò e lo consiglieró.
reviews.title: Il miglior pesce della laguna.

reviews.text:
Commento provocatorio.
La location molto bella è sotto gli occhi vostri, faccio notare che purtroppo la riva di fronte non è il massimo per essere a Venezia. 
La qualità è discreta ma non vedo questa pretesa bravura descritta da altri. ( il risotto fatelo un po’ meno abbondante, finisce per saziare troppo)
Servizio formale,  rapporto qualità prezzo squilibrato, anche per Venezia.
Eventualmente da riprovare
reviews.title: Vorrei ma non voglio !!

reviews.text: Bella location, cibo di  buona qualità, prezzi adeguati, buon servizio attento e scrupoloso. Consigliamo di provarlo almeno una volta.
reviews.title: Molto bene

reviews.text:
We visited Bacaromi during our stay in Venice and had mixed feelings. Whilst the food was undoubtedly incredible, the management of the restaurant leaves a lot to be desired. 

It is worth noting from the outset that the cover charge is £5 per person, however the first you will know of this is when your bill arrives.

When we arrived, there was a large table of guests with incredibly badly behaved children. The parents were shouting across the restaurant to each other and the kids were running-riot and bumping into other guest’s chairs. 

Despite having a reservation, we were unsure if we actually wanted to dine here. 

Whilst the food was lovely, the restaurant staff made no attempt to control the unruly guests who were making the whole experience unenjoyable for the remaining tables. 

For a restaurant expecting to charge these prices, there should’ve been proper management of this situation. There were several other guests who felt distinctly uncomfortable with the experience.
reviews.title: Lovely food

reviews.text:
In bella posizione sulla Giudecca, Locale piccolo ma con una terrazza enorme sul canale. Personale cortese e professionale. Cicchetti buonissimi e molto vari. Primi piatti m9to buoni. Polpo e calamari gigliati con polenta una combinazione azzeccata.
Un fritto misto ottimo e porzioni veramente abbondanti tanto che abbiamo saltato il dessert. Prezzi un po’ cari, ma ne vale la pena.
reviews.title: BISTROT AL MOLINO STUCKY

reviews.text: Great food and fabulous service. Best of all is the view across the Giudecca Canal at sunset. Typical hotel pricing.
reviews.title: Amazing dinner view

reviews.text: Mangiare in un posto non è solo cibo. È un accordo. Un contratto. Un impegno da due parti. Io mangio e pago, tu mi dai quello che mi prometti. Ma se la sera più importante dell'estate, quando sono disposto ad accettare prezzi diversi dalla sera "normale" mi garantisci qualcosa in più, un accesso alla vista dello spettacolo pirotecnico e non mantieni quello che prometti... non sei corretto. La sicurezza prima di tutto, ma se garantisci nel prezzo  di una sera, servizi che sai non potrai mantenere, sei scorretto. Promettere  qualcosa che non puoi mantenere è una pratica commerciale scorretta. Qualcosa da aggiungere? Facile... Uno spritz 12 euro.
reviews.title: Mai più

reviews.text:
Really classy excellent service. 
Great selection of vines, smaller of beers but still very very good. 
Food amazing 
Service also impeccable especially mr Renato was above and beyond the quality of service.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.text: Ristorante con tavoli all’aperto a Giudecca con vista imperdibile su Venezia, raffinato, ottima cucina, tradizione e cicchetti, personale professionale e simpatico, prezzi medio-alti, ma da provare assolutamente
reviews.title: Imperdibile

reviews.text:
Excellente découverte, repas fabuleux, cadre romantique sur la terrasse près du canal. 

Les entrées et plats étaient absolument divins, une cuisine italienne moderne et surprenante. 
Service attentif et souriant
reviews.title: Dîner romantique

reviews.text: Our thanks to Giovanni ( Maitre Di) and all his team for a wonderful evening eating Venetian Style!  Amazing delicious food with exceptional service in a warm and friendly atmosphere. Not to be missed -highly recommend for the most memorable evening to treasure - everyone should enjoy!  Bellinis better than Harry's Bar - fantastic food and impeccable friendly service with everyone making it a very special experience in a beautiful city. Thank you
reviews.title: Wonderful evening with delicious food and exceptional service

reviews.text:
Abbiamo gustato alcuni piatti tipici della cucina veneta (quello che volevamo!), in una straordinaria location tutta per noi (non potevamo sperare di più). C'è anche da sottolineare il fatto che dato l'appetito della maggior parte dei partecipanti, l'abbondanza delle pietanze messe a disposizione dalla cucina (e dalla cantina!) è stata particolarmente apprezzata!
Consiglio sicuramente questo ristorante.
reviews.title: Ottimo bistrot a Venezia

reviews.text: Siamo tornati in questo ristorante mentre soggiornavamo all'Hotel Molino Stuky nell'isola della Giudecca. Si mangiamo piatti tipici della cucina veneta, l'ambiente è davvero accogliente e preciso. Consigliato per una serata di coppia, ma anche tra amici.
reviews.title: Ritornati in questo ristorante tipico davvero ottimo

reviews.text: Questo ristorante dell’hotel Hilton ha un ingresso indipendente che condivide con il più sofisticato ristorante Aromi. Nel menù alcune proposte in apertura, poi primi e secondi sia di carne che di pesce. Abbiamo cenato qui più volte e ci siamo sempre trovati bene. Il servizio è gentile, accogilente e veloce. I piatti buoni e abbondanti. Un posto a colpo sicuro.
reviews.title: Cucina veneziana

reviews.text: Ottima location ed ambientazione. Sembra di soggiornare gradevolmente in un antico bacaro veneto. Mediocre la qualità e la preparazione dei cibi. Eccessivo il costo. Rapporto qualità prezzo non soddisfacente
reviews.title: Una promessa non mantenuta

reviews.text: We had a table closest to the water and it was a lovely evening and the food was delicious. My husband and I were celebrating our daughter and son in law's 14 wedding anniversary and the F&B manager Giuseppe Pozzuoli did everything to make it the special evening we wanted. We stayed at the Hilton Molino Stucky for our one night pre cruise and the Bacaromi turned out to be a fabulous experience. We were away from the crowds in the center of Venice and could 'look at the city' and enjoy it in a beautiful setting. Our service was superb and every dish was 'right on!"
reviews.title: Lovely dining experience for one night in Venice

reviews.text: Pernottavamo lì vicino e quindi abbiamo deciso di provare entrambi i ristoranti dell'Hilton: "Aromi" e questo "Bacaromi", dove la cucina è locale in chiave gourmet, ma con porzioni tutt'altro che gourmet, anzi piuttosto abbondanti, per cui alla delizia del palato non si accompagna la vuotezza di stomaco, piuttosto si esce completamente soddisfatti sotto ogni punto di vista. Io ho mangiato una frittura di pesce spaziale, leggerissima, non unta, variegata. Mia moglie polipo e calamari arrosto su una polenta meravigliosa. Ottimo il tiramisu (uno per due), non tradizionale, ma con qualche variante dello chef che l'ha reso ancora più stuzzicante. Due calici di vino e il conto è salito poco sopra i cento euro. Abbastanza caro, ma li valeva tutti. Se potessi, ci tornerei domani.
reviews.title: meraviglioso ristorante "glocal"

reviews.text: Sehr gutes Essen Nette Kellner schönes Ambiente zum angemessenen Preis Leistungsverhältnis kommen gerne wieder
reviews.title: Tolle Lage Tolles Essen

reviews.text: Ho pranzato in questo Ristorante a Pasqua. Bellissimo ottimi piatti gluten free.Personale molto gentile attento ad ogni esigenza richiesta. Lo consiglio
reviews.title: Pasqua

reviews.text: Fantastic food. Very friendly waitresses. Prices very reasonable. Portions are nice. Food is served fast and efficient. Friendly service in a cozy environment.
reviews.title: Very nice

reviews.text: It is a pleasure to visit this classy bar room for drinks and snacks. We had the pleasure of stopping in while staying at the Hilton
reviews.title: Elegant bar room

reviews.text: arrivato tardissimo, ci hanno comunque servito e coccolato, i piatti erano ben fatti e di ottima qualità i prodotti. Niente da dire in merito al servizio che è stato impeccabile. Il conto va di conseguenza, ma non abbiate paura, si spende di più in posti più pessimi!
reviews.title: eleganza e raffinatezza anche sui piatti

reviews.text: Where to begin... my partner and I ordered the cheese ravioli which was apparently home made.
