I can highly recommend this restaurant.
reviews.title: Excellent Indian cuisine

reviews.text: Lovely food, location and service. Staff helped with choices and reduced the heat to accommodate my tastes. Would highly recommend this restaurant
reviews.title: Lovely food and service

reviews.text: We were recommended this lovely Indian restaurant by a friend and I am so glad we visited.  Such lovely tasty food, great service and the waiter was so happy to help us with the heat levels.
reviews.title: Recommendation did not disappoint

reviews.text:
One of the few places which have thali system and is one of the best i have been so far in italy. 
Authentic Indian cuisine with the best of the taste and ambiance. Love the vegetarian thali and the chicken thali as well. A must visit place for people looking for good vegetarian meal.
reviews.title: Best Indian authentic food in venice

reviews.text:
If you are in town looking for Indian food don’t miss it.
The personal is very kind and helpful , food is good and price balanced with food . 
Maybe change a bit of the furniture to make it better won’t be bad ,)
reviews.title: Good

reviews.text: Cibo ottimo. Esaustive le spiegazioni dei singoli piatti da parte del personale. Si è molto aiutati nella scelta. Prezzo discretamente contenuto.
reviews.title: Pranzo di compleanno

reviews.text: My return visit to the Lido and this time travelling with my mum. I always enjoy  getting a meal here, hope you see you all again soon!
reviews.title: Always enjoyable

reviews.text:
Mangiato poco e male prezzi altissimi..comunque una buona accoglienza..locale pulito ..
Arredamento in stile indiano
reviews.title: Cena

name: Osteria Leon Bianco
address: S. Marco 4153 Salizada S. Luca, Venice Italy

reviews.text: The restaurant was recommended by a local. Typical Italian/Venice dishes, the black risotto with cuttlefish was excellent. Fast and friendly service. Recommended
reviews.title: Good choice in Venice

reviews.text: Good food. Good wine and setting. Small local place. Service ok. Desserts disappointing. Somehow, overall, i would have expected more. Was good + but nowhere near excellent.
reviews.title: Good food. Good wine and setting.

reviews.text: L'ambiente familiare e confortevole riesce nell'intento dì farti sentire a casa. Consiglio la grigliata di pesce x uscire dal locale soddisfatti.
reviews.title: Super

reviews.text: Visited this restaurant 3 years ago and the food and service was excellent, unfortunately today waited for over an hour for a starter which at best could have been dished up from the cold counter at Lidl! Now waiting for the main course and losing the will to live. Safe to say we won't be back.
reviews.title: Oh dear!

reviews.text: Alle spalle di Piazza San Marco vicino alla Calle San Luca. Ambiente molto piacevole, servizio impeccabile, personale molto affabile e disponibile. Abbiamo cenato a base di pesce, ma ci sono anche piatti di carne (bigoli all’anatra, tagliata etc )Pasta fresca e dolci fatti in casa.  Ottimo l’antipasto di pesce, piovra in insalata, baccalà mantecato su polenta, vongole non allevate, sardine e gamberi in saor. Siamo stati molto bene e lo raccomando.
reviews.title: Alle spalle di Piazza San

reviews.text: Wir waren sehr unzufrieden, da die Portionen vergleichsweiser teuer und viel zu klein waren. Alle Pasta Gerichte die wir bestellt haben, waren zu salzig, kaum essbar. Wir sind hungrig weiter gegangen.
reviews.title: Zu salzig, zu wenig, nicht zu empfehlen

reviews.text: EXCELLENT FRESH SEA food.   One of the best kept secrets in Venice.  Recomended by a local . . Great ambiance in the back patio.  All waiters and cooking staff  with masks, all the time.  Very important as many places the staff wear them half way... but hands down the food was incredible.
reviews.title: EXCELLENT FRESH SEA FOOD!!

reviews.text: Qualità media, costo medio, cortesia media....non ci tornerei una seconda volta. Peccato perché il ristorante è situato in centro.
reviews.title: Cibo

reviews.text: Ci sono capitata per caso con mia mamma anni fa, e da allora ogni volta che andiamo a Venezia ci fermiamo a pranzo qui. Ottimo servizio, ottimo cibo, consigliatissimo!
reviews.title: Visita fissa quando vado a Venezia

reviews.text: Trovato per caso, vicinissimo a San Marco. Giardino interno carino. Qualche piatto fuori menù. Ottimi primi e cicchetti. Sono attemti alle attuali norme igieniche.
reviews.title: Pranzo veloce

reviews.text:
Ottime porzioni, servizio gentile e piacevole, piatti gustosi, prezzo nella media.
Ambiente sereno, lo consiglio anche per una breve pausa pranzo.
reviews.title: Consigliatissimo!

reviews.text: We had an amazing dinner there, trying several of the typical Venice dishes that were all delicious. The waiter was very attentive and friendly and the price was low considering that this restaurant is in the middle of the Venice tourist area. Recommend without reservations.
reviews.title: authentic food at amazing prices

reviews.text:
Ottime seppie con polenta.
Spaghetti alle vongole ottimi e abbondanti.
Bigoli al ragù d'anatra eccezionali
reviews.title: Ottime seppie con polenta.

reviews.text: Buonissimo!!! Consiglio caldamente a veneziani e non..insomma a tutti...saluti allo staff..il Tommy..
reviews.title: Frittura incredibile!!!

reviews.text: A cheerful place on the way from Piazza San Marco to Rialto. Ambiance is casual as is the cheerful service. The menu is typical Venetian with the usual overload of pasta, but there's something there for everyone. The wine list is sufficient. Notable dishes are the gnocchi alla gorgonzola, the sole and the fegato. Value is excellent.
reviews.title: Cheerful

reviews.text:
My Fiancee and I stumbled on Leon Osteria, whilst out walking in the evening around Venice.
Stopped and decided to eat our dinner here.
I ordered the butter Ravioli and My Fiancee  had the duck taglitelle.
Both dishes where delicious and the service attemtive without being too in your face.
No communication issues as manager spoke fluent english and was patient with our pigeon Italian attempts! 
I did find this restaurant a bit pricier than the others similar we tried.
reviews.title: Beautiful Butter Ravioli

reviews.text:
Joli cadre, service charmant, excellente nourriture faite maison (même les desserts). Service un peu long mais récompensé par une magnifique qualité qui sent la fraîcheur et le fait maison.
Franche recommandation.
reviews.title: Jolie adresse

reviews.text: Recensisco questo locale dopo averlo visitato due volte. Sono spesso a Venezia e frequento sempre gli stessi ristoranti, ma durante i giorni dell'alluvione molti erano chiusi e ho provato questo. Beh, è diventato uno dei miei punti di riferimento per l'atmosfera piacevole, la gentilezza del titolare e la cura delle preparazioni.
reviews.title: E' diventato uno dei miei punti di riferimento

reviews.text:
The barman at or hotel recommended an Ostetia that he goes to with his wife. Or was a good recommendation.

Decor is typical of the style and staff generally welcoming.  The menu emphasis was seafood,  again typical of Venice,  and the food very good. 

Worth a visit.
reviews.title: Great recommendation from our hotel

reviews.text: pranzo durantre la visita a Venezia, mangiato gnocchi al gongorzola e fegato alla veneziana, tutto molto buuono servito da personale gentile, locale piccolo ma pulito
reviews.title: pranzo

reviews.text:
Ristorantino tipico veneziano, nel centro storico, molto curato, pulito con prezzi nella media.
Personale molto gentile e disponibile. Da consigliare veramente!
reviews.title: Eccellente!

reviews.text: Super rapport qualité prix, des spécialités vénitiennes et un accueil sympa- je recommande 👍. Le couvert est payant mais 2,5€ c'est pas la mort
reviews.title: Super rapport qualité prix

reviews.text: Los gnoquis estaban exquisitos, pero es un restaurant caro. Se pueden encontrar calidades parecidos mucho más barato
reviews.title: Bueno, pero caro

reviews.text:
I took a group of 10 adults to eat here during our trip to Venice. We used the restaurant  twice because it was so good. It is reasonably  priced for Venice and the food and service was very good. 
We all had different  dishes and everyone was very happy with the taste and presentation.  I wouldn't  hesitate to recommend  this restaurant.
reviews.title: Lovely food and good service

reviews.text: This restaurant was recommended to us.  It is well worth going to.  It has a wide range of dishes and the ones we had were excellent.
reviews.title: Fantastic lunch

reviews.text: Siamo stati in questo ristorantino un venerdì Sera, abbiamo mangiato tagliatelle al ragu di anatra e petto di anatra. Ottimo servizio e buon rapporto qualita prezzo ( non ottimo, ma è sempre venezia}. Da provare sicuramente
reviews.title: Ottima anatra

reviews.text:
Avec des plats typique italiens voire venitiens mais je ne m'y connais pas assez. Un cadre agréable.  N'hésitez pas à entrer pour découvrir une salle plus vaste.
Un bon tiramisu pour finir le repas.
reviews.title: Bon diner

reviews.text: We so enjoyed our dinner that we we returned for a second experience.  A great restaurant recommended to us by our hotel receptionist. We loved the intimate atmosphere, the excellent choice of food, and the delicious wine. And the very good service. The deserts were especially divine! There were very few if any empty tables which is always a good sign that all is well in this gem of a restaurant.
reviews.title: Excellent atmosphere and cuisine

reviews.text:
Located just off Campo San Luca, this is a cozy restaurant with a very nice interior. 
We ate lunch here on April 4 and when we entered at 1345, there were a few tables occupied but was not crowded. Service was OK; food was good, but on the high side. The Calamari was €17, Caprese was €12, Spaghetti Pomodoro was €10. Not a lot high, about €2 more per dish than other restaurants. Total for 3 for lunch was €96 and this included 2 house desserts and a caffee americano on top of the lunch food. It was an enjoyable meal in a very comfortable atmosphere.
reviews.title: A LITTLE HIGH PRICED

reviews.text: Trovato per caso passeggiando per Venezia. Ottimi primi sia di carne che di pesce. Personale cortese e disponibile. Pranzato nel giardino interno. Ottimo rapporto qualità e prezzo
reviews.title: Da provare...

reviews.text: Nous sommes entrés dans ce restaurant par hasard et avons commandé du poisson, le thon était très bon mais la lotte manquait d’assaisonnement, un peu sèche et plat pas très copieux. De même pour la salade, j’ai fait moi même l’assaisonnement. La note était un peu assaisonnée par contre (2,5€ par couvert à ajouter)... un peu déçus
reviews.title: Un peu decevant

reviews.text:
We came across the restaurant by accident during the day and booked a table for dinner.  Food was best we have had in Venice yet!  Great atmosphere And good value relatively too.

Would highly recommend it.  The tiramisu is gorgeous!!
reviews.title: Great find and Fabulous traditional food...

reviews.text: On est rentrés dans ce restaurant étant de passage et ayant enfin trouvé une carte qui proposait des pâtes au Ragù de canard. Nous les avons dégustées avec du bon vin rouge local : un vrai régal ! Tiramisu aussi à la hauteur. Cadre sympa (terrasse intérieur) et serveurs professionnels et attentionnés. Dans le restaurant il y avait aussi bien des touristes que des locaux.
reviews.title: Excellentes tagliatelle au Ragù de canard

reviews.text:
Almost didn’t stop as only two empty tables on sidewalk in front and we wanted to eat outside, so glad we peeked in the window and saw their courtyard dining!

Started with an excellent Caprese salad and a bottle of wine - they were out of our first wine choice but their recommendation was outstanding.  Our meals were both excellent with the duck being some of the best we’ve ever eaten.

Staff was helpful, sweet and made certain our experience was good from start to finish.
reviews.title: Superb!

reviews.text:
We had red and black spaghetti. 
Both of them were delicious. The black had fish and the red only tomato. 
Cabernet red house wine is not so good, but they have a large selection of very good wines.
reviews.title: Nice romantic restaurant in the heart of Venece

reviews.text: Titolare molto gentile e simpatico. Ottima cucina,abbiamo ordinato due primi di mare e degli gnocchi di patate al gorgonzola, era tutto molto buono. Prezzo onesto, consigliato.
reviews.title: Consigliato

reviews.text: If you’re venturing around Venice, you must go here!!! We ate at a few different places but always kept coming back. Wonderful service, BEAUTIFUL inside garden, fresh delicious bread. Every single item we ordered was life-changing. Not too busy compared to some other places, but very high quality. A true gem.
reviews.title: You Must!

reviews.text: We we recommended by our hotle to eat here and loved the food, prices good and good wines available, would highly recommend this restaurant
reviews.title: Beautiful food

reviews.text: Visited twice after discovering it by chance! Amazing food and lovely service by staff. Really nice atmosphere as well. Reasonable prices for great portions of food.
reviews.title: Excellent food

reviews.text: Un ristorante  davvero consigliatissimo !!!cibi davvero squisiti  con alcune portate della tradizionale cucina veneta .ottima qualità !!grandissima cordialità , cortesia e professionalità del personale .ambiente molto tranquillo e curato !!consiglio di assaggiare le linguine  con gamberi e scampi alla busera ,la fritturina dell’Adriatico e le seppie con polenta !!!! Buonissimi i dolci !!!!la qualità di tutto è’ eccelsa e fresca!!!!ci siamo stati più volte ed abbiamo sempre mangiato benissimo !!!prezzi buoni rispetto alla media della zona .l’ osteria è’ ubicata in centro ,in una piccola stradina tranquilla e non e’ di tipo turistico ma di qualità!!!!!
reviews.title: Ottimo ristorante

reviews.text: pranzo veloce. primi piatti curati e saporiti, dolce e vino all'altezza e prezzi equilibrati considerando anche dove ci si trova. personale squisito. assolutamente da consigliare.
reviews.title: accogliente

reviews.text:
Went to this place for dinner while in Venice right before a storm. The awning broke & the dining area flooded due to heavy rains  which happens. During this time they had us mill around the inside seating &  when rain stopped put us back outside in damp seating. 
  There was a 2 person wait staff & they were slow...the assistant server acted like she couldn’t be bothered by tourist & claimed they were busy...all the while folding napkins. Overall, avoid this place - much better places in venice
reviews.title: Poor service- better places in Venice

reviews.text: We stopped in for lunch on a hot day after visiting the basilica. We were seated right away in the back patio, which was cooler because it was all in the shade. Our waiter was friendly and attentive, and we enjoyed our pasta dishes. No complaints.
reviews.title: Pleasant lunch in the back patio

reviews.text: As an Italian, finding good food in Venice has been a mission. In this place we got normal tomato spaghetti and it was good. I don’t know how fresh the seafood is. Prices are moderate.
reviews.title: Tomato pasta was good

reviews.text: Good located, good menu but can provide better service. Take quite long to get the attention of he staff. Anyway, you can enjoy a good dinner if you go with your friends which is the most important.
reviews.title: Good location but can be better

reviews.text: We were visiting Venice few days ago and tried to have a nice meal here, but... we have ordered lasagna,half of it wascold and costed 13eur. There was also 2.5 eur per person service fee, no free water (usually restaurants offers water for free). While salads which other tables ordered looked quite good.
reviews.title: Average

reviews.text:
This was our fourth visit to Venice and overall, we had much better food throughout our stay because of our reliance on online reviews.  The Osteria Leon Bianco would be near the bottom of our eight sit-down meals.  There was nothing very bad here, but nothing stood out as very good, either.

The bread was really sub-par.  I read in one management response that they source their bread from a famous nearby bakery...you can keep it.  The service was under-manned.  The mixed-seafood was just ok.  The one memorable highlight was desert.  

We've had much worse in tourist destinations in Italy.  If you're hungry and close by, you might give this place a try.  I don't understand how this place is so highly rated. 
 We wouldn't return here, as you could do so much better.
reviews.title: "Average" Means Just That

reviews.text: We stayed right around the corner and visited Leon Bianco for dinner on our second night. We were not disappointed! The food was very good, wine was great, staff was lovely, and the cozy garden was perfect on a beautiful Venice evening.
reviews.title: Cozy family dinner - perfect ambience

reviews.text: Si vous êtes amateur de poissons, c’est l’endroit idéal pour le déguster, vous ne serez pas déçu de la qualité et de la quantité. Le service est parfait, le personnel parle Français et vous donne toutes les explications que vous souhaitez. De l’extérieur l’endroit ne paye pas de mine mais à l’intérieur une belle salle et surtout à l’arrière une belle petite cour ou vous pourrez passer un agréable moment.
reviews.title: Une table excellente

reviews.text: I went for dinner with my daughter, we sat inside although there was also a few tables outside. It wasn't too busy at all and we were served right away. The food was delightful! My daughter's duck was beautifully cooked and tender, the caprese salad was refreshing and the mozzarella was creamy, my spaghetti alla vongole was fresh and tasty and they were very generous  with  the clams. The waitress recommended the Venetian cream for dessert which was like a tiramisu without the coffee. It was perfect since my daughter hates coffee but loves cream! The service, atmosphere and food was wonderful and I would rate it all a 5 out of 5! Would defo recommend for families and couples visiting venice!
reviews.title: Great restaurant to visit in Venice

reviews.text: My wife and I went there on a rainy day close to our hotel and were amazed by the food. I had the lasagna and my wife had the ravioli in a butter sauce. It was incredible! Highly recommend for anyone in Venice!
reviews.title: Phenomenal food!

reviews.text: Ci siamo recati in questo ristorante. Personale cortese. Due primi a base di pesce, spaghetti al nero seppia, due secondi a base di pesce, frittura calamari e seppie in umido, due calici di bianco, una bottiglia acqua, due dolci e caffè. Spesa 98 euro, proporzionata alla città, direi buona la qualità.
reviews.title: Week end Venezia

reviews.text:
On our last trip to Venice 2 years ago we came across this osteria tucked away in a small  "street" just off Campo San Luca (where we were staying) and ended up dining there twice in 3 days.

Having spent 20+ hours in transit from Australia, and being dog-tired, we headed straight here for dinner as we knew the quality of the establishment wouldn't disappoint.

My wife had a simple Prosciutto and Melon starter followed by sardines and prawns - a generous serve whch didn't disappoint the taste buds.

My starter of mussels and vongole served in a broth was exceptional.  A generous serve of both molluscs filled the bowl and the mussels in particular were sweet and sizeable pieces of meat.  There was plenty of bread provided to sop up the juices!

I'm not a big offal fan, but decided on this trip that nothing was off limits, so my choice for mains was the local "delicacy" of Fegato Vitello (veal liver and onions).  A generous serving of small pieces of fried liver smothered in onions bathed in a sweet and not too acidic sauce.

The dish was exceptionally tasty and my only "complaint" was that the liver may have been slightly overcooked - I was expecting it to be a little pink inside, but that's just me.

We both struggled to clear both plates so dessert as a no-go. I'd perhaps only question the value for money aspect of the meal, 81 euros for 4 simple (but delicious) dishes plus 3 glasses of house wine - but then again, Venice is not a cheap place to eat generally.  The service on the other hand was faultless.

A very enjoyable experience and this place is definitely on our permanent dining list in Venice.

PS Weather permitting, there is a very pleasant outdoor courtyard at the rear of the main dining room which also accommodates plenty of seated dining space.
reviews.title: A hidden gem

reviews.text:
This place is fantastic. The food was the best we had whilst in Venice, so good that we went twice in three days.

It is a very relaxed restaurant but the staff are attentive and friendly. 

The Spaghetti Ragu is so unbelievably good as is the Spaghetti Pomodoro. We didn't have desserts as we were too full after starters and mains, but the ones I saw being taken to other customers tables looked beautiful.

This place is a must for anyone visiting Venice.
reviews.title: Best we had

reviews.text:
The highly visible restaurants on the streets in Venice have a sameness about their menus and their appearance.  They all do the classics: lots of seafood, the classic pasta dishes for primi, predictable secundi both on the carne front and on the pesce front.  And it is difficult to tell the better restaurants by their appearance; they all look busy, overtraded, and a little jaded.

My wanderings of an aftternoon took me past Osteria Leon Bianco, 20 metres from the Campo Luca.  A peep at the menu showed a few unusual menu items.  Duck featured both as a ragu for a pasta primo and a roast duck breast as a secundo.  It also had a polenta and grilled cheese as a secundo.

Intrigued by duck ragu I went there for supper with my wife.  It was when I was given the wine list that everything changed.  There was a bottle of Farnito Cabernet Sauvignon 2012 on the wine list at E56.  The wine is regarded by some as a super-Tuscan and it is unquestionably an above average wine by any account.

When I showed an interest in above-average wines (I am a garagiste winemaker and have made 20 vintages of Cabernet Sauvignon myself) the host disappeared to his wine cabinet and trotted out a 2006 bottle of the same wine, a 1997 Sasscaia, a 2002 Sasssicia, and a 1999 Antinori Tignanello.  He could not immediately put a price to the vintage wines, apart from the Farnito, which he offered to me for E90.  The others, he said, were the preserve of his brother, who was responsible for the top-notch wines and with whom he would have to confer before sellilng them.  

I asked how they had been cellared.  The restaurant, he informed me, bought its own wines young and had cellared them all since their release.

The only one which was going to fall within my budget (at a stretch) was the other bottle of Farnito.  So we enjoyed our meal, made a reservation for the following day, and came back to finish off the 2006 bottle.

Both my wine and food, on both evenings, were good.  I had the duck ragu on the first evening, the roast duck breast (done to dark pink perfection.  My wife was had gnocchi with spinach and smoked ricotta, which she enjoyed, and I enjoyed my little taster too.  Caprese salads on both nights were good: fresh and light, with proper mozzarella di bufala.

Our welcome on both evenings was warm and not overly attentive.

I recommend this restaurant highly.
reviews.title: A gem of a restaurant - and what a wine list!

reviews.text: Situé au cœur de Venise, un peu à l'écart des rues très fréquentées. Accueil et service sympathiques. Les pâtes étaient bonnes. Prix corrects.
reviews.title: Pas mal

reviews.text: One of the worst meals of my life. Mozzarella was terrible. The bread was frozen and just pulled out — terrible.  The mixed seafood grill was inedible - no pinbones were pulled from the fish, old tuna, inedible calamari — absolutely terrible. The lamb “special” was a mockery.  Boiled lamb parts with barely any meat and mostly boiled fat.  I got 4 rib racks — without the meat — just the boiled bones.  Do not visit.
reviews.title: Worst meal....of my life

reviews.text:
Stopped here for lunch after a gondola trip. We wondered if it was a restaurant we frequented the last time we were in Venice, almost 18 years ago, but no.

Nevertheless, nice food, in my experience, duck is not common on menus, so we had that and grilled beef, after a antipasto mista and verdura.

Nice setting and option if eating in the garden out back
reviews.title: Quiet lunch

reviews.text:
Eu e minha esposa fomos ao restaurante por indicação do Hotel.
Pedi um gnocchi com gorgonzola e ela uma lasanha à bolonhesa.
Ambos estavam deliciosos.
Muito melhor que outros restaurantes que fomos em Veneza e, inclusive, mais barato.
Minha esposa tomou uma taça de vinho e eu tomei uma coca, deu 41 euros.
Alem disso, o atendimento foi excelente apesar de estar cheio.
Recomendo a todos!
reviews.title: Excelente!

reviews.text:
We have just eaten in this lovely restaurant. We walked past it a couple of nights ago and it was full so we came back tonight! 
My husband had the homemade pasta with duck and he loved it. I had the lasagna and agin it was tasty! 
Lovely service and we were not rushed at all! 
Highly recommend it.
reviews.title: Tasty Italian food

reviews.text: The muscles and clam starter are highly recommended. The lasagna and duck with potatoes were also very tasty. The waiter was very friendly and efficient and was overall a very nice dinner.
reviews.title: Dinner for two

reviews.text: We stumbled upon this a few nights ago, always looked busy so we decided to go in the last night.   We turned up without a reservation but they squeezed us in.  Calamari to die for and fresh pasta, really busy, they were having to turn people away, full of locals too.  Probably one of the best meals we’ve had in Venice.  Friendly and very helpful service.  Nice and clean, very traditional.
reviews.title: Great food and atmosphere

reviews.text: Our first night in Venice, both knackered. Hotel receptionist recommended this as being close and good. Very nice decoration, warm and comfortable. Friendly staff. I had spaghetti with duck and my partner chose spaghetti ragu. Both were excellent and the tiramisu (I'm told) was very nice too. Would definitely return.
reviews.title: Very nice

reviews.text:
Cena improvvisata senza prenotazione: personale gentilissimo nonostante fosse solo a servire ai tavoli. Cibo ottimo , giusto rapporto qualità/prezzo.
Da consigliare
reviews.title: Ottimo

reviews.text:
Locale al centro di Venezia, uno dei pochi che offre cucina tipica locale!
Accoglienza da parte del personale davvero ottima!
Cibo buonissimo e di qualità con porzioni abbondanti
Prezzo ottimo
Passando per Venezia, ci tornerò
reviews.title: Sorpresa piacevole!

reviews.text: Very nice and cosy restaurant , waiter was professional and friendly and he definitely cared that you were fully satisfied with the food , which we were - amazing lasagne and actually very reasonably priced as well - would like to come back again 😍
reviews.title: Very romantic good food

reviews.text:
Questo ristorante si trova un pò nascosto rispetto ai soliti ristoranti  turistici  , comunque a 200 metri da Piazza San Marco,  Siamo state accolte con gran gentilezza , consigliate sui piatti da scegliere, e devo dire che ho mangiato benissimo , le seppie con polenta al nero di seppia  una bontà  ,  il dolce ottimo,  le quantità sono veramente abbondanti .
consiglio
reviews.title: Una vera sorpresa

reviews.text: Sempre tutto buonissimo,servizio attento,cordiale e amichevole!consigliamo a tutti questo ottimo ristorante per mangiare pesce a Venezia fatto come si deve ad un prezzo ottimo!!allego foto,grazie ancora ragazzi!irene e Gigi
reviews.title: Sempre super!!!!!

reviews.text: Assolutamente consigliato. Siamo andati ieri sera, su suggerimento dell’albergo dove soggiornavamo: davvero un posto delizioso, in cui la cucina è tipica e buona, le porzioni generose, il cameriere (forse proprietario?) estremamente attento e professionale che segue i clienti con grande cortesia. Abbiamo mangiato: piovra con verdure, baccalà mantecato con polenta, spaghetti al nero di seppia, fegato alla veneziana con polenta, tiramisù della casa tutto annaffiato da mezzo litro di vino bianco e una birra: €91 prezzo giusto per una delle città più care al mondo.
reviews.title: Consigliatissimo

reviews.text: Sono stato consigliato dal portiere dell’albergo dove soggiornavo, menu variegato sia pesce che carne. Sono stato accolto da uno dei soci che mi ha messo subito a mio agio. Ho mangiato sia a pranzo che cena alternando carne e pesce e devo dire ottimo tutto. Lo consiglio ai miei colleghi autisti di Bus. Prezzi buoni per me che ho un fondo cassa limitato.
reviews.title: Consigliato

reviews.text:
Nos pareció menos turístico al estar un poco retirado.
Elegimos:
- espaguetis al Nero de sepia, muy buenos
- tagliatele ragu de pato, normal con un regusto un poco extraño 
- grill de carne, timo absoluto!!!! 18€ por una pechuga, una chuleta de cerdo, una rodaja de pastel de carne tipo salami y una salchicha abierta

El vino, muy bueno pero lo pagamos a 40€

Total de la cuenta por estas 4 cosas más un agua 99€

Aunque la sensación global que me llevó de Venecia es que se come mal y caro, si volviera tiraría de sándwich y tapas.
reviews.title: 0 recomendable

reviews.text: We came across this place on the first night. The place is small and tables are located closely to each other. Octopus starter was ok a bit tasteless but spaghetti with ragu sauce was lovely, simple choice but hit the spot for what we have fancied.
reviews.title: Nice little place

name: Club del Doge Restaurant
address: Campo Santa Maria del Giglio, 2467 c/o The Gritti Palace, 30124 Venice Italy

reviews.text:
Venezia è una città straordinaria e l'Hotel Gritti con l'annesso Ristorante Club del Doge non sono certamente da meno! 
Ho pranzato alcune volte al Ristorante e anche in quest'ultima occasione l'esperienza è stata di altissimo livello. 
Il cibo mi è stato servito da personale cortesissimo e attento, mai invasivo, sulla superlativa terrazza fronte Canal Grande. 
Il risotto alla Hemingway era eccezionale, tanto che ho richiesto in seguito la ricetta che mi è stata prontamente inviata via mail, in maniera molto dettagliata, complimenti!
Dopo il risotto ho gustato un ottimo tiramisù. 
Conto adeguato al cibo e alla location. 
Consiglio assolutamente il ristorante Club del Doge! 
Grazie ancora a tutto lo Staff con l’arrivederci alla prossima occasione!
reviews.title: Superlativo!

reviews.text: Location suggestiva tipica della stile veneziano. Il servizio ottimo ed il personale preparato. Ie portare sono ben presentate e quello che abbiamo scelto è stato di nostro gradimento.
reviews.title: Location suggestiva tipica

reviews.text: Both the restaurant and lounge bar overlook the Grand Canal and perhaps its most  stunning view.  But on hot summer  afternoons a canooy is rolled over the terrace that unfortunately obscures the magnificent Santa Maria della Salute as you sit at your shaded table.  Whether you enjoy an aperitive, a snack or something more adventurous it is the 'ensemble'  that one digests.  The elegant palace rooms, the obliging staff,  the menu and the knowledge that you're experiencing one of those " 100 places not to miss in your lifetime".  Food is good of course, but wouldn't be worth the price if it were not for the rest.  Two interesting starters, 2 fish mains (ample but not memorable), 2 satisfactory sweets, 2 glasses of Pinot Grigio, bottle sparkling water and one espresso.  TOTAL:  €245,00.  Not to be missed - once !
reviews.title: NOT TO BE MISSED  -  ONCE !

reviews.text: Wow! This restaurant is amazing! The best and most friendliest service Venice has to offer and the food is amazing.
reviews.title: Wow! This restaurant is amazing!

reviews.text:
Nous avons passé un excellent dîner dans ce restaurant. Le cadre est magnifique, très calme et tamisé.
Les plats sont bons et bien présentés.
Si vous prenez la dégustation de fromages, une assiette pour deux suffit largement.
Le personnel est agréable, souriant et attentif à vos désirs...
Très bon établissement
reviews.title: Très bonne soirée

reviews.text:
Fomos lanchar a este espaço, vista magnifica, serviço magnifico, bastante caro.
Bonita decoração, serviço exemplar, mas tudo bastante caro.
reviews.title: Lanche

reviews.text: If you are looking for a high status restaurant and ready to splurge, this is your place. The interior is top-notch and resembles that Italian-Renaissance artwork, with chandeliers and curving gold furniture. It captures the classic of Italian food, I ordered the assortment of Venetian Cicchetti and spaghettini with cuttlefish and spring onion. The food was delicious and the presentation was almost too pretty to eat. Everything was cooked just right and the flavor was bursting.
reviews.title: Magnificent First Class Resturant !

reviews.text:
The only thing I enjoyed was the view of the canal. My bf and I decided this would be the one restaurant we’d splurge on in hopes for a great fine dining experience. We’re both foodies and we were overall disappointed by our dishes- the taste was underwhelming and portion sizes were small for what you’re paying.
DISHES: 
 I got the lamb 3 ways and it was probably the worst dish I had in Italy, and most expensive. 
They do have great olive oil And the cuttlefish dish was decent. 
Overall: 
If I could do it again though I’d  go anywhere else in Venice.
reviews.title: Overpriced for the food

reviews.text:
Premier restaurant le soir de notre arrivee le 28/10.
Des prix au dela du pensable, des serveurs (pas tous mais la majorité) plus commerciaux que serveurs, on ne nous explique pas la carte, et le plus grand moment fut celui de l'addition dans laquelle on decouvre 30€ de "copperti". A savoir qu'en Italie on paye les couverts (c'est ce que nous a expliqué le serveur avec un air hautain quand on lui a posé la question), qu'en principe tous les restaurants doivent l'inscrire sur leur carte et qu'effectivement en se penchant sur le sujet on s'est rendu compte que soit c'etait de 2 à 4€ soit environ 12% de l'addition. Non seulement là c'etait notifié nulle part mais en plus c'est tres élevé et tres exageré par rapport àla soiree passee.
Nous sommes deçus. Avec un tarif de menus pareil ils pourraient s'abstenir ca ne fera pas baisser leur chiffre d'affaire!!!!
Je ne le conseille pas.
reviews.title: Voleurs!

reviews.text: A truly first-class restaurant in Venice. However, the prices go along with the restaurant's status so be prepared for sticker shock.  Please note that the dinner menu can be challenging, reflecting the latest trends of high class restaurants to outdo each other with their “artistic” flair and presentation and unusual and creative (?) food combination skills. For us that regrettably loses sight of the principal focus of a great meal which should be on taste! Lunch, however, at the Gritti should not be missed.
reviews.title: Great but ....

reviews.text: Sehr schönes Restaurant mit Terrasse mit wunderschöner Aussich auf la salute.. freundliche Bedienung, sehr gutes Essen.. eher gehobene Küche aber wunderbar,,, immer gerne wieder...
reviews.title: Wunderbar

reviews.text:
Acceuil parfait, service professionnel et agréable.
Les plats (filets de sole)étaient très savoureux, les desserts (souflets)à tomber.
Nous avons pu diner sur la terrasse avec une vue sublime.
Mesdames, faites vous plaisir, votre menu ne comportera pas de prix!
reviews.title: Parfait

reviews.text:
We went friends for drinks then dinner in the Gritti Palace and were overwhelmed by the beautiful view of the water and the magnificent rooms inside.  We found everyone to be gracious and welcoming.  

We had our drinks, a gentleman brought us numerous appetizers, and as we enjoyed them, we were able to look at the menu and order our dinners.

Once the dinners were ready, we were brought into the beautiful dining room  and were seated at our table that was set with lovely linens and a gorgeous floral arrangement.  Small stools were placed by the ladies’ chairs to hold purses.  From the starters through the desserts, the staff could not have been more attentive.  This was truly an elegant evening to cherish.
reviews.title: Magnificent

reviews.text: The restaurant was very beautiful and elegant. We enjoyed the meal very much. The amuse bouchée was a nice touch. The risotto and the fish of the day were both excellent, but I wish we had shared dished because neither of us could finish and it was expensive to waste. The tiramisu was the best I e ever had. I recommend going!
reviews.title: Beautiful Venice restaurant

reviews.text: Beautiful view by the canal. Gondolas everywere with singers made the atmosphere even more special. Food amazing but small portions. Loved the olive oil.
reviews.title: Amazing

reviews.text:
We were fortunate to have a beautiful evening for dinner and were seated outside on the Grand Canal.  The restaurant looks across the water at the Basilica di Santa Maria della Salute and there may not be a better view in Venice.  

There were some missteps on our wine and food service but the food and the wine itself were good.  It was a busy time (with the Biennale and Film Festival) so the staff was running the whole night.  With all of that going on, I felt they did well.  Next time we may try lunch before we commit to dinner again.

All of that said, it really was beautiful and it is worth a visit.
reviews.title: Meal Was Good - the View Was Amazing.

reviews.text:
mi ero promesso di recensire questo ristorante, la mia vista risale a un po’ di tempo fa.
Location meravigliosa, servizio impeccabile, pietanze gradevoli.
Le foto parlano da sole, ovviamente i prezzi sono commisurati al tipo di ristornate, un ristorante di livello.
Un ringraziamento particolare oltre che a tutto lo staff va a Mauro il responsabile di sala, una persona professionale e piacevole.
Tornerò.
reviews.title: Unico

reviews.text: Ресторан находится в красивом пятизвёздочном отеле. Можно выбрать столики на террасе с видом на Гранд канал.  Меню небольшое, но все свежее и очень вкусное, главное правильно сделать выбор.  Ресторан дорогой, но это и так понятно, так как отель в котором он расположен излюбленное место для политиков и звезд кино.
reviews.title: Красивый вид - вкусная еда

reviews.text:
I pre booked this in advance so I would have a wonderful View. I wish I could remember my waiters name oh, he was quite lovely! The service was superb as it should be for the prices. I feel that they lived up to their expectations. I had an Aperol Spritzer, an appetizer tasting menu, pinot noir, the chef's tasting menu & coffee with my dessert- AND WHAT A VIEW!!! I was even lucky enough to have Gondolier's passing in front of my table serenading their customers :) I ate my entrees outside and took my dessert and coffee inside the bar lounge area. 
It is located inside the gritti palace right next to a Gondolier station. Was Lovely from start to finish!
reviews.title: Birthday Treat Fancy Venetian Style!

reviews.text: We spent three nights at the Gritti Palace and ate two of our three dinners here as well as breakfast every morning.  The food was excellent.  They had a children’s menu for the kids.  The pasta, fish, and other food was excellent.  The wine list was also great with options at all price points.  Alessandro was particularly helpful and greeted us warmly every night and held a special table for us.  We highly recommend this place.
reviews.title: Wonderful restaurant

reviews.text: Our dinner tonight was intended to be a memorable end to our two weeks in Europe. The setting on the terrace on the Grand Canal was perfect. The restaurant runs an Epicurean school so the prices are stratospheric. Unfortunately our meals were nothing special. I had the rabbit ravioli is a primo and while the pasta itself was tasty, I could not taste any rabbit. The main course was pigeon and it was bland. The only sign of seasoning was on the skin of the lone leg bone. And this was the dish the waiter recommended as emblematic of the chef’s style. There were glitches in the service too. The first table we were seated at had a dirty knife which had attracted ants. Later, after we ordered decaf cafe americano with dessert, we were served espresso instead.
reviews.title: Pretentious

reviews.text: Ресторан Club del Doge произвел очень приятное впечатление. Мы остались очень довольны. Заказывала на террасе непосредственно у воды, хотя можно было провести вечер и внутри ресторана, но очень хотелось видеть Гранд Канал.  Мы остались очень довольны.  Великолепный шеф-повар Daniele Turco! Спасибо ему большое! Вкусный комплимент, фантастически приготовлен на гриле огромный сибас! А десерт - просто произведение искусства. Персонал очень милый, дружелюбный и с хорошим чувством юмора. Потрясающий вид на церковь Санта-Мария-Делла-Салюте. По Гранд Каналу проплывают гондолы с поющими серенады гондольерами. Фантастика! Рекомендуем всем, кто хочет провести незабываемый вечер в Венеции.
reviews.title: Чудесный романтический вечер в день рождения

reviews.text:
Great location and service good BUT tasting menu at £160 was average and they try to rush courses to free up tables.  It was obvious.  Plate up plate down! We had to ask them to stop so we could digest!   Drinks extortionate, outside hotel an Aperol Spritz is 4/6 Euros, at Del Doge table it was 26 euros! 

Won’t be back as it just wasn’t good value 
DO GO TO Il Ridotto though superb food service and value
reviews.title: Terrace Lovely but food average and ££££££

reviews.text: Lovely terrace..great view..we had a very nice table close to the water..we went there for lunch..a bit expensive..but it s worth it...it s definatelly a must..if you visit venice...
reviews.title: Lovely

reviews.text: Hold da op en stor oplevelse. Er du i tvivl fordi de ikke har en Michelin stjerne? Bare book, du vil med garanti ikke fortryde det.. Det er som at træde ind i en teaterforestilling - husk at sig du vil sidde ved vandet når du booker bord.
reviews.title: Mad ved grand canal!

reviews.text:
Ottimo servizio, bellissima location, cocktail buonissimi e soddisfacenti. Adatto a chi vuole fare una serata romantica. Ci ritornerò presto.

--------

Great service, beautiful location, delicious and satisfying cocktails. Suitable for those who want to have a romantic evening. I'll be back soon.
reviews.title: Semplicemente il top!

reviews.text: Rip off!!! I have been to fine dining restaurants all over the world and this one is not worth the hefty tag! The view is gorgeous, but you can go to Grand Canal restaurant for the same view or elsewhere. They messed up my husband’s first course and brought out a half sliced grape tomato and half piece of burrata to make up for it ( we laughed at the size). They then messed up what we each got twice. I ordered a pasta as my main dish. I got four tiny pieces of ravioli for $40. Let me tell you: each piece of tiny pasta was NOT worth $10. It should have been to die for! If someone orders a pasta as a main dish they should give you more than four tiny pieces. The prices of bottles of wine were RIDICULOUS! They started at over $100 and went up to $2,000 ( Stop it!). This establishment is not worth saying you went because some annoying or obnoxious Americans can prove they have the money to go! Avoid at all costs.
reviews.title: Dinner at Club del Dodge

reviews.text: Top quality tasting menu, with perfect wine pairing. Service was as good as it’s gets. And when you combine that with the view it’s something you will remember for the rest of your life.
reviews.title: Fabulous food, service and view among the best anywhere

reviews.text:
Solo hicieron una cosa bien en este restaurante que fue reservarme una mesa en primera fila del Gran Canal ( de otro modo ya les dije que no me interesaba ).
Después de casi una hora sobre la reserva para sentarnos porque no utilizan doble turno solo esperan a que los que cenan pronto se levanten ( si es que se levantan ) pedimos 2 menús del Doge con maridaje a 150 €/p. Señalar que el servicio de este restaurante ( no incluyo al Chef ) es excelente tanto desde la chica de recepción que nos intentó ubicar donde queríamos y nos pidió disculpas por el retraso hasta los camareros y sumiller que fueron muy amables. El menú aunque parezca increíble constaba de plato principal de POLLO. Repito POLLO en un menú de 150 €/persona, increíble. El resto de platos así como los vinos fueron de lo mas aceptables y como colofón me prometieron una "sorpresa" por ser nuestro aniversario de boda que supongo seria la factura porque sino aún la sigo esperando... No lo recomiendo, por ese precio comes en un 3 Estrellas Michelin.
reviews.title: Solo ubicación y estética

reviews.text: Ambiente super luxuoso, pedimos um risoto é um ravióli , ambas estavam deliciosas, só que a massa era pouca comida. Pedimos o famoso suflê de chocolate ! Maravilhoso!!!! Os garços educados e gentis , sempre trazia mimos, entradinhas e doces no final ! Vale muito a pena conhecer
reviews.title: Restaurante maravilhoso

reviews.text: Wanting a nice restaurant for a romantic dinner in Venice I settled on this location based on reviews on several sites. Absolutely fantastic in no way did it disappoint. The food was fantastic, and the service was spectacular!!! Every course was as good or better then the next. We began with drinks and starters next door then went for a Gondola ride and back for our seating time 20 min early. We were immediately seated next to the water as requested in our reservation. From the time we were seated the service was spot on. Although this location is listed as a higher priced restaurant I would say it’s pretty average. But the food and service are well above average. This is a must stop and enjoy the evening restaurant. Read the dress code!!!!! If you can’t dress respectable for a few hours for a romantic dinner then go down the alley and eat a cafe pizza!!
reviews.title: Great view and better service!!

reviews.text:
Vista Maravilhosa!!
Serviço excelente!
Comida razoável é mto caro ...
Não vale..,
Restaurante lindo e luxuoso
reviews.title: Vista Maravilhosa!!!
reviews.userLocation: São José dos Campos, São Paulo, Brazil

reviews.text:
We decided to go to Club del doge for my fathers 69th birthday.
Even though we booked it less then 24 hours before our visit it wasn't any trouble to get a reservation in a good spot.
The food was delicious and the service was excellent.
I can highly recommend this restaurant.
reviews.title: everything was fantastic

reviews.text:
Das beste war der Blick und der von uns ausgesuchte Wein.
Wir hatten einen Tisch für 19:00 Uhr reserviert. Wir kamen um 18:40 Uhr an und uns wurde gesagt: „ Das Restaurant öffnet um 19:00 Uhr, Sie sind zu früh“.
Niemand sagte, „nehmen Sie doch auf der Terrasse Platz für einen Apero oder so, man ließ uns einfach stehen.
Um 19:00 Uhr bekamen wir unseren Tisch zugewiesen.
Das Essen war nicht der Rede Wert.
Kalt, lau, ohne Pfiff, ohne Würze. Zu teuer für das, was geboten wurde.
Es lebe die Trattoria um die Ecke.
reviews.title: Entäuschung

reviews.text:
6 мая 2019 года ужинали в этом ресторане. Вид потрясающий, обслуживание отличное, на веранде не холодно. 
Началось все с того, что мы заказали воду, нам налили ее в стаканы. И я сразу увидела , что мой стакан грязный по ободку. Сразу попросила поменять. Поменяли, но новую бутылку воды не предложили. То есть просто вылили 1/3 от купленной нами воды. Мелочь, но неприятно, согласитесь))

Еда невкусная, цены неоправданно высокие. Заказали овощной суп, рыбу и баранину. Все попросили разделить на две тарелки , так как все блюда хотели попробовать вместе) в итоге моему мужу в тарелку положили РЫБЬЮ ГОЛОВУ (в дорогом ресторане гостю положили голову рыбы на тарелку , которую из покон веков выбрасывали , а не то что подавали на стол, не говоря уже о том что МЯСА в голове НЕ БЫЛО!). Но само филе было нормального размера, порция достаточного размера, соус к рыбе вкусный, сама рыба- сухая. 
Далее следовало удивление! Жаль, мы не сфотографировали. Принесли баранину. Она небыли на подушке из овощного соуса и это была сосиска... но она была не целая. Всего в порции было 6 тонко нарезанных слайдов сосиски (ее диаметр 1 см и толщина кусочка миллиметра 3...) просто прикол в том, что если собрать все кусочки , то получится 1/4 целой сосиски , мы прикола не поняли, не в Миллере же )) и сосиска как сосиска, не отличается от магазинной... ))) 
Ну и про суп... он был больше похож по консистенции на густое картофельное пюре и абсолютно не имел Вкуса... 
в общем не советуем. Выберите лучше другой ресторан в Венеции, где за эти же деньги вы получите удовольствие))
reviews.title: Не советуем

reviews.text: Отличный интерьер. Замечательная терасса. Приятное обслуживание. Хороший выбор вин. А вот с едой не то. Все вкусно. Свеже. Оригинально. Но не то. Нет гастрономии.
reviews.title: Романтический ужин

reviews.text: This was our Honeymoon splurge meal for our last night. We did call the day before and made reservations at about 8:15pm no problem. The setting was perfect, on their floating canal view dining room. It was a bit chilly, but they had heating lamps on the patio which gave a rosy glow to the evening and also offered complimentary blanket shawls to keep everyone comfortable. The food is high price but absolutely worth it. We got a lower end bottle of wine [45 Euro], the Venetian seafood sampler, two courses each as well as dessert. With my cafe latte they brought a dish of complimentary cookies and they wrote a special "Happy Honeymoon" message on our dessert presentation. The server was wonderful! Not uppity, but still very professional and classy, he was very warm and friendly and we had alot of fun while still feeling very high class. It was the fanciest meal I've ever had and felt waited on hand and foot without feeling any stuck up vibes from the staff. The food was fabulous, each dish was very distinct. I highly recommend the veal cheek, it just melted in your mouth. Every dish was a treat and an experience of its own, nothing disappointed! We ended up paying about 350 euro for everything and added a tip for the waiter since he made our time there so special. I will definitely go here again when I return to Venice!
reviews.title: Last Night in Venice

reviews.text:
Magia allo stato puro!!! Da vivere almeno una volta nella vita. Lo chef bravissimo, il servizio è attento e premuroso con nota di merito per la simpatia ed eleganza del maitre.
Ottimo i ravioli al baccalà con crema di prezzemolo ed il baccalà con carbonara. Mi è piaciuta meno la tarte tatin. Ottimo, elegante, atmosfera accogliente e intima!!!
reviews.title: Ottimo!!

reviews.text:
Partiamo dalla cosa positiva: la location è molto bella, adatta anche per una grande occasione, antica, in pieno stile veneziano e con un bellissimo panorama sul Canal Grande in caso di utilizzo della terrazza. 
La qualità del cibo era buona e quindi mi dispiace avere delle cose negative da dire ma bisogna farlo, e la nota negativa è il prezzo. 
Va bene che siamo a Venezia e in un grande albergo e che quindi tutto è più caro, ma se mi chiedi 14€ di servizio e 10€ per una bottiglia di acqua mi devi offrire certi standard che in alcune cose sono mancati. 
Con tale costo del servizio mi aspetto un cestino del pane quanto meno con qualche preparazione particolare, non una cosa normale unita alla richiesta di aggiunta di olio. Viene sì portato un pre antipasto ma questo viene portato anche in altri posti di questo tipo. Nota veramente dolente il secondo. Buono il rombo per carità ma, se ti metti in un certo standard, nel piatto devono trovarsi solo cose che si possono mangiare e quindi il rombo andrebbe servito senza le spine. Perché non spetta a me stare attento se ci siano o meno ma a fronte di certi costi i piatti penso vadano serviti in un certo modo. 
Niente da dire sulla cortesia del personale di sala che è stato gentile e cortese in tutto ma a fronte di costo così alti per me non ci deve essere niente che non va. Potevo fare presenti le mie rimostranze al momento ma ho voluto prendere del tempo per pensarci, e per quanto mi sia ripetuto che molte erano le cose positive,  quelle negative non mi sono proprio andate giù. 
Preciso che ero conscio di dove stavo andando, in quale contesto mi trovassi e che prezzi proponesse. 
E sono più che disponibile a pagare una cifra più alta del normale per una cena ma se lo faccio penso debbano osservarsi certi standard che qui sono mancati. 
Peccato davvero perché la cornice merita veramente, ma a fronte di certe richieste la location per me non è sufficiente.
reviews.title: Bene ma non benissimo

reviews.text: We saved the best for our last night in magical Venice and dined at the Club del Doges in the Gritti Palace. Wonderful seating facing the Grand Canal & enjoyed the Gondolas passing by as we enjoyed our gourmet meal. A very special restaurant in a unique city - Venice.
reviews.title: Club del Doges in the Gritti Palace

reviews.text:
We thought the highlights are the ambiance/room, service, and food - in that order. Although some of the food was not all that memorable or supremely exquisite, the whole experience is greater than the sum of its parts because the service has GRACE. The service was well orchestrated, and we were served by many different gentlemen who each had a part to play. 
Hemingway risotto was good. The highlight of food was the beef filet for two, carved tableside. This was truly the best beef (most tender, and also most flavorful) of our lives, costly but well worth it. I do recommend this beef as top choice!  Other reviews I noticed complaining of tough beef, wow, that is not our experience whatsoever. I think they would quickly remedy if that complaint was made.
It's hard to convey the comfortable warmth of the room and the surroundings in general. I think it suffices to say that the ambiance is as good as most Michelin 1-2 star places, and the service is also at that level, but it is friendly and not snobby. If the food got a bit more creative, this could easily be a 1 star.
Note that prices are high as befitting what you get. Total for three of us with one bottle of wine was about $550 USD. The cover charge is high, not clear what is provided for that cover...we felt, not much. Perhaps another in-between amuse bouche would make it more justified to charge this cover. The wine prices are also high but not outrageous, it feels like they made a decision not to go overboard on the wine price and just mark up 1.5x or 2x, NOT the 3x or even up to 4x that seems to pervade the highest level luxury hotel restaurants.
Do dress up to befit the room. We saw a variety of dress styles, although we were in jackets. It calls for at least a khakis and long-sleeve collared shirt for men, at a minimum.
I would absolutely go again.
reviews.title: Fantastic experience, the whole package

reviews.text:
Six of us dined here for lunch on Christmas day and we were all delighted with the experience. The food was delicious, wine excellent and service just right. The atmosphere was sophisticated and unhurried, perfect for a special occasion. 
We had a bottle of Prosecco, 2 bottles of red wine, starters, main courses and a few of us had a pudding and the bill came to around £120 each which was very good value considering the venue and quality of food.
reviews.title: Perfect Christmas lunch

name: Il Refolo
address: Santa Croce 1459 Campo San Giacomo dell'Orio, Venice Italy

reviews.text:
Un accueil glacial pour ne pas dire inexistant.
Une bière pression presque pas fraîche.
Les calamars grillés (mais au premier sens du terme).
Une salade de poulpe insipide.
Et un serveur totalement indifférent.
Bref on n’a pas aimé et en plus j’i été malade.
A éviter
reviews.title: A éviter

reviews.text: Ottimi cicchetti, materie prime di ottima qualità, location meravigliosa in riva al bellissimo canale veneziano. Rapporto qualità-prezzo molto buono
reviews.title: Venezia

reviews.text: Sehr freundlicher und aufmerksamer Service, gute Beratung, sehr gutes Essen & Hauswein. Schön am Wasser gelegen, auf einem Platz abseits der Touristen-Massen.
reviews.title: Glückstreffer

reviews.text:
Perfekt! Super freundlicher Service und hervorragendes Essen. 
An einem ruhigen, idyllischen Plätzchen am Wasser.
Es war ein wunderschöner Abend.
reviews.title: Perfekt!

reviews.text: Cadre vraiment très sympathique avec une très belle terrasse, en dehors des quartiers supers touristiques de Venise et juste au bord de l'eau ! Nous avons pris des pâtes qui étaient très bonnes. Seul petit bémol : alors que les plats, eux, nous on été servis très rapidement (peut-être même un peu trop, nous n'avions pas fini notre apéro), le dessert à été un peu long à être servi mais surtout nous avons dû demander 3 fois pour avoir l'addition (plus de 30min d'attente juste pour demander à payer). Même si en vacances nous ne sommes pas pressés c'est dommage de finir sur cette note. Sinon je recommande vivement !
reviews.title: Une belle soirée en terrasse

reviews.text: Bestes Restaurant, charmante Bedienung, und super Essen. Wir saßen draußen, in einer ruhigen Ecke, die Bedienung machte die Empfehlungen für das Essen, alles super. Gerne wieder.
reviews.title: Volltreffer

reviews.text: Great authentic surrounding with very friendly staff and excellent food. We shared a pizza as starters and then spaghetti vongole and spaghetti sea food. Both dishes were excellent. Highly recommend it.
reviews.title: Genuine neighborhood restaurant

reviews.text:
Very nice place, super friendly staff and delicious Italian food!
We went there, as it was recommended by locals. The spot by the canal in the evening is very nice. The service was perfect and the staff was more than friendly. The Pizzas were really good with fresh and high quality ingrediences. They also have very nice (bit expensive) beer. The house wine is also very good. After Starters and pizza, we had more than enough!
reviews.title: Super friendly staff, delicious Pizza.

reviews.text:
We visited this funny and gorgeous barman Denis who treated us as friends. Lovely atmosphere and better whisky. Just a bit more...
Cheese and ham and meat and spritz...
reviews.title: Amazing!!!

reviews.text:
Recommandé comme un coup de cœur dans le guide un grand we à Venise nous avons été très déçu !
Cuisine médiocre, service tout juste passable.
Ne vaut clairement pas le détour
reviews.title: Passez votre chemin

reviews.text: We found this restaurant by chance as it was close to our Airbnb. Great experience on the first evening and it’s convenience meant we ended up eating there all 4 nights. Lovely location in a small quiet square overlooking a canal. We were lucky with the weather so were able to eat outside under the parasols, lit by candles and fairy lights, very relaxing and romantic. Blankets provided at each table was a nice touch, just in case you did feel chilly. Menu varied enough to allow us to try something different each night. Pasta and pizzas fantastic, even the burger was above average. Tirasimu was excellent. “Red” draft malt beer was great and my better half enjoyed the Bellini. All the staff were friendly, but Miguel in particular was really helpful and attentive, getting to know us and our tastes despite the language barrier. Well worth a visit if you fancy some great food away from the usual hustle and bustle.
reviews.title: Hidden gem

reviews.text: We just happened upon this little restaurant. Great ravioli, pizza and Greek salad. We’ve just spied a fish platter which looks Devine. Away from the crowds and great service.
reviews.title: Superb food

reviews.text: We dined at this little restaurant near our B&B one evening, drawn by the lovely location with outdoor tables by the canal.  The setting is exceptional!  We had been eating a lot of seafood so chose pasta this evening.  The lasagna was good but nothing special.  Hard to mess up this dish in Italy.  Food was not good enough to draw us back another evening during our week in Venice.  If convenient to where you are, and you are in the mood for very casual and scenic, this may be the spot for you.
reviews.title: Lovely setting, average meal

reviews.text:
Placé dans un quartier calme, sur une place lumineuse qui offre deux ponts, nous avons été chaleureusement orientées dans un premier temps puis sommes revenues déjeuner. Jolie carte et service parfait. 
De plus je recommande la jolie eglise San Giacomo da l’Orio dont l’entrée est sur la place.
Un seul commerce sur la place, le restau. Au calme j’ai dit.
reviews.title: CHALEUREUX, JOLIE TERRASSE UNIQUE SUR UNE PLACE LE LONG D’UN CANAL

reviews.text:
Pâtes carbonara excellentes, cadre tres sympa entre deux petits ponts au bord de l'eau (tres romantique). 
Légère déception pour le tiramisu. 
Mais super moment !!!
reviews.title: Un agréable moment

reviews.text: Lovely, romantic meal during our recent trip to Venice. Restaurant situated in quiet square, next to canal - just meters away from the lively Campo S. Giacomo da l’Orio. Staff very friendly and accommodating. Reasonably priced. Great Aperol spritz and highly recommend the Venetian biscuits with desert wine (pictured).
reviews.title: Relaxing evening meal outside

reviews.text: J'y étais déjà allé il y a un an ou deux. Bel endroit, bons repas. Côté service par contre je suis tombé sur des gens pas motivés. Peut-être une mauvaise journée. Cependant, mon repas était très bon.
reviews.title: Très bien

reviews.text: Restaurante modesto, com pizzas muito boas e um vinho branco da casa agradável. Esplanada super calma e serviço de mesa eficiente. Preço média por pessoa 25€
reviews.title: Cantinho sossegado

reviews.text: Fuimos a cenar rememorando nuestra primera cena en Venezia hace 7 años. La ubicación es perfecta, muy íntima al lado de un canal pequeño. Nos sorprendió que solo había 2 mesas ocupadas. El personal fue muy amable. La comida buena pero cara. 1 calzone, 1 tártar de atún, una botella de vino y 2 cafés; 62€.
reviews.title: De cena

reviews.text: Hyvät ja maukkaat pizzat ja raviolit. Mukava, viihtyisä ja rauhallinen paikka. Nautin hanasta hyvän punertavan Italialaisen oluen.
reviews.title: Nice place and good service

reviews.text:
Ristorante molto carino e pulito !
Servizio impeccable ! 
E che dire della presentazione dei piatti ?
Al dir poco spettacolari !
reviews.title: Piacevole sorpresa

reviews.text:
Pizza eccezionale! 
A mio parere la più buona in tutta Venezia! 
Posto incantevole e molto romantico, 
Il servizio é molto cordiale e veloce!
reviews.title: Buona

reviews.text: Romantisches Ambiente, superfreundliche Bedienung, leicht abgelegen und dementsprechend angenehm ruhige Atmosphäre, ausgezeichnetes Essen!

After a morning of travel and checking into our B & B, we found Il Refolo nearby. My daughter was craving pizza and we shared a margherita pizza and salad. We sat canalside under the umbrellas. Service was timely and our waitress was lovely and had a good sense of humor.  We passed by here several times during our stay in Venice and she always had a smile and friendly wave for us. Our food was very good and we had a very enjoyable lunch here,
reviews.title: First lunch in Venice

reviews.text: Das Refolo liegt in einer ruhigen Ecke, direkt an einem kleinen Kanal. Bei gutem Wetter kann man draußen essen. Wir waren vier Tage in Venedig und aßen hier das mit Abstand beste Essen. Das Carpaccio mit Birnen und Käse war z.B. exzellent, ebenfalls die Nachspeisen. Die Preise sind -- für Venedig -- zivil.
reviews.title: hervorragend

reviews.text: 10-18 euros pizzas that are not much better than the Frozen pizzas you buy at the supermarket. Would definitely NOT recommend if you want to have real food
reviews.title: Terrible pizza

reviews.text:
Peut être moyen + étant donné le niveau des restaurants à Venise...
N’y aller que si grosse faim / très pratique d’un point de vue logistique.
reviews.title: Restaurant très moyen

reviews.text:
We ended our weekend in Venice here and it was the perfect way to finish! The food was gorgeous, the menu was simple but varied and clear, and we could see it was an authentic kitchen. Sitting outside in the courtyard was peaceful and the ambience was lovely; we both agreed it was the best meal that we had had all weekend. 

The staff were friendly and helpful. They were only a bit put out by us splitting the bill on visa and didn’t want us to round things up to leave a tip. But this wasn’t the first time we experienced that in Venice. Overall, it was a fabulous place to eat and would highly recommend!
reviews.title: Beautiful setting, wonderful food & excellent service

reviews.text: Excellent food, friendly staff and lovely views. Highly recommend this Italian Restaurant, far from the hustle of the city. We were lucky that our Airbnb host (italian lady) recommended this place to us.
reviews.title: Good quality food

reviews.text:
Restaurant sympathique proposant une terrasse au bord de l eau. Prix corrects et très bonne nourriture.
Personnel serviable.
reviews.title: Restaurant au calme au bord de l eau

reviews.text:
Sur une petite place près d'une église, se trouve cette pizzeria traditionnelle. La terrasse est sur un quai très pittoresque, entre 2 ponts. On est au calme et en plus, on y mange bien. Nous avons pris un Spritz (5 €) et des pizzas (entre 12 et 15 €). Le service est agréable et rapide. On mange en regardant passer les gondoles.
Une bonne adresse, hors des secteurs touristiques.
reviews.title: Une pizzeria sur les quais au calme

reviews.text: This had been recommended to us, and we were able to dine here twice during our visit.  The first time we enjoyed the pizzas for which they are well-known.  I especially enjoyed mine with Gorgonzola and sausage.  For the second visit we had penne and lasagne (veal and vegetables, which were both excellent.  There are some interesting desserts; we both enjoyed the "Pineapple Soup". There was a slight blip in the service on our second visit, but otherwise fine, not enough to prevent me from giving the full 5.
reviews.title: Excellent pizzas and desserts

reviews.text: staying nearby we found this absolute gem on our fist night although we did,nt eat there that night. if you have not been here its in a small square with tables out side next to a quiet cana lwhich is perfect for lunch or dinner.we were in town for carnivale so evenings were cold and we went inside. the fist thing you see is the kitchen on your left which was spotlessly clean. the owners were very friendly and the menu excellent .we both chose the veal lasagne with vegetables.the inside is not very big and was nicely decorated and full of locals which is always a good omen. we chose red beer to drink as we have never seen it before and a good choice too.food was brought out shortly and looked very nice.it was bursting with flavour and a decent portion to boot. the accompanying fries were equally good and again a good size portion.we topped this feast off with tiramisu,simply amazing. overall it was such a good experience that we went back another evening for pizza and that too was great.overall i would say this is a great place to dine,good unhurried service reasonable prices for high quality food and well worth the visit. if i find myself in the area i would not hesitate to go back
reviews.title: best lasagne in santa croce

reviews.text:
Pizza buona,tavolini all' aperto in un contesto carino e tranquillo.
Personale cortese e veloce, unico neo il prezzo un po alto di pizze e bevande, maggiorato dal servizio al 10%
reviews.title: Pizza buona ma un po caro

reviews.text: Having been raised as a youth in Venice, "Il Refolo" is where I enjoy festive evenings with family and friends, or business dinners with associates and colleagues "To Be Venetian". The atmosphere of the "alfresco" dining in the authentic "campo" with the light breeze ("refolo") passing through its space, is exquisite. The cuisine, which is prepared by the Venetian family which also owns the reknown "Il Fiore" restaurant nearby, while being moderately priced as compared to its notable neighbor, is equally exquisite.
reviews.title: To Be Venetian

reviews.text: Un lieu top, des serveurs qui parlent français, des pizzas plus chères que la moyenne vénitienne mais excellente.
reviews.title: Une belle entrée en matière

reviews.text: Restaurant romantique sur une petite placette au bord du canal. Table agrémentée d'une bougie pour le dîner, proposition d'un plaid si besoin pr le soir. Service très sympathique et rapide. Pizza et pâtes al refolo excellentes, la calzone est bonne pour les amateurs de mozzarella mais manque de sauce tomate, c'est le seul point négatif.
reviews.title: Belle adresse !!

reviews.text: Prezzi modici, personale molto attento e gentile. Il ristorante offre pizze classiche come rivisitate con prodotti tipici della zona, primi e secondi di carne o di pesce di buona qualità ad un prezzo onesto. Ci ritorneremo sicuramente, pesce buono e pizza dall'ottimo impasto.
reviews.title: Cena gustosa e molta cortesia

reviews.text:
Capitati per caso, giornata con timido sole e i tavolini all’aperto invitano. Abbiamo mangiato bene e il personale è gentile, cordiale e sorridente! Sarà perché non sono in un “percorso formica” dei turisti?
Sta di fatto che qui sono bravi e piacevoli. Consiglio di cuore
reviews.title: Venezia relax

reviews.text: Although nicely set and decent food we had one of the worst experiences in Venice. The staff is rude, disrespectful and careless. We waited 55 minutes for our food, after asking for the food 30 Mins in we were told to just be patient it will eventually come. Stay away.
reviews.title: Terrible experience

reviews.text:
Un eccellenza  veneziana nel cuore del Sestiere di Santa Croce. Il piccolo locale ha a disposizione il campo davanti all'attività quale sala da pranzo unica nella sua eccezionale specificità.
Il campo è situato tra l'alto campanile e la facciata della chiesa di San Giacomo dell'Orio (all'interno della quale vi è una piccola pala d'altare di Giovan Battista Pittoni ...un vero gioiello rococò) e un suggestivo rio solcato dalle gondole e impreziosito dai tipici ponticelli veneziani. L'ora indicata per usufruire di questo locale è il crepuscolo quando tra il suono delle campane, il rosseggiare del cielo e le gondole su cui baritoni cantano brani della tradizione italiana si possono gustare piatti gustosi della tradizione contaminati da rielaborazioni moderne, oppure gustose pizze con verdure e frutti prettamente di stagione. Il personale è professionale e il padrone di casa è capace di metterti a tuo agio. Obbligatoria è la prenotazione poiché essendo un must veneziano non è facile trovare tavoli liberi.
reviews.title: Degno di un set cinematografico. Per chi desidera una  Venezia al quadrato!

reviews.text: For all the diversity of it's menu, good selection of seafood and self-promotion, their approach to customer service is a bit of a 'let down'. Waiting staff are characterless and robotic. There is a tendency to cram customers together at tables within close proximity of one another -- allowing private conversations to be easily overheard between adjoining tables. I was thus 'squeezed in', while large areas of the canal-side dining space remained unoccupied with empty tables. Obviously, this suits the convenience of waiting staff when fetching things from the kitchen to the seated diners. But do Il Refolo management see how this ultimately is bad business practice? Obviously not. Did I really have to endure a wife berating her husband at the next table, with every detail of their dysfunctional family life? Besides which, the pizza was decidedly mediocre. Perhaps a 'one-off' occasion, uncharacteristic of this eatery? Perhaps. Should I go again ... just to make sure it's not really all that bad? Yes, I would have, if only the prices weren't so high.
reviews.title: Less than Meets the Eye

reviews.text: Situé dans un quartier très calme qui mérite d'être mieux connu. La cuisine est originale. Le service plus que parfait. Les prix corrects.
reviews.title: Service parfait.

name: Bar- Pizzeria-Trattoria ai bari
address: S.Croce , 1175, 30135 Venice Italy

reviews.text:
Restaurant qui ne paie pas de mine, mais patron et cuisinier très sympathiques !
Pasta très bonnes (aglio oilo e peperoncino) et moitié prix en comparaison des restaurants dans les zones plus touristiques et mention spéciale pour le tiramisu <3
Pasta + eau + tiramisu = 16€, définitivement un prix correct !
Je recommande !
reviews.title: Bonnes pasta et tiramisu a tomber !

reviews.text:
Very bad service and dirty as well. 

If you don't buy what they want, they get upset, opposite is a much more helpful and friendly place
reviews.title: Very bad service and dirty

reviews.text: We were really hungry and saw this place on TA.  It was busy outside with locals but we were the only folks inside. My wife ordered a Baccallla or similar with Polenta and I ordered carbonara. Judging by reviews here should have ordered pizza. Hers was a chopped fish mayonnaise and mine was a spaghetti scrambled egg. to be honest the spaghetti was a little more cooked than I like it. The wine was ok and the owner in the chefs whites seemed friendly enough. Not spaghetti like momma used to make but hey ho.
reviews.title: Average quality but 30€ for 2.

reviews.text: Abbiamo cenato all' esterno, pizza e birra nella norma,buona posizione non lontano dalla stazione in quartiere tipico veneziano con la piazzetta..
reviews.title: Buona pizza, prezzo onesto.

reviews.text: Quasi come in famiglia, posto carino, personale disponibile ma soprattutto ottimo cibo, fantastici cicchetti con le sarde e baccalà mantecato
reviews.title: Che bella scoperta

reviews.text: Super vriendelijke personeel en lekker veel pizza keuze.Prijs is goed, smaak is goed.Lekkere wijn.Locatie dicht bij trein station.Heel tevreden.Cok memnun kaldim.
reviews.title: Super vriendelijke personeel

reviews.text: We stopped by chance for a quick breakfast, the coffee is so good we went back the next day too! The guys are friendly and efficient - complimenti! the evening we enjoyed the cicchetti and Aperol Spritz and prosecco - it's all good!
reviews.title: Great place for breakfast or apèro!

reviews.text: As pizzas são das melhores que já comi em Itália ou na Europa. Levei para comer em casa mesmo ao pé e adorámos, durantes 4 dias. Preços bons.
reviews.title: Excelentes pizzas a bons preços

reviews.text: Buon ristorante non lontano dalla stazione. Ottimi gli spaghetti al nero di seppia e il fegato alla veneziana. Personale molto gentile
reviews.title: Bella scoperta

reviews.text:
Top Restaurant! Ambiente zweckmäßig, Service und Essen hervorragend. Würde jetzt nicht für ein Date herkommen, aber ansonsten super.
Selbstgemachte Tagliatelle mit Trüffel für unschlagbare 10€! Qualität der Speisen 10Sterne! 
Leider waren wir zu gierig und ich habe keine Fotos vom Essen gemacht.
reviews.title: Top Restaurant!

reviews.text: Tooop il caffè ottimo! Con lo zucchero, buonissimo! Toooop!! Bomba questo caffè, su un piattino in ceramica.
reviews.title: Caffè da panico

reviews.text: Sono stata in questo ristorante con mio marito e mio figlio di 8 anni. Ci siamo capitati per caso e siamo rimasti molto bene impressionati. Un posto tranquillo, cucina genuina, pizze molto buone semplici basse e delle tagliatelle al tartufo fatte in casa molto molto buone. Buon prezzo e buona qualità. Da tornare.
reviews.title: Buono anzi di più, semplice e genuino

reviews.text: Прекрасно провели время за приятной трапезой. Паста 4 сыра, капрезе, пршутто,паста  карбонара и  пиццы. Десерты, домашнее вино. Все просто великолепно! Недорого и вкусно.
reviews.title: Прекрасный домашний ресторан

reviews.text: The place is really nice with delicious pizza and helpful staff. I recommend this place but do not expect anything fancy.
reviews.title: Authentic pizzeria

reviews.text:
Если вы ищете красивый итальянский ресторан с белыми скатертями,то проходите мимо. Если вы ищете САМУЮ вкусную пиццу на этой планете,то идите именно сюда!
Простейший и неприметный интерьер,демократичные цены, много позиций в меню,но вкус этой пиццы вы не забудете никогда!Мы зашли туда,потому что увидели в нем местных,и это первый признак,что еда вкусная.
reviews.title: Если вы ищете красивый итальянский

reviews.text: Ottima qualita' provare filetto al pepe verde e agnello con polenta prezzo più che onesto location semplice ma accogliente servizio eccellente
reviews.title: Turismo

reviews.text: Eccellente, si mangia bene, senza essere spennati. Quando vengo a Venezia cerco sempre posti così, è questo è al top. Mi hanno fatto le tagliatelle al momento!
reviews.title: Venezia senza (inutili) fronzoli

reviews.text:
Ça faisait longtemps que je voulais tester cette trattoria-pizzeria qui par sa simplicité me faisait de l’œil. Et oui j’aime le charme de la simplicité. J’en attendais beaucoup, comme d’une veille péripatéticienne qui vous promet
une super gâterie...A la fin, c’était agréable mais pas transcendant, le service est amateur mais touchant, la cuisine faite par une grand mère qui commence un peu à fatiguer (c’est une image). Le prix est raisonnable. Le rapport qualité-prix est ok.
J’aurai pu mettre 4. Je mets 3.
reviews.title: Ça faisait longtemps que je

reviews.text: The food was ok and cheap, the people were very nice and attentive to our needs. The wine was also pretty good. The chef, at the end, came to our table and greeted us which also made the experience even better. They charge 1.5€ per person just for sitting (it is called coperto if I am not mistaken). Good overall experience.
reviews.title: Ok food and good attendance

reviews.text: We were headed to a place down the street for dinner which was closed so we stopped in here. So glad we did! It’s a small quaint shop where the owner makes the pizzas like he has been for 30 years. The brick oven pizza is the BEST. Give it a try next time you’re in Venice.
reviews.title: Brick oven pizza at its finest!

reviews.text: Abbiamo consumato ottimi ravioli di zucca al burro e salvia, delle buonissime tagliatelle fatte a mano alle vongole e cozze e una pizza margherita. Prezzi contenuti e personale molto gentile
reviews.title: Piatti gustosi e gentilezza

reviews.text:
We came looking for another restaurant which was full and stumbled on this little gem instead. Lots of Italians using the restaurant and we soon found out why. It was rustic and down to earth, the food was terrific we had lasagne calzone fries and tiramisu all amazingly tasty. All the food was cooked fresh while we were there and you could watch the chef cook.
Service was fab and freindly as well.
The chef was the owner and was very helpful. 
Would definitely recommend this little gem.
reviews.title: Fab traditional Italian pizzaria

reviews.text: The food here is amazing! Great prices and very good authentic food. The pizza and pasta is among the best we had in the country, and we ate all over Italy. We went back a second time when we were in the area because the food was so good. Service was slow, but worth the wait. Great prices as well.
reviews.title: Fantastic Food!!

reviews.text: I ve been here today and asked for a no foam latte and a brioche. Well the brioche was made days ago and the latte was half cup and full of foam.  I just left everything there... Don t stop here. That s my advice
reviews.title: Worst bar ever
