Famous Cipriani beef carpaccio here was presliced at least day before already oxidized and started to look very unappetizing and my favorite dressing( which I can’t still replicate at home) this time looked and tasted like store bought mayonnaise. Some Italian chefs achieve a very fine result by not adding butter at all in their risotto dishes but in CIPS porcini mushrooms were drowning in the Venice’s butter lagoon desperately trying to stay afloat by grabbing to the grains of rice ... for another 50 euros or so. What saved the dinner ( besides our lovely conversation) is a global Cipriani staple and my personal favorite dessert- meringue cake! To summarize the experience: One of most romantic setting in the world, money to burn and an opportunity not to gain weight after dinner in Italy!
reviews.title: I am very surprised((((

reviews.text: Siamo tornati e abbiamo ritrovato la stessa qualità della volta scorsa. Vista meravigliosa,  personale preparato,  cibo ottimo. Consigliatissimo per chi vuole qualità unita alla tradizione. Location unica.
reviews.title: Ritorno meraviglioso

reviews.text:
We enjoyed the trip across to the Cipriano as we had done on a previous visit. Te staff were very welcoming on our arrival and showed us the way to Cip's Club for our previously booked lunch. 
we enjoyed the walk through the beautiful grounds to our table with views to St Mark's Square.
The food was beautifully served and cooked.
We walked rounds to the swimming Pool after our meal but since we weren't residents couldn't have the luxury of a swim there.
reviews.title: Anniversary meal at the Cipriano

reviews.text: Excellent service from the moment we were picked up by boat at St Marks and taken over to the Cipriani hotel. The restaurant was on the edge of the complex with views over to Venice. Plenty sea food on the menu which was delicious. It was expensive but worth it for a special meal.
reviews.title: Anniversary Meal

reviews.text:
A very special location with magnificent views of San Marco. We enjoyed an outdoor waterside table with a view of the Venice night skyline. Our meal and drinks were truly delicious to match. Everything we had was just perfect.
 We appreciated the complimentary boat launch which transports you from San Marco Piazza to the Belmond property in Giudecca, about 10-15 minute ride.
I wish we had known to bring Mosquito repellent as we were bitten up while dining at dusk. And the evening we were there it was almost 100 degrees F. We were melting. They do have some cooling fans, but it didn't do enough to cool us off, certainly not their fault, it was just the heat wave in late June! We would recommend and return when in Venice again!
reviews.title: Fabulous and special meal at a gorgeous location in Giudecca with views of San Marco

reviews.text: Consigliatoci da un’amica, decidiamo di prenotare. All’atto della prenotazione, constatiamo immediatamente la cordialità e la disponibilità del personale, stesso trattamento anche durante la cena, quando ci pareva che ogni nostro desiderio potesse essere esaudito. Pietanze eccellenti e vista sulla laguna mozzafiato. Da provare.
reviews.title: Semplicemente fantastico

reviews.text:
Un dîner parfait, en amoureux, sur un des plus beaux pontons de Venise, au calme de la Giudecca...
Personnel très attentionné, service impeccable (normal dans un endroit de ce standing, mais ça mérite d'être dit).
Carte des vins assez démentielle, avec bien sur, de quoi se faire mal niveau prix (voire très très mal...), mais grâce aux conseils d'une sommelière aussi efficace que sympathique, nous avons pu trouver notre bonheur avec un très bon vin italien, aux alentours de 150€ la bouteille.
Les plats étaient succulents, simples (car la cuisine italienne n'est bonne que quand elle est simple), mais parfaitement conçus et exécutés.
Bref, soirée d'un excellent niveau, rien à redire. A faire et à refaire.
reviews.title: La perfection a un prix, certes, mais c'est la perfection...

reviews.text:
La vue exceptionnelle qu’a ce restaurant sur Venise, en particulier le soir au coucher de soleil, fait que nous considérons d’y dîner à chaque passage  à Venise comme un must indispensable.
Par rapport à notre précédent passage, la cuisine certes très classique, la carte restant à peu près la même d’année, était bonne et même en progrès. L’addition est cependant en comparaison très chère. On aimerait donc un léger plus voire un peu de créativité ou d’orgina sur certains plats.
L’endroit reste magique et à préserver avec un dress code un peu plus strict, en demandant par exemple  de ne pas venir dîner en bermuda.
reviews.title: La plus belle vue sur Venise

reviews.text: Waterside table with a view of the Venice night skyline was amazing, as was the food. Portions were perfect, we did not feel overwhelmed by the food. Excellent wine list, very helpful sommelier. Mosquito repellant important for dining around time of sunset.
reviews.title: Beautiful view, excellent food

reviews.text: The staff at Cip’s Club couldn’t have been more helpful and welcoming. In particular they did a brilliant job dealing with a difficult food allergy, treating it as easy to accommodate. The service was really excellent, as was the food. Highly recommend the green spaghetti and ham which was far better than it sounds. The sunset view was unparalleled and the boat trip across the canal was an added bonus too. Definitely an occasion meal for us but easily worth it.
reviews.title: Excellent dinner, perfect service and amazing view

reviews.text: This could be your splurge restaurant in Venice for the view, the food and the service.  It is situated at the Cipriani hotel and most tables on a pier over the water.  The outdoor location has heaters and the views are spectacular.  All this does some at a price . . .
reviews.title: A beautiful view of Venice from Giudecca, wonderful food and service . . . for a price

reviews.text: We were lucky to get the perfect night - still over 20 degrees at 8.30pm when we arrived - and for sure Cip’s Club must have the best views of any restaurant in Venice, looking back over San Marco from Giudecca.  We had impeccable service, very friendly and professional, the food was faultless and the Sommelier was really brilliant, anticipating everything that we needed.  It’s not cheap being part of the Belmont Cipriani, but absolutely worth it from our perspective.  We would have gone back the following night if we didn’t already have a reservation somewhere else.  We loved it!!
reviews.title: Expensive, but worth it

reviews.text: We were really thrilled to be taking the private launch over from St Marks for a lovely lunch on the deck over the water, with view of Venice at its best.  Unfortunately, we were out of luck.  We got fairly wet walking through the gardens in a torrent of rain, sat inside with no view to speak of (except other guests) and had a pleasant luncheon.  Bit disappointed really.  Food fine, wine fine.  Expensive.
reviews.title: Horrible wet day - had to eat inside, so this probably did not help

reviews.text:
we surprised the girls as we arrived at the Cipriano launch jetty, sadly decent shoes in plastic bags as the weather was not so pleasant. Arrived safely and headed directly to the bar after a shoe change! the girls had Bellini cocktails and the boys the usual dry martini cocktail, so good we ordered a further round, hang the expense.
The Cip restaurant did not disappoint I shared a whole poached Turbot I won't go on about the other choices except to say all was excellent and what a cheerful team of waters bar and restaurant lovely evening.
reviews.title: with friends recap old times

reviews.text:
Venezia è Venezia, si sa, e avere la possibilità di pranzare godendosi un panorama unico al mondo davvero non ha prezzo.
Menù semplice ma di assoluta raffinatezza, con un occhio di riguardo alla tradizione del territorio e alla scelta accurata delle materie prime.
Servizio ineccepibile e gran cura dei dettagli.
Complimenti a tutto lo staff!
reviews.title: Meraviglia

reviews.text: My husband surprised me with lunch at Cip’s to celebrate our 25th Wedding Anniversary.  After the hustle & bustle of St Marks Square, Cip’s was a beautiful oasis of calm and we enjoyed a fabulous lunch by the waterside in the beautiful afternoon sun.  We were treated with a complimentary boat ride back across the water afterwards.  Service and good were wonderful.
reviews.title: What a treat!

reviews.text: though we weren't staying at this hotel, we decided to have dinner here and glad we did. the meals were excellent and service were top notch. this is a pricey place, but what would you expect being at a cipriani location...will be back to eat and stay next year
reviews.title: love this restaurant and view

reviews.text: By escaping from the crowds of St Marks the elegant shuttle boat glides you across the lagoon to the peaceful oasis of the Cipriani.  On the waterfront facing the principle sights of Venice, you can not only relax at Cips Club but also indulge in a lavish and imaginative meal.  The service is impeccable and the food is both beautifully presented and also delicious.  It is suitable for either a special occasion or just to spoil yourselves.
reviews.title: One of the best views of Venice

reviews.text: Cips is one of the restaurants at Cipriani, as short boat ride from the Marcus square.  The hotel has its own shuttle that will pick you up.  Very classical Italian, and you will find most of what you expect on the menu.  Great food, good wine selection and a beautiful view from the south bank of the Grand Canal.
reviews.title: Great Traditional in Venice

reviews.text: Can’t fault this place. The setting. The food. The service. All top notch. Special place. Not cheap but it’s worth it for something special. Pasta was delicious. Beef was good. Seafood fried scampi and calamari were the best I’ve ever had. So fresh. A perfect night. One to remember and treasure.
reviews.title: Perfect night and setting

reviews.text:
La cucina del Cip’s spesso passa in secondo piano, il frequentatore medio spesso è lì per godersi il tragitto in barca per arrivare all’hotel Cipriani, passeggiare in un bellissimo giardino interno, sbucare da un piccolo portico e vedere Venezia dalla Giudecca. Spiccano la punta della dogana e palazzo ducale, con il campanile di piazza San Marco che non manca mai. 
In precedenza siamo sempre stati sulla terrazza, questa volta date le temperature siamo stati all’interno, la sala è molto accogliete. 
Stare seduti ai loro tavoli da l’idea di essere a casa, al caldo, e mangiare qual piatto che sa quasi di infanzia. Infatti i piatti sono semplici pur rimanendo eleganti. È uno dei pochi ristoranti di alto livello in cui si mangia in maniera eccelsa piatti tradizionali cucinati con materie prime di altrettanto livello. 
Il tutto è accompagnato da un personale cordiale senza essere stucchevole. Il metre molto attento e capace. La sommelier ha una conoscenza impeccabile e una capacità di spiegare i vini attenta e chiara, personalmente mi ha colpito positivamente la sua passione e precisone con cui ci sei è posta. I camerieri molto cordiali, attenti e pacati. 
Consiglio vivamente il Cip’s a tutti gli amanti della cucina sofisticata, giusto per fare un passetto in dietro e vedere da dove è partito il tutto, perché si sa, tornare a casa a magiare ciò che mangiavi da piccolo non ha prezzo.
reviews.title: Semplice ed elegante

reviews.text: What a wonderful restaurant. We arrived by boat as we were staying in Santa Croce. We had drinks in the bar first then walked to the restaurant. The view of St Marks square and the Grand Canal were amazing. The staff were so friendly and knowledgeable. We had a fantastic meal and could not recommend this restaurant enough, thank you.
reviews.title: Venice

reviews.text: Easy tender across from San Marco. Stunning waterside views. Great wine list with a helpful sommelier. Went for light starters (artichoke/white asparagus). Both were in season and fresh. And then the monkfish (cooked perfectly) and the local liver/onion speciality which was rich but delicious. Great and attentive service. Would definitely return.
reviews.title: Great dinner with stunning views

reviews.text:
Sitting inside as it was rainy, the cosy little restaurant offers great views (even through the rain) and high quality food. 
Looking forward to returning at great weather.
reviews.title: Great lunch with a view

reviews.text: What a view! What a place! Go to the Cipriani phone booth on the St Mark's side and dial 9. A beautiful wooden launch will pick you up and whisk you over the lagoon to lunch on the terrace at the Cipriani. The view back to Venice and St Marks is stunning. Nobody does it better. Try their original Cipriani beef carpaccio or the pasta with cheese and ham. Everything is out of this world. The female sommelier is charming and funny. The staff are exceptional. After lunch go into the hotel and have a cafe by the pool and then slowly take the beautiful wooden boat back to town. Really special.
reviews.title: Just glorious

reviews.text: Arrivati al ristorante subito ci si rende conto del quadro che ci circonda, una vista su piazza San Marco notevole. Menù interessante, piatti ben bilanciati e personale simpatico hanno fatto si di farci trascorrere una splendida pausa pranzo
reviews.title: Splendida vista

name: Barcollo Oscar
address: Sestiere Santa Croce 191/C, 30135 Venice Italy

reviews.text: Il bar è gestito da cinesi e offre vari tipi di colazione, sia continentale che all'americana/inglese con un ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo. Io ho preso il primo tipo (cappuccino, cornetto e spremuta d'arancia) e devo dire che era tutto molto buono, compreso il cappuccino sorprendentemente! Il mio ragazzo l'opzione con cappuccino, toasts e spremuta d'arancia, dove i toasts erano davvero generosi. Consigliato!
reviews.title: Vari menù di colazione, ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo!

reviews.text:
Non è facile bere un buon caffè a Venezia.
Ci siamo fermati per una colazione in questo bar gestito da cinesi.
Lo ammetto eravamo un pò prevenuti.
Invece il caffè molto buono, i croissant nella norma , spremuta fresca e gentilezza.
Conto 5.50€ per una colazione caffe, spremuta e croissant, che per essere a Venezia è già un piccolo miracolo
reviews.title: un caffè decente a Venezia

reviews.text: We stopped here for an evening cocktail and truly enjoyed ourselves! Greeted by a lovely young lady who checked on us throughout our time as well as showing interest in our trip to Venice and giving tips! Tasty cocktails at a really reasonable price, complementary crisps and no service charge!
reviews.title: Lovely cocktails

reviews.text: Cadre agréable, service sympathique et rapide. Le rapport qualité prix est excellent, il y a du choix et tout était délicieux.
reviews.title: Bon petit déjeuner

reviews.text: Caffè accanto alla IUAV, gestito da ragazzi molto educati e gentili! Caffè buono e non bruciato : una rarità. Venite per una colazione o un aperitivo, non rimarrete delusi!
reviews.title: Caffè accanto alla IUAV

reviews.text: We stopped in for a quick mid-afternoon snack (late lunch) and were able to get some simple but tasty food. Service was a little slow, but the price was good. We ate inside due to the heat outside.
reviews.title: Fun place for a quick afternoon snack

reviews.text: Nice breakfast🥰 早餐可选填的咸的 有很多选项 咖啡浓郁香 室外座位是个小广场 在遮阳伞下微风拂过吃着早餐非常舒适 建议值5颗星哈
reviews.title: 服务很棒！

reviews.text: Piccolo bar vicino a piazzale roma, ottimi prezzi, molto bassi. Personale disponibile e sempre presente. Ottimo per colazione/aperitivo!
reviews.title: Piccolo bar vicino a piazzale

reviews.text:
Please save yourself the trouble and just AVOID this restaurant. We went here because it was right across from our hotel and we were starving. We were so hungry and figured we would eat anything -we were wrong. First, the olive oil that is on the table is not authentic. It is no better than vegetable oil in a spray can (actually is in a spritzer bottle...). The gnocchi was a poor excuse for a microwave dinner. It tastes of plastic. I had two pieces and could not go any further. My poor husband was subdued to the eggplant parmigiana- unbeknownst to him, it was the worst culinary mistake every created on this earth. 

Flat in texture, tasteless, and a downright insult to the Italian cuisine. We ended up paying without eating more than a few bites and going back to our hotel to order room service. 

The Olive Garden (a cheap, tasteless US chain restaurant) is more a culinary work of Art compared to this place.
reviews.title: The Olive Garden in US is better.

reviews.text: While getting lost in venice during Aqua Alta, we ran into barcollo, and wow. The service was great, and the food was better. Very happy with this choice
reviews.title: Pleasant surprise

reviews.text: We were waiting to get into our hotel which wasn't ready until 3pm, and we were tired from our long flight from Ontario, Canada. We wanted coffee and hot chocolate. We came across bArCollo and this is where we sat. The service was great, the cappuccino well took some getting used to as did my husbands hot chocolate. We left there and wandered around, then it was beer time..again we ended up here. Had beers and bruschetta bread which was very very tasty. I would definitely recommend going here, the staff are friendly. We went to go back a day later and all was closed up. The table were gone and chairs piled up against the building. I hope they have not closed was a great little place.
reviews.title: Our First Stop

reviews.text: This restaurant was just around the corner from our hotel so it was very convenient for breakfast every morning.  Our server was very helpful.  My daughter had the fruit plate every day, my son liked the ham and cheese sandwich with the hot chocolate and I enjoyed the muffin.  It is a little pricey but everything in Venice is expensive.
reviews.title: Great breakfast

reviews.text: すぐ近くのCa' dei Poloという小さなホテルに泊まっていたので朝食はここで食べました。モーニングセットがあります。中国系のウエートレスのお姉さんがとても親切で居心地が良かったです。味は普通です。
reviews.title: モーニングセット

reviews.text: We asked out hotel manager to recommend a place for dinner. We stated we wanted to go where locals would eat and away from most of the tourists. We expected the food would be good but did not expect it to be at the high level it was seeing that the prices were so reasonable. We had several starters, all were exceptional, the melon and prosciutto were especially delicious. One of the best melons I have had in years.The entrees were also very generous in size with flavor to match. We had lasagna, mushroom risotto, mushroom pasta, and a fish dish that was also outstanding. The staff was very attentive and friendly making suggestions when asked. I were seated outside and thoroughly enjoyed watching the coming and going of the neighborhood. Great find and highly recommended. To give you an idea of price, we were a party of nine and our meal, including an alcoholic drink each was 149 euro..now that is reasonable.
reviews.title: A pleasant surprise

reviews.text: Hurtig lækker frokost til fair pris med familie og venner. Vi fik et bord i skyggen. Venlig betjening
reviews.title: Fin frokost

reviews.text: a 2 pas de notre hôtel... idéal pour le petit déjeuner... accueil très sympathique et au service du client. les prix sont très raisonnables... à mémoriser
reviews.title: très bon petit déjeuner

reviews.text: Found this restaurant slightly off the beaten track, which looked nice, so decided to eat there. Although the food was nicely cooked and served, the portions were on the small side which left me still feeling hungry after 3 courses. The location was very nice, and the staff were all attentive.
reviews.title: Small portions

reviews.text:
Petit restaurant hors de la zone touristique et proche de la gare. Nous avons pris une pizza très bonne et des pâtes bolognaises communes. L'ambiance n'était pas folle et les serveurs sont beaucoup trop présents. Comme la majorité des restaurants à Venise, les serveurs nous interpellent dès qu'on tourne la tête vers leur établissement. 
Néanmoins, le prix est abordable sans mauvaise surprise.
reviews.title: Bon mais sans plus

reviews.text: Sehr lecker, sehr preisgünstig, sehr nett.  Arbeitet schon ab 5 Uhr morgens.  Caffe authentisch Italienisch.
reviews.title: Sehr gute Cafe

reviews.text:
Petit restaurant sympathique, loin de la foule touristique. 
Si vous voulez manger vite et bon arrêtez vous ici. 
Pas cher, certains produits congelés mais précisé sur le menu donc pas surpris. 
Si vous cherchez de la qualité continuez votre route pour un vrai restaurant italien. 
Personnel sympa et accueillant et restaurant joli.
reviews.title: Bon

reviews.text:
We were not expecting much because of the atmosphere at the restaurant, to say the least it was very empty, however, this could be due to the time of year we went and we ate quite late. The food was delicious, I had the seafood risotto and gnocchi and my partner had pizza and tapas. The best thing about this restaurant was the pricing. Considering Venice is an expensive city, this place was wonderfully priced. €43  for 2 drinks (soft drinks) , 2 starters and 2 mains. This place also did not charge extortionate service charges, as previous places we had been charged us €8 for the service for similar dishes yet with worse food. It was just great to finally not be caught out by venice’s prices, and we tipped the waiters because we wanted to.

I do 100% recommend this place if you want a nice dinner with good food but not for fine dining. The waiters were quick to serve (perhaps as we were the only ones in there) and were very good. The only missing thing was the right ambeance. Hope this helps.
reviews.title: Good for a decent meal that’s not too pricey!

reviews.text:
Situato in una piazzetta piacevole e ben allestito sia all’interno che all’esterno ci ha attirato, anche per la gentilezza della cameriera. Aperitivo nella norma, ma niente di più, per comodità decidiamo di fermarci anche per la cena: baccalà buono, sarde in saor nulla di che e senza uvette e pinoli.
Spaghetti al nero di seppia scotti e assolutamente insapori,li ho cosparsi di pepe, sale e olio. Il servizio pessimo, non per cattiva volontà, ma per la disorganizzazione unità alla poca comprensione dell’italiano, ma anche delle altre lingue vedendo lo scontento negli altri tavoli. Al cambio di portata non arrivano le posate, così le prendiamo dal tavolo accanto, chiediamo la carta e ci portano il conto......, si cena con il rumore dichi al bancone risciacqua i piatti,e si sentono le discussioni del cameriere poco garbato con la cameriera che non fa altro che ubbidire agli ordini, ma tra loro non si capiscono in quanto di due nazionalità differenti..... insomma  da non tornare anche se il prezzo è corretto.
reviews.title: Improbabile

reviews.text:
Después de varios días en Venecia y tras dar nuestro paseo en Góndola, por cierto se lo sacamos en 60€, le preguntamos un lugar donde tomar copas en Venecia a un precio decente, ya que como tod@s nos damos cuenta al llegar una cerveza cuesta 6€, y aquí por el mismo precio te tomas un cubata y sales más colocad@.

Fuimos por la noche y estaba lleno de personas de toda edad, es pequeño pero acogedor.

Una de las camareras hablaba español y estuvimos buen tiempo hablando con ella respecto a Venecia.

Por cierto preguntar por el precio antes, porque al principio nos cobraron 6€ y al cambio de camarero nos quería cobrar 10€ por ser extranjero.
reviews.title: Copas a 6€ en Venecia

name: Nuova Valigia
address: Calle dei Fabbri, Venice Italy

reviews.text:
Good food
Friendly staff
Good Muchroom tortellini
Good Fegato alla Venetia
Good Lemon sorbet
Recomendable 
👌🏻👌🏻👌🏻
reviews.title:
Good food
Friendly staff
Good

reviews.text:
Dieses Restaurant ist sehr zu empfehlen. Man sitzt sehr schön draußen in einer ruhigen Seitengasse. Die Tische sind schön gedeckt. Es gibt ein Angebot für ein Menü und die Speisekarte ist sehr vielfältig. Das Essen ist super lecker und sehr schön angerichtet. Die Portionen sind  groß und nicht vergessen einen Nachtisch zu bestellen! Wir haben sogar zum Ende noch einen Limoncello und Kekse aufs Haus bekommen. Sehr guter Service vor allem von Rafi (: 
Sehr zum Empfehlen ist das Tiramisu!
reviews.title: Sehr weiter zu Empfehlen!

reviews.text: really good taste，we just felt we have diner at home. the food is very delicious and fresh. You won't regret choosing this restaurant . we odered a special appetizer which included all traditional Venice food.( first pic right up , particularly recommend）fishsoup also very good and fresh. we have a very nice night. and wish to come back next year.
reviews.title: have a nice dinner here

reviews.text: Rigtig lækker mad og rigtig god betjening med god service, der manglede ingenting! Bedste carbonara vi har fået længe ☺️
reviews.title: Virkelig lækker mad

reviews.text: Siamo stati in questo ristorante il 13 settembre 2020. Dopo 5 giorni a Venezia devo dire di aver trovato un ristorante veramente degno dei soldi spesi.. ho fatto i complimenti allo chef e allo staff che serviva in sala.. porzioni di altissima qualità e veramente abbondanti.. i camerieri di una gentilezza unica.. consiglio a tutti il Ristorante Nuova Valigia.. complimenti a tutto lo staff
reviews.title: Siamo stati in questo ristorante

reviews.text: Nella calle tra San Marco e Rialto questo ristorante - pizzeria offre, oltre alle pizze, sia un menù di carne che di pesce. Nei 4 giorni del nostro soggiorno a Venezia abbiamo apprezzato la cordialità e la professionalità di Rocky e di tutti i suoi colleghi. Abbiamo gustato ottimi spaghetti alle vongole, tonno fresco alla piastra e come sugo delle tagliatelle insieme a pomodorini e olive. L'entrecote con patatine fritte è una validissima alternativa ai piatti di pesce. Vi sono anche menù a prezzo fisso. Il rapporto qualità prezzo è molto concorrenziale rispetto alla zona.
reviews.title: Da provare

reviews.text:
Sehr freundliches Personal, das uns auch eine wirklich tolle Weinempfehlung gegeben hat - dazu gab es sensationelle Bruschette und sehr leckere Hauptspeisen. 

Erstaunlich gute Qualität - und das inmitten des touristischen Epizentrums. Eine echte Empfehlung, auch preislich völlig in Ordnung.

Fazit: Hier ist man in kulinarisch guten Händen.
reviews.title: Absolute Empfehlung!

reviews.text:
This is a superb Ristorante Pizzeria just a few minutes from Piazza San Marco and has a great outside seating area. We stopped for a quick lunch re-fuel and Pizza and were astonished at the quality of the meal and service. We stayed for 3 hours until the sun came round and removed the shade and persuaded us to move on.

The Pizzas were superbly light, as was the home made bread, and the Mussels/Clams were a delight. Very good vegetarian options as well and with quality wine it was just a gem of a find.

The staff were excellent and were just delighted we were there. Normally 8 waiters but just 3 due to CV-19. We wished them well as they deserve to be successful.
reviews.title: Best Pizza we have ever tasted!!!

reviews.text:
Vegetarian friendly and at a much more affordable price compared to surrounding restaurants. Lovely outside area to eat in.
Accompanied with bread, olive oil/balsamic vinegar to start, which was a good touch. Also had no service charge, however a tip was well deserved as our server was lovely and welcoming, could not fault.
We are both pasta lovers and the aglio olio was one of the best I've tasted!! Would recommend to others.
reviews.title: One of the best pasta dishes!

reviews.text: In posizione centrale, non lontano dal Ponte di Rialto nè da Piazza San Marco. Provato per cena di lavoro, ci siamo trovati bene anche col menù fisso (uno di carne, l'altro commensale lo ha provato di pesce). Personale gentile, ambiente ordinato nonostante fosse abbastanza affollato. Buon rapporto qualità prezzo.
reviews.title: Superiore alle aspettative

reviews.text: We have been to Venice for the first time and stayws for 4 nights. The Restaurant was next door to our acommodation. We visited the Restaurant every night and were always made very welcome. We were also there on our last night were we just had some drinks. The food was very good. Especially the pizza!! The Service extremely friendly. We can recommend it without any restrictions.
reviews.title: Enjoyable

reviews.text:
Обедали в этом ресторанчике в ходе экскурсионной программы по Италии. 
Близко в центральной площади, что очень важно. Нагулялись по красавице карнавальной Венеции, а тут раз , и горяченькое )
Всё вкусно! Наш гид делала предзаказ, поэтому обслужили быстро.
Супчик Минестроне очень хорош! На второе я выбрала Лазанью. Ну для меня жирновата. Ну это на любителя... Мужчины были довольны. 
А уж какое кофе вкусное!
Спасибо
reviews.title: Вкусно и близко к центру

reviews.text: Ristorante a km zero rispetto al nostro hotel a due passi da piazza San Marco; personale gentile e professionale; pulizia ed ambiente più che confortevole; ottima cucina ad un prezzo onesto.
reviews.title: In viaggio per il carnevale.

reviews.text: We went in as a family and were not disappointed. For us, the location was ideal and the atmosphere was serene. We tend to all order different things when in Italy, so as we can all try each others dishes. At this visit, the table had ordered a antipasto starter consisting of assorted meats and cheeses. It was delicious! As was the fried seafood appetizer. All the fish/shellfish were fresh and wonderfully presented! I recommend! Along with assorted pasta and a scallopini veal dish (which was for me...the highlight)! We drank several bottles of wine and finished with lemoncello! The staff was helpful, professional, friendly, and welcoming. You will not be disappointed with this experience!
reviews.title: Delicious food and very attentive staff!

reviews.text:
Nos dejamos engañar por su menús de carne y pescado a 16,50 y 19,50€. Lo que no nos dijo el camarero es que nos iban a cobrar más por el vino que por la comida en sí. 
Pagamos 84€ por cenar, de los cuales 48€ fueron vino y un café al módico precio de 7€. 

La comida estaba buena, aunque al plato de calamares le faltaban unas patatas para acompañar. Las raciones son de un buen tamaño y no te quedas con hambre. 

Si no quieres que te saquen un riñón en la factura pide agua y disfruta la comida.
reviews.title: Una vez y no más

reviews.text: Great service, the food was delicious, the portions were large and the price was really affordable. The inside of the restaurant was elegant and comfortable too and they even offered biscuits and an digestive at the end. It really exceeded our expectations!
reviews.title: Great service, tasty food and quite affordable!

reviews.text: Si trova a 5 minuti a piedi da Piazza San Marco  , abbiamo mangiato la Pizza e onestamente non era cattiva mentre il Tortino di mele preso come Dessert era buonissimo , prezzi onesti
reviews.title: Buon Ristorante

reviews.text:
Our group ordered the Spaghetti alla Carbonara, Salomini Pizza and Spaghetti Bolognese. The Bolognese and Pizza were good but the Carbonara was way to salty. I'm not usually one to turn away food but after 2 mouthfuls I knew I couldn't eat it all. 
I called the waiter over and he asked if I wanted a replacement meal. I decided not to as we had a Pizza which I could share.
When the bill came, I was still charged full price for the Carbonara. When queried, the waiter said that the food was not salty and that I should've told him I didn't want salt in it before they cooked it. He got rude quickly, snatched the bill from my hand and said dont worry about it. When he returned he said I had to pay half as I had eaten half of it (which I had barely touched it).
Disappointed by the service here. Wouldn't recommend.
reviews.title: Super salty Carbonara!

reviews.text:
Visited during the start of Carnivale which I believe is the start of the new season for a lot of places. Very welcoming, excellent service. Attentive and informative without being over the top.
Good prices for food and wine and the dishes that my wife and I had were both great. I had the cuttlefish and ink spaghetti and my wife chose one of her favourites, the spaghetti Vongole which she highly rated.
Nice bottle of wine to wash it down with.
reviews.title: Spaghetti excellence

reviews.text:
정보는 없이 들어간 곳이었는데, 기대 이상으로 맛이 좋았어요
해산물 튀김이 베니스 특산요리라는데 간도 짭짤하니 좋았고 양도 많았습니다
분위기가 넘 고급지고 조용하니 로맨틱했어요
서비스 훌륭했구요
만족합니다
reviews.title: 해산물 튀김 맛있고 분위기 좋아요

reviews.text:
C'est bien la première fois qu'on badigeonne une Calzone avec de la sauce tomate. Pourquoi pas. Cela devient beaucoup plus clair lorsque l'on gratte un peu, et que le dessus de la pâte s'avère complètement cramée.
Dommage parce que la pâte est très bonne mais les ingrédients, de mauvaise qualité, rendent l'ensemble décevant...
Un attrape touriste de plus. 
Mais avec un accueil au dessus de la moyenne.
reviews.title: TOMATE CACHE MISÈRE

reviews.text:
ristorante sotto l’albergo bella zona attaccato a piazza San Marco 
Posto tranquillo ,ottimo cibo e il prezzo giusto.
reviews.title: Molto buono

reviews.text: Местная кухня! Очень вкусно 🤤 быстро , обслуживание прекрасное , удобное расположен-4 минут от пл. Сан Марко-легко найти, хорошая винная карта! Пекут сами свои особенные печеньки))) подают как комплимент к кофе ☕️
reviews.title: Вкусно и быстро !!!

reviews.text:
A nice  cosy place with great food and a warm welcome. Was there with my friends, I took seafood risotto, it was absolutely amazing! When they knew that one of us had a birthday they brought us tiramisu with a small firework. It was so pleasant and kind. 
Very easy to find, low prices and good quality food. Highly recommend
reviews.title: A cosy place with great food

reviews.text:
Ottima cucina e buon servizio! 
Noi abbiamo trovato un caldo caloroso. I prezzi buoni e ottima qualità. Poi è vicino da piazza San Marco e non è difficile da trovare!
reviews.title: Bel posto

reviews.text: Pleaseant atmosphere and great food! I especially enjoyed the Italian pizza on offer. 10/10 would recommend
reviews.title: Very nice!

reviews.text:
Très bon restaurant. On y mange très bien ! Le personnel est très correct et sympathique. J y suis retournée une 2ème fois avec plaisir  ! Je recommande sans hésiter 
u2èfoiavec
reviews.title: Très bon restaurant

reviews.text: Offers a wide variety of mouth watering food. Staffs are very accommodating and offers a perfect customer service .satusatisfaction. Perfect for your Instagram posts. Very walking distance to other historical places and has a lot of Restaurants nearby.
reviews.title: Mouth watering food

reviews.text:
Restaurant Nuova Valigia offers good food, nice atmosphere (be careful for space troubles) and normal prices for Venice - pizza was around 10 eur, medium beer is 6, 1 L water is 5 eur.
If you want some pizzas, seafood or some pasta, this is the place to go 👍
reviews.title: Tasty pizza and normal prices for Venice

reviews.text:
Typically rustic, Italian restaurant with a real feel good atmosphere. 
Attentive waiters with tasty food. I had pumpkin in a delicious tasty vegetable sauce ravioli. It was to die for! Complete with a tasteful glass of Merlot for hubby and a cool glass of Prosecco was the ideal place to celebrate our 30th Wedding Anniversary.
reviews.title: Perfect

reviews.text: This restaurant offers indoor and out door seating.  They also offer gluten free pasta and pizza.  The staff are friendly and helpful and offer a good service.  We ate he 4 times and paid between 30-60 euros based on 2 adults with one or two courses and drinks (half litre of white wine and sprite or beer).  I would definately recommend this restaurant.  It is midway between St Mark's square and the Rialto bridge so perfect location and if you sit outside you will see gondalors floating by!  Perfect. A special mention to Fahim who provided excellent service.
reviews.title: Great food and service

reviews.text: I love gourmet food and I've had plenty of real squid ink dishes and fresh spaghetti at upscale restaurants. I didn't choose to go to this restaurant, I was led here by a tour group. Anyone who knows can tell that this is obviously not squid ink LOL. I found some unground sesame bits in the sauce. At least I'm only out 25€ for it. I didn't eat it, it was disgusting and just tasted like salt and sesame oil. All these unfortunate tourists from China in the restaurant didn't know any better.
reviews.title: SCAM ALERT. "Squid ink" pasta was dried spaghetti drenched in ground black sesame.

reviews.text: Stay away- They are terrible.  They overcharged us.  We ordered bottle of wine which they said was $45 euro and the bill was for 85 euro  when we questioned it they said they gave us the bigger bottle. Would not correct bill.Food wasn't great.  Would not recommend
reviews.title: Awful

reviews.text: Great service, great food, and good ambiance. Staff were very friendly and polite. We were well looked after.
reviews.title: Great food

reviews.text:
Il peggior ristorante in cui sono stato. 
La classica trappola per turisti Stranieri.
Pasta arrivata dopo 3 minuti dall’ordinazione. Quindi precotta. 
Sembrava di mangiare plastica a forma di pasta. 
Prezzi esorbitanti e servizio scadente e presuntuoso. Rispondendo a tono alle critiche che avevamo fatto, consapevoli del loro prodotto e dicendo che tanto loro lavorano lo stesso e del turismo italiano poco importa.
Beati loro ma poveri turisti stranieri. La cucina italiana non è questa.
reviews.title: Pessimo!

reviews.text: Wir haben da zu Abend gegessen und waren sehr zufrieden! Die Vorspeise sowie der Hauptgang mit den Beilagen waren top. Die Wein-Empfehlung hat uns ebenfalls überzeugt. Das Personal war sehr freundlich und hatte immer ein Lächeln für die Gäste. Preise waren für diese Qualität moderat. Wir können dieses Restaurant nur empfehlen.
reviews.title: Schlemmerei

reviews.text: Personal war sehr cool und man konnte ein lustiges Gespräch aufbauen. Das Essen dort gefiel mir sehr und schmeckte mir auch gut.
reviews.title: Cooler Service

reviews.text: Nice place with good pizza. You can have table in small not crowded street, reasonable price, right for family rest and charge after walk around.
reviews.title: Family Pizza

reviews.text: Me and my partner visited for lunch. Service was good and the staff were friendly. We ordered bruschetta and the fried fish platter. I liked the bruschetta but my partner wasn’t too fond of it as it was very vinegary and we had much better whilst in Venice. The sea food was lovely however, a large selection from sole to calamari and polenta. A nice meal however not quite perfect.
reviews.title: Great fish food

reviews.text: We ended up in this restaurant after already looking for a while for a nice place to eat. Wanting to be on the safe side we choose Carbonara pasta and pizza - both very good. We also took some desert : cheesecake and tiramisu also ok, but I had better elsewhere.
reviews.title: Good food

reviews.text: Obwohl das Lokal an einer „Touristenschneise“ liegt, bietet es erstaunlich gute Qualität zu erträglichen Preisen. Unsere Favoriten waren die Fischvorspeisen und das Risotto. Die Vorspeisen traditionell venezianisch und das Risotto „mit Biss“. Wunderbar.
reviews.title: Prima Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis

reviews.text: Una visita familiar! El lugar muy agradable, excelente servicio y la comida deliciosa!! Muy recomendable
reviews.title: Muy bueno!

reviews.text: If you do not know very well the city this place a good start. You don't feel in Venice because the staff are mostly non Italians. Good food, service and price but need more atmosphere and the Italian touch.
reviews.title: Nice place to start

reviews.text:
Прибыв в Венецию на кораблике, искали, где покушать. Этот ресторан недалеко от площади Сан Марко.
Очень большое меню- и мясо, и рыба, и морепродукты. Средние цены. 
Популярен среди китайских туристов, поэтому может не быть мест. Хороший вайфай.
reviews.title: Рекомендую

reviews.text:
Been for late dinner, still full inside.

Nice restaurant decor und service.

Not big portions, but very tasty pasta (14 €) & seafood to enjoy.

Cobierto 2 € p.P 

A glass of good housewine, 6 €.
reviews.title: Very good italian

reviews.text: Entramos por casualidad, ya que parábamos por el crucero en Venecia y nos encantó tanto por el trato de los camareros como por la comida, que fue unos mejillones a la marinera buenísimos, una pizza 4 quesos con mogollón de sabor y un calzone gigante y muy sabroso. 2 birras de 1/2lt y un agua por 57€ todo!! Buen precio para la zona en la que está!!
reviews.title: Inmejorable!!

reviews.text:
Pasamos por casualidad buscando una pizzería para llevarnos unas pizzas y la impresión fue muy buena, y las pizzas mejores. A los dos días repetimos pero esta vez comimos en el local. La sepia a la veneciana espectacular, los espaguetis carbonara estaban buenísimos súper suaves, un muy buen sitio para comer o cenar en Venecia. 
Los camareros  muy amables y te ponen unas galletitas con el café
reviews.title: Muy bueno

reviews.text: Es un restaurante bastante centrico e Venecia. Camareros bastante simpaticos. La comida muy buena y no han sido lentos.
reviews.title: Muy bueno

reviews.text: Wow what fantastic food. The best Carbonara pasta i have ever eaten. We all had exceptional meals. The menu was quite extensive as was the wine list.  The staff were friendly and helpful with suggestions, escpecially with wine we were unfamiliar with. Everything was so good we returned twice.
reviews.title: Superb food and service

reviews.text: Good food, good service, nice price. All you need for a nice meal. The pizza and pasta was very good.
reviews.title: Good food

reviews.text: Très bon restaurant bien placé, à déguster le plat de poisson qui est vraiment excellent. A recommander
reviews.title: Très bon restaurant

reviews.text: Excelent choice! Not too much from the picture but the taste was exceptional! Long slices of liver 2mm thin cooked separately on onion  base with a bit of olive oil and a slight taste of wine.
reviews.title: Pork liver venetian style

reviews.text: This restaurant is in the touristic area so we didn't know what to expect. We were pleasantly surprised.  Nice staff and good food.  We had the spaghetti bolognaise and Hawaian Pizza.
reviews.title: Good Pasta

reviews.text: Dopo la visita alla Fenice, ci siamo casualmente imbattuti in questo locale. Ci ha invitato un cameriere molto simpatico. Abbiamo mangiato il menu turistico di pesce ed hanno fatto degli ottimi piatti ai bambini: sono stati molto onesti e gentili.
reviews.title: Pranzo Domenicale in una giornata di pioggia

reviews.text:
Расположение - высший класс. Кстати, рядом находится мишленовский ресторан, который очень уступает этому!
Порции достаточно большие, еда вкусная и свежая. Минус для моего мужа - отсутствие темного пива, но это же Италия, а не Германия, так что ничего страшного))))
reviews.title: Прекрасное место для обеда!

reviews.text:
non serve un gran cuoco per cucinare un piatto di spaghetti alle vongole,ma sbagliare di almeno 5 minuti in meno la cottura e' veramente difficile ....erano crudi
per non parlare dell'antipasto di cozze e vongole ,assolutamente da evitare pesante e senza gusto...meglio evitare,peccato il cameriere era bravo.
reviews.title: SPAGHETTI CRUDI

reviews.text: Abbiamo cenato in questo locale, le porzioni non erano scarse, la qualità dei cibi era non era male, il vino della casa probabilmente era fatto anche con uva,  non mi ha colpito nulla di ciò che abbiamo mangiato. Resta il fatto che non si é mangiato male.
reviews.title: Tuttonellamedia

reviews.text: Cibo buono, e menù variegato. Il pane ela pizza sono fatti davvero in casa. Il personale è sempre gentile e simpatico.
reviews.title: Buono!

reviews.text: Cenam,os allí porque nos alojamos en el hotel . El personal fue muy amable  y desde luego la comida estaba muy bien cocinada . Yo comí un bacalao que  casi no puedo comerlo  y os aseguro que tan bueno como lo he comido en el norte de España
reviews.title: Bacalao recomendable

reviews.text: We were really hungry so we decided to stop here. Outside was not comfortable so we went inside but it was worse. So noisy that we went out and looked for another restaurant.
reviews.title: So uncomfortable that we went out without eating

reviews.text:
Paseando por el centro de la ciudad es muy común encontrarte con muchísimos restaurantes y personal que está en la calle intentando convencerte para entrar, la verdad que al final es difícil decidir si no te ayuda un poco TripAdvisor, así que con la ayuda de la app y el buen hacer del camarero que se encontraba en la entrada del local entramos en él, la verdad es que tenía algo de reservamos pero comimos muy bien, el servicio muy amable y rápido lo peor el precio de las bebidas que para mi gusto es demasiado elevado.

Una buena opción, pizzas caseras y pasta bastante buena
reviews.title: Buena comida y buen servicio aunque algo carero en la bebida

reviews.text: Todo muy bueno con los camareros atentos y con ofertas para todo publico el camarero de la puerta es muy atento.
reviews.title: Buen restaurante

reviews.text: la comida esta muy muy buena, buen servicio, precio muy bueno. Los camareros muy atentos y simpaticos.
reviews.title: opinion

reviews.text: This restaurant it's pretty good, we went with friends and we spend a great lunch so i really recommend it, the staff was also very nice
reviews.title: Having luch with friends

reviews.text:
Muy buena comida y buen servicio.
Camarero amable y simpático, buenas ofertas y buen servicio en general
reviews.title: Buena comida y buen servicio.

reviews.text: La comida está muy buena, igual que el servicio y el precio. Muy recomendable para ir con amigos o familia. En el centro de venecia y de muy buena calidad.
reviews.title: Opinión

reviews.text:
La comida está buena. 
Ofrecen muy buen servicio.
El servicio es muy agradable y simpatico.
Precio muy bueno.
reviews.title: Opinión

reviews.text:
Good food. Many options in the menu.
Very friendly staff, and cleaness.
Prices really reasonable.
Perfect place for lunch while visiting Venice.
reviews.title: Great restaurant

reviews.text: Loved this restaurant. All of the waiting staff were extremely friendly and the food was very good and reasonably priced. Will definitely return when next in Venice.
reviews.title: Excellent food and staff.

reviews.text:
Un lugar tranquilo económico y con muy bueno.
Amables durante toda la estancia y muy rápida la comida
reviews.title: Nuova Valigia

reviews.text: La comida estaba muy buena, los camareros se han comportado muy amables con nosotros y todo era muy barato
reviews.title: Recomendable

reviews.text: Pranzo buonissimo e personale simpatico..Buon prezzo...siamo passati di lí per caso e il titolare ci ha fatto un ottima offerta compresa di primo/pizza più bibita e dolce
reviews.title: Ottimo pranzo

reviews.text:
Nice place,good hostess!
The restaurant is in good hand!
The food(especially traditional food) was perfect!
A quiet place for dinner!
I’ll be back!
reviews.title: For dinner

reviews.text: Restaurante muito agradável e com uma comida deliciosa. O atendimento é bom e o preço é justo. Recomendo
reviews.title: Agradavel

reviews.text:
I was pleasantly surprised With our waiter Mr. Rafi
He was very nice, professional, Kind, helpful and overall excellent and we will definitely come back again because of the nice staff and great food
reviews.title: I was pleasantly surprised

reviews.text:
Ci siamo ritrovati qui per puro caso durante una gita scolastica... Il cameriere ci ha accolto molto bene facendoci un ottima offerta.
Infatti con 20 euro abbiamo mangiato un buonissimo spaghetto allo scoglio e una fritturina. In più ci è stato offerto dalla casa come conclusione di un ottimo pasto un bel gelato
reviews.title: "ottimo rapporto qualità-prezzo"

reviews.text:
La pâte de la pizza est bonne mais je n’ai pas aimé cette façon de présenter la pizza, une demi tranche  sur un tiers de la pizza, les artichauts sur le 2eme tiers et les champignons sur le 3ème tiers. Ça gâche le plaisir de la pizza qui est de retrouver les différents goûts des ingrédients en une bouchée. 
Sinon service agréable.
reviews.title: Moyen

reviews.text: Ci siamo fermati per caso una domenica sera nel periodo del carnevale e siamo rimasti piacevolmente sorpresi dalla professionalità e accoglienza. Eravamo in due con il bimbo piccolo che dormiva, ci hanno portato in una saletta molto accogliente e tranquilla, riparata dal solito caos. Abbiamo ordinato dal menu turistico di pesce che comprende un primo, un secondo, il coperto e il servizio. Il cibo buono e fresco, i calamari che si scioglievano in bocca! Il personale molto attento, cordiale e simpatico. Ci è piaciuto tutto, dall'entrata in locale fino al conto finale. Consigliatissimo al 100%
reviews.title: Una cena stupenda a due passi da piazza S.Marco

reviews.text:
We were warmly welcomed at the Nuova Valigia. There were locals, families and tourists all eating here. The waiter staff were caring and helpful. I decided to order the fish menu of the day and decided to start with the spaghetti nero di seppia. This is pasta with squid that is coloured black with squid ink. The waiter checked to ensure that I understood what I was ordering. A caring touch.
All our food was good, the spaghetti followed by the fried calamari on my menu, and the lasagna followed by the liver venetian style. 
I would be happy to return here for another meal.
reviews.title: A very pleasant meal

reviews.text: Quiet spot tucked away near Rialto Bridge. Helpful staff some English spoken. Pasta very tasty. Salmon was not deboned so although good taste was a lot of hard work. Fairly expensive for what it was.
reviews.title: Good in a sea of mediocre

reviews.text: Wir haben einen Fisch bestellt und haben ihn gleich bekommen aber auf dem Teller waren Haare !!! Das bekamen wir das falsche Dessert und dem Kellner war das egal !!! Und dann haben wir noch 10 Euro fürs Service und 4 euro fürs Gedeck 😡 nie wieder !!!!
reviews.title: Total unzufrieden!!!

name: Stringhetto - Frutta&Cioccolato
address: Cannaregio 2085 Rio Tera' Della Maddalena, 30121 Venice Italy

reviews.text: Sehr nettes Personal, man darf alles probieren und es wird sehr schön verpackt. Die Süßigkeiten sind sehr lecker! Alles selbstgemacht. Charlotta hat sich viel Zeit für unseren Besuch genommen und uns vorzüglich beraten.
reviews.title: Sehr zufrieden

reviews.text: Excellent service and delicious hams and spreads. Their jams are vegan and palm oil free! Carlotta gave us excellent service and was very patient as we sampled almost all of their jams!
reviews.title: Excellent service and delicious

reviews.text: So delicious and Carlotta was so friendly and helpful! Love that they have no palm oil or preservatives in their jams too!
reviews.title: Amazing food and customer service!

reviews.text: Wir dachten uns nur ...gucken wir Mal kurz rein in den Laden und wurden dann sehr herzlich zum Probieren eingeladen. Eine super nette Verkäuferin hat uns dann durch die halbe Produktpalette probieren lassen, sodass wir schließlich diese traumhaft Marmelade gekauft haben. Für jeden Schokocreme und Marmeladen- Fan ein muss!
reviews.title: Exzellente Beratung

reviews.text: Nachdem wir fast alle Sorten einmal probiert haben stand fest, dass wir auf jeden Fall etwas mitnehmen müssen. Die Verkäuferin war sehr lieb und hat sich ganz viel Zeit für uns genommen. Die Marmeladen und Schokocremes in diesem Laden sind wirklich geschmacksintensiv und super lecker. Vor allem die Marmeladen haben mich überzeugt, weil sie sehr natürlich und fruchtig schmecken.
reviews.title: Mega Geschmack !

reviews.text: Scoperto x caso passeggiando x Venezia..prodotti curiosi,particolari...marmellate mai viste.Ne ho prese 2 e assaggiate alcune.Davvero buone!Da provare!Fermatevi e entrate!
reviews.title: Consigliato

reviews.text: La verdad es que me a encantado el lugar felicidades a stringhetto por tener a Carlotta con ellos volveré a comprar aquí
reviews.title: La verdad es que me a encantado

reviews.text:
Salí super contenta de la tienda con mis compras hechas, las mermeladas y los chocolates riquísimos! 
Me atendió Carlota majisima! 
La sangría muy muy buena!
reviews.title: SUPER RICO TODO!

reviews.text: Davvero bravissimi, tutto molto buono e artigianale, gentilissimi e molto disponibili, consigliatissimo
reviews.title: Davvero bravissimi, tutto

reviews.text:
Attirato per caso dalla commessa competente e molto gentile con un assaggio gratuito, ho potuto scoprire dei prodotti d'eccellente qualità, dalle creme spalmabili fino alle marmellate marmellate
Veramente ottime
reviews.title: Esperienza imprevedibile

reviews.text: Commessa gentilissima, paziente,disponibile e professionale, frutta fresca, creme molto buone con possibilità di assaggio, locale piccolo ma accogliente, prezzi adeguati
reviews.title: Ottimo!

reviews.text: We stopped in for a sangria and we ended up buying lots of goodies! The kid slices the fresh fruits and frozen yogurt. My husband and I loved the sangria. Carlotta was awesome!! So very helpful and speaks English perfectly!! A+ service.
reviews.title: Awesome customer service!

reviews.text: Le creme e le marmellate sono buonissime, il personale molto gentile, il locale è super consigliato, è anche vicino al centro!
reviews.title: Esperienza eccezionale

reviews.text: Very tasty jam and amazing chocolate. Carlotta was an awesome help. We could taste all we wanted! Strongly recommend!!!
reviews.title: Amazing

reviews.text: Il cibo non era buono prezzi troppo alti e commesse inadeguate insomma non mi è piaciuto il servizio e lo sconsiglio caldamente
reviews.title: Negozio inadeguato

reviews.text: Il cibo era buono le commesse ci hanno preso in giro i prezzi troppo alti e non ci hanno dato lo scontrino
reviews.title: Io e mia nonna

reviews.text:
Non ho mai recensito negozi o alimenti.  Prima volta, e lo faccio volentieri perché è stata una scoperta spettacolare. Ho acquistato diversi prodotti online da regalare a Natale ed ho fatto un figurone. Le “marmellate” sanno proprio di frutta al naturale, come le faceva la nonna. Le “spalmabili” (creme tipo Nutella) hanno un sapore ed una consistenza che davvero si fa fatica a smettere. Le “abbinabili” (per formaggi, crostini ecc) sono accattivanti soprattutto per la scelta di ingredienti inusuali. Le confezioni sono anche molto belle da vedere ed il prezzo é contenuto, se si guarda la qualità. 
Dovremmo poter esportare ovunque i nostri prodotti, quando sono così soddisfacenti ed onesti. Bravi davvero.
reviews.title: Qualità ed onestà.

reviews.text: We bought a variety of cremino chocolates (with pistachio and hazelnut), chocolates (all kinds) and the white chocolate pistachio spread. All were soooo delicious!! The lady serving us was lovely and friendly, and offered tastings of each product without our asking. Beautiful products and store, I wish we could have bought more.
reviews.title: Delicious cremona, chocolates and spreads!

reviews.text: Conosco i prodotti perchè li vendo a Torino in una grande realtà. Appena sono entrato nella cioccolateria, ho riconosciuto il marchio. Tutto eccellente, non ti regalano nulla, ma davvero tutto buono. Servizio ottimo
reviews.title: In giro per Venezia

reviews.text: Staff was so so nice and helpful and friendly and chocolate was super delicious! Definitely recommend!!
reviews.title: Chocolate Covered Strawberries!!!

reviews.text: We spent four days in Venice with our 9 year old daughter. We made a special stop each morning to buy beautiful fresh strawberry’s !! You can have plain strawberry’s or chocolate, nuts and fresh cream AMAZING 😉 Worth stopping 👌
reviews.title: Amazing

reviews.text:
Ad ogni fiera cerchiamo lo stand di Stringhetto per acquistare le loro marmellate, sono eccezionali, sia i gusti classici che quelli un pò particolare! Prodotti eccellenti, qualità ottima, personale gentilissimo, i prezzi sono un poco più cari ma ne vale sicuramente la spesa! 
Questa volta, abbiamo anche assaggiato il loro cioccolato con le nocciole, il cocco e il pistacchio... che dire! ... una vera bontà! vi consiglio di cercarli nelle fiere ed assaggiare, potrete valutare da soli la qualità!
reviews.title: Una delizia!

reviews.text:
Ottimi prodotti! Marmellate, cioccolata... Tutto super! E poi una famiglia di grandi lavoratori, professionisti e di una simpatia coinvolgente! Numeri uno! 
Nicola Da Re
reviews.title: Meraviglioso!!!

reviews.text: Very good variety and absolutely top quality of chocolate and sweets they have here. I can recommend them to all chocolate lovers.
reviews.title: Delicious handmade chocolate and sweets

reviews.text: Staff was helpful and very easy going.  There were a ton of free samples and no up-selling of their products.  There were very happy to let us buy what we wanted with no pressure.
reviews.title: Amazingly good

reviews.text: Try the pistachio spread, it delicious. Almost everything in this store is amazing. The staff are friendly and happy to give you a sample taste of of all the products.
reviews.title: Delicious pistachio spead

reviews.text: Natural ingredients, delicious flavours! A must stop for local chocolate recipes and their cremino! The chocolate spreads are also amazing.
reviews.title: Delicious chocolate!!

reviews.text: Frutta e dolci sono sempre delle coppie vincenti, e in questo luogo riescono a risaltarne la bontà con le fragole ricoperte di cioccolato🤤. Il resto dei prodotti, compreso l' assaggio gratuito, sono prodotti da loro, e questo è molto apprezzato.
reviews.title: Fragole al cioccolato

reviews.text: Prodotti ottimi, gentilezza e pulizia, non si può chiedere di più, veramente brave. Un modo goloso per far mangiare la frutta ai bambini!
reviews.title: Complimenti!

reviews.text:
We came for venezia and we sew this shop and we had so good experience and we bought 
  chocolate pishtacchio it's taste so good 
 ! And ilaria was so nice for us  we really recomended 😉
reviews.title: chocolate pishtacchio The best

reviews.text: We went in drawn by the chocolate fountain. We bought the white chocolate coconut, white chocolate pistachio and chocolate fondant truffles which were to die for. We will he going back for the frozen yoghurt with chocolate toppings which looked incredible. There is something for everyone: chocolate truffles, chocolate bars, chocolate fountain, chocolate spreads, frozen yoghurt. The staff are very friendly and happy to help anyone.
reviews.title: Delicious chocolates for everyone

reviews.text:
Prodotti di ottima qualità, artigianali, per tutti gusti e tutte le occasioni..Fragole con cioccolato, cremini, tartufi, creme spalmabili, marmellate..Insomma di tutto!
Una volta che li provi non ne puoi fare a meno!!!!
reviews.title: “Una vera ossessione”

reviews.text: Stringhetto has an array of fruit marmalades and flavored chocolate spreads. The Bianco Pistachio is to die for!
reviews.title: Amazing chocolate and fruit spreads

reviews.text: Jessica is WONDERFUL and the truffles are decadent and phenomenal! Best truffles we’ve ever had. Homemade and affordable!
reviews.title: BEST TRUFFLES IN VENICE

reviews.text: Decided to buy some chocolate for desert and found this place. My wife is gluten free and a range of products to suit her. The lady provided a few tastings and recommendations and we ended up with our excellent desert. Friendly and helpful, well worth a visit.
reviews.title: Excellent chocolate excellent service

reviews.text: Excellent chocolate and service by  Carlotta ! Really love the different spreads.. especially dark chocolate and pistachio :)
reviews.title: Best Chocolate spread!

reviews.text: Delicious chocolate and friendly service! A wide variety of handmade chocolate treats available with tasters to try before you buy!
reviews.title: Amazing goods

reviews.text: I prodotti sono buonissimi super golosi! Personale gentile e disponibile a spiegare ciò che vendono. Ci ritornerò!
reviews.title: Stupendo!

reviews.text: Some of the best tasting chocolate you can get and homemade by lovely locals too! Highly recommend a stop here to try and buy!
reviews.title: DELICIOUS

reviews.text:
Ottimo cioccolato artigianale e marmellate.

Consigliato ma piuttosto delle recensioni meglio provare sul campo.

Consigliato
reviews.title: Buonissimo!

reviews.text: Très bon accueil de Ilaria avec le sourire , chocolat excellent à venir découvrir si vous venez à Venise
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.text:
Very tasty chocolate and great service! Will be back for sure!
You may also try every taste for free!)
reviews.title: Super!

reviews.text: Las dos veces que fuimos a la tienda, las señoritas fueron extremadamente amables y nos explicaban todos los tipos de chocolate que vendían. Deben probar las fresas con chocolate, son deliciosas. Mil veces volveríamos!
reviews.title: Excelente chocolate y servicio maravilloso

reviews.text: It’s an amazing small shop where you can taste all the flavours of the chocolates! and all the flavours are amazing!!  i totally recommend it for all chocoholics outhere!
reviews.title: Shopping

reviews.text: It was a really nice there and the personal is really friendly! You can try all the chocholate you want 😍
reviews.title: Nice little shop

reviews.text: Durante l’ardua scelta di creme spalmabili a base di cioccolata la signorina Carlotta ci ha gentilmente consigliato e fatto provare tutti i gusti con successo proprio sui suoi gusti preferiti, cioccolata fondente e pere, cioccolato bianco e pistacchio. Gusti eccezionali e prezzi accessibili. Consigliato SI!
reviews.title: Personale ospitale e dagli ottimi gusti

reviews.text: Small lovely chocolate and truffle shop. Sampled the fondente e arancia and it was incredibly delicious!  Have to stop by and try this special treat.
reviews.title: Yummy spreadable chocolate

reviews.text: Ottimo! Personale cordiale e disponibile, prodotti di qualità e salutari ad un ottimo prezzo; consiglio caldamente le marmellate artigianali, perfette sia per il dolce che per il salato.
reviews.title: Perfetto!

reviews.text:
Mejor pistacho con chocolate que hemos probado, el personal es súper atento y disponible para cualquier duda que tengas, puedes probar las mermeladas que quieras llevar pero cuidado por que te las puedes llevar todas.

Muy recomendado si estás en Venecia
reviews.title: Mejor chocolatería de Venecia

reviews.text: Amazing chocolate and service. 100% recommend if visiting Venice. Some of the best chocolate we tasted in Venice
reviews.title: Holiday

reviews.text: Visited with my wife and found some delicious treats to take home to enjoy and remember our time in Venice
reviews.title: Delicious Treat

reviews.text:
Semplicemente fantastico, tantissime varietà, dal cioccolato, alla frutta, ma anche  creme spalmabili salate! 
Consigliato assolutamente!!
reviews.title: Tappa obbligatoria !

reviews.text: Nos dieron a probar un montón de sabores de cremas y mermeladas mientras nos decidiamos que sabores escoger. Fueron muy amables y nos llevamos tres mermeladas y una de regalo. Nos llevamos a casa algo especial de Venecia para saborear lo cada día  :)
reviews.title: Delicioso!!

reviews.text: I went today with my wife and kids. They were really kind, and offered us to try several things before we could decide. Definetly a must if you love chocolate.
reviews.title: Just lovely

reviews.text:
Très bonne adresse où l'on peut trouver de succulents chocolats de divers parfums et originaux.
On trouve également d'excellentes pâtes à tartiner !
Merci beaucoup à Jessica pour son accueil chaleureux et son sourire !
reviews.title: Super boutique !

reviews.text:
Super sympa, très bonne pâte à tartiner, confiture et chocolat.
Si vous êtes gourmand foncez ! 
Merci Jessica !
reviews.title: Gourmandise

reviews.text: Ottimi prodotti e personale qualificato e disponibile a chiarire qualsiasi dubbio! Ho avuto occasione di assaggiare i prodotti stringhetto al cioccoshow di Bologna e da allora cerco sempre di fare scorta! La qualità è molto alta e si sente!
reviews.title: Ottimo!

reviews.text:
È veramente tutto ottimo. I prodotti sono di altissima qualità e i prezzi adeguati, c'è un'ampia varietà di scelta e il personale è davvero molto cortese.
Tornerò sicuramente!
reviews.title: Tutto ottimo!

reviews.text:
You must visit this place!
I am Japanese and they are really kind to Japanese.
I liked the taste of sweets there.
They gave me some scoops of chocolate to try.
I ate strawberry with chocolate sauce.
It was tasty. It’s unique type of sweets at Venice so you must try!
reviews.title: Thank you very much!

reviews.text: Hier kann man kaum widerstehen! Zumindest nach den leckeren Kostproben, die von charmanten Mädels großzügig angeboten wurden!
reviews.title: Schokoladenvariationen at its best

reviews.text:
I went to stringhetto quite late, 20:30, and still my family and I got the warmest, nicest service.
More than that, everything we got there was great and we were extremely satisfied. Highly recommended.
reviews.title: Great place and great Service

name: Ristorante La Calcina
address: Dorsoduro 782, 30123 Venice Italy

reviews.text: Très agréablement surpris par la qualité de la cuisine proposée. Le fritto misto fût peut être le meilleur que j’ai dégusté de tous mes séjours à Venise. Belle carte des vins avec en particulier un Prosecco non dosé qui a accompagné parfaitement le repas.
reviews.title: Très agréablement surpris

reviews.text:
Wir haben hier wunderbar gegessen, alles sehr lecker und frisch und auch absolut ausreichend. Schöne Weine .
Haben bei sehr schönem Wetter die Aussicht auf Giudecca genossen.
Der Service war freundlich und anfangs auch sehr aufmerksam. Das hat am Ende leider etwas nachgelassen. Schade! 
Wir würden aber auf jeden Fall wieder kommen, klare Empfehlung.
reviews.title: Hübsches Restaurant an der Promenade

reviews.text: Jolie terrasse sur les quais qui permet de profiter d'un moment au calme et de jouir d'une magnifique vue.
reviews.title: Sur les quais

reviews.text: Personal mit professioneller angenehmer Zurückhaltung und sehr freundlich. Das Essen war sehr gut. Spaghetti Vongole und die kleinen leckeren Bruschettas sind ein Traum. Während in der Stadt viel los ist, ist dieser ruhige Ort eine Wohltat mit schönem Blick aufs Meer.
reviews.title: Personal mit professioneller

reviews.text:
Das Personal hat uns sehr zuvorkommend bedient. Ausserdem haben sie gewissenhaft Atemasken
getragen. Das Essen war leider sehr einfallslos und ohne viel Geschmack. ber Das Fleisch war
sehr trocken und die Bratkartoffeln dazu dafür komplett durchweicht und fettig. Schlussendlich war der dunkle Raum auch nicht gerade einladend. Man musste mit dem Handy Licht machen um die Karte lesen zu können.  Wir würden kein zweites Mal herkommen.
reviews.title: Mittelmäßiges Abendessen

reviews.text:
Quel plaisir d’être à la Calcina! Sur le quai ou sur la terrasse !
Les serveurs sont charmants. 
Le Pinot Grigio, le Chianti sont adorables...
Certes Philippe Sollers est absent, mais on a un de ses livres... et on lit... en mangeant.
Le lieu n’est pas littéraire il est poétique... à côté des « incurabili », à la limite de la « linea d’ombra », face au « Redentore »...  et je n’oublie pas les « Gesuati »...
Naturellement, on mange bien à la  Calcina, mais on se nourrit tout autant de la Beauté du lieu... Beauté cachée (à découvrir, dévoiler)? Oui, comme souvent à Venise....
« Pizza nostra », biscuits et vins « vins e biscottini », voilà un déjeuner que je vous recommande...!
Terminez par un café bien sûr !
Le tout pour moins de 50€.
reviews.title: Quel plaisir d’être à la Calcina!

reviews.text:
I stayed at La Calcina for my honeymoon over 30 years ago so while walking with my wife and friends on the Zattere it seemed a good idea to stop for a coffee. I am happy to report that the Hotel/Restaurant has been tastefully refurbished the service was great and the coffee excellent. 

Happy memories.
reviews.title: Happy memories

reviews.text: Das Restaurant gehört zum gleichnamigen Hotel und liegt an der Promenade Zattere. Man hat einen traumhaften Blick hinüber auf den Stadtteil Giudecca. Die Bedienung ist freundlich und aufmerksam. Das bestellte Carpaccio di manzo war lecker und die gefüllten Ravioli waren selbstgemacht und einfach nur delikat. Die Preise sind in Ordnung und ich würde auf jeden Fall nochmals dort essen gehen.
reviews.title: Restaurant mit schönem Blick

reviews.text: 2019 bereits dort gewesen, da war alles gut, 2020 leider unterirdisch, um 8:45 ein Tisch bekommen und um 9:40 rausgeworfen worden. - während wir noch am Essen unserer Hauptspeise waren wurden die Schirme geschlossen alle Nachbartische rabiat abgedeckt und uns die Rechnung präsentiert ohne das wir danach gefragt hätten. Auf die Frage ob man noch wenigstens die Flasche Wein zu Ende trinken dürfe wurde die Aussage gegeben so ungefähr wer man denkt das man ist, Sie machen jetzt zu. Leider wirklich unterirdisch schlecht geschultes Personal obwohl das Essen eigentlich gut ist.
reviews.title: Service gleich null.

reviews.text: This was a return visit for us. It really is a lovely spot on the waterfront. The seafood pasta is good. The drinks are of a good quality and the service is professional if a little on the grumpy side. I probably wouldn’t pick it for a special occasion as there are better value places around but we’ll probably return as it’s reliable and a pleasant place to have a simple lunch.
reviews.title: Pretty view!

reviews.text:
Ristorante palafitta sul canale.. Location bellissima.Cibo ottimo e curato servizio cortese. Prezzo nella norma. 4 spaghetti.. Ottimi.. (2 vongole, 2 frutti di mare), 2 acqua, 4 caffè.. 99 euro.
Se volete fare un bel giro fuori dal percorso turistico.. Avendo la stazione alle spalle.. Girate a destra e seguite x andare verso i ristoranti sull'acqua fino alla punta che guarda San Marco.
reviews.title: Ristorante palafitta sul canale..

reviews.text: Alles war super; die freundlichen Servicemitarbeitenden, die romantische Atmosphäre und natürlich das leckere Essen.
reviews.title: Abendessen bei Sonnenuntergang

reviews.text: Mangiato benissimo, davvero tutto molto buono, il pesce squisito e le patate( io ne sono ghiotta) erano veramente eccezionali!  panorama meraviglioso davanti alla Giudecca!
reviews.title: Cibo e vista al top

reviews.text: Die Lage des Außenbereichs des Restaurants ist fantastisch. Das Essen war sehr gut, besonders die Spagetti mit Miesmuscheln waren ausgesprochen lecker. Der Service war in Ordnung. Das Preis-/Leistungsverhältnis ist gut.
reviews.title: Tolle Lage - gute Küche

reviews.text: Ieri sera ho cenato in questo bellissimo ristorante alla Zattere ... una location invidiabile con il tramonto sul canale della Giudecca. La terrazza e’ la stessa che - quando ero ragazza - ospitava la gelateria “il Cucciolo”. Ottima la pizza e degna di una menzione speciale la “meringata”: sublime ! Servizio cortese e celere. Lo consiglio.
reviews.title: Emozione alle Zattere

reviews.text: Leider unterirdischer Service und Qualität der Speisen. Auf eine Kaffee in Ordnung wegen der Lage, aber sonst besser Finger weg.
reviews.title: Schöne Lage, aber das war’s auch schon

reviews.text: Wie hatten einen schönen Tisch auf der Terrasse reserviert und hatten einen super Blick und eine nette Bedienung. Leider mussten wir aufgrund eines heftigen Unwetters nach der Vorspeise nach innen wechseln. Von da an wurden wir vom anderen Kellner innen nur noch widerwillig bis gar nicht  bedient. Hätten gerne noch eine Nachspeise oder eine Flasche Wein bestellt, wurden aber ignoriert. Sehr sehr schade, denn das Essen war lecker. Auch unsere Bitte,  ob wir evtl in der Lobby/Lounge noch Drinks bekommen könnten wurde abgelehnt, obwohl niemand anderes dort war. Gingen durstig und schlecht gelaunt nach Hause...
reviews.title: Essen und Location gut...Service schlecht

reviews.text:
Nice location with view on the Giudecca. Only one card on the table for a group of five. Food - diverse pasta with seafood, carpaccio and  liver ordered by us - was good, in my opinion (not shared by the others) too salty. 
The service was ok until the second course was served. Then we were ignored had to make the waiter to clear away and bring a coffee. We were not even wished a farewell. Strange manners.
reviews.title: Good food, service negligent

reviews.text:
:-) Ristorante auf einem Floss auf dem Kanal, Lage und Ausblick sind grandios.
:-( Spaghetti Vongole und Spaghetti Cozze, beides sehr schlechte Qualität, konnten wir gar nicht essen. Service-Mitarbeiter reagierten auf freundliche Reklamation verärgert. 
Wir fahren seit 15 Jahren jährlich ca 3 mal nach Italien, haben solch schlechtes Essen samt unfreundlichem Service erstmals erlebt.
(Ehepaar, 50 Jahre, aus Salzburg)
reviews.title: Touristen Nepp

reviews.text: Nous fréquentons cette belle terrasse sur le canal de la Giudecca depuis de nombreuses années et nous l’avions jusqu’ici toujours connue fréquentée par des familles vénitiennes. Il y a 5 ans encore, le restaurant s’appelait « la piscina »et il proposait une cuisine vénitienne précise et très goûteuse. En changeant de nom pour adopter celui de la Locanda voisine, cet établissement s’est banalisé et semble avoir perdu un peu de charme. Le service est plus impersonnel, la terrasse nettement moins fréquentée (on est pourtant un dimanche de juillet) et la cuisine moins fine. On continue cependant d’y déjeuner très honorablement: le carpaccio est copieux, parfaitement découpé, et l’escalope milanaise ne pèche pas par excès de gras. Comptez 212€ pour un déjeuner dominical sans apéritif avec 3 bouteilles d’eau, un vin blanc local, 4 antipasti, 4 plats, 2 desserts et 3 cafés. La vue sur la Giudecca demeure éblouissante mais un peu de la magie du lieu s’est envolée.
reviews.title: Terrasse dominicale

reviews.text:
Food was average - one had bad sea food, service was really unfriendly (almost insulting, no word, no answer to our question and they wouldn’t give the bill and paying machine to the person who was handling the credit card!) and billing was higher than seen on the menu. When we said so to the waiter, he gave us another menu with different prices and presentation - a menu he brought with him when coming with the bill as if he already knew !
Definitely avoid this one, there are so many others !
reviews.title: Run away ! Avoid this restaurant

reviews.text:
Bien placé sur les quais.
Un service correct, ue belle terrasse et d excellentes pizzas bien copieuses.
reviews.title: Bonnes pizzas et jolie vue

reviews.text:
Endroit charmant, tranquille, cuisine tout à fait bonne. Excellent rapport qualité- prix. 
Nous avons pris une table le long de la façade, car il y avait un peu trop de vent pour se mettre sur la terrasse au-dessus de l’eau. Très jolie vue sur la Giudecca. 
Un plat de spaghetti (al dente) alle vongole (sautées au pinot grigio), portion moyenne, fruits de mer frais. Très bon plat. 
Gnocchi al formaggio e alle nocci, très bons aussi. «  Petite » salade verte (contorno) servie très généreusement et délicieuse: feuilles de salade fraîches, agrémentées d’un peu de carotte râpée, de qq rondelles de radis et de petits morceaux de concombre.
reviews.title: A recommander!

reviews.text: Para mi gusto, y como buen gallego que soy, los platos eran bastante escasos. Los precios caros, en la linea de Venecia, pero comparando con lo pequeño de los platos...se hace caro. Buen trato de los camareros. Y platos muy ricos.
reviews.title: Bueno, caro y escaso

reviews.text:
Ubicato sul Canale della Giudecca, questo ristorante/bar ha una bella area costruita su una palafitta sul mare ed una più ristretta adiacente allo stabile. Abbiamo preso due aperitivi, ben fatti e curati, ma con il solito triste ed inconsistente piccolo contenitore con quattro patatine. Quando uno spritz costa € 6,00 cad. deve essere accompagnato da stuzzichini di altro livello e natura.
La vista è piacevole ed il personale cordiale.
reviews.title: Aperitivo alla Giudecca

reviews.text: Ristorante La Calcina, Megezia is in a wonderful location with a view of Giudecca island across the water. Our dinner of grigliata pesce and spagetti with gorgonzola and selection of cheeses was perfectly prepared and delicious.
reviews.title: Good food, nice view of Giudecca island across the water

reviews.text: La Calcina is at the south side of the Sestrieri Dorsoduro and it's outside tables offer a superb view across the Canale Della Giudecca.  We stopped for a quick lunch/pizza and drink which was served promptly.  The bread and pizza dough was superb.  Great freshly squeezed (blood) oranges was absolutely delicious.  Reasonable value too.
reviews.title: Great Pit Stop for fresh pizza and views across the Canale Della Giudecca

reviews.text: Beau décor, excellente situation sur les Zattere, cuisine de qualité aux portions généreuses (ce qui n'est pas très courant à Venise, Business, Business...). Très bon service. Seul petit bémol : on nous a placé à une table de 4 où siégeait déjà un client. Dommage pour l'intimité. Ce qui nous retient un peu d'y retourner. Sinon, très bien.
reviews.title: Bonne cuisine aux portions généreuses !

reviews.text: Le restaurant est vraiment bien placé avec une terrasse au bord de la lagune. Très agréable par beau temps ! Une bonne cuisine mais attention pour les personnes végétariennes ou avec des régimes spéciaux, peu de choix.
reviews.title: Cadre agréable

reviews.text: Toujours aussi bien qu'il y a 3 ans quand j'étais venu rien a redire un cadre magnifique des plats raffinés et frais avec une terrasse au bord de l'eau à mon avis un des meilleurs restaurants de Venise ...
reviews.title: Carnaval

reviews.text: Abbiamo pranzato all'aperto, in una bella giornata di metà febbraio. Simpatia del personale, buon rapporto qualità-prezzo e location stupenda.
reviews.title: Sospesi sul canale della Giudecca

reviews.text: le lieu est idéalement situé sur les quais, la terrasse était pleine et nous avons eu une belle place au soleil. le personnel est sympathique et professionnel, la nourriture est excellente, rien a dire un très bon moment !
reviews.title: une bonne surprise de début d'année

reviews.text: Si vous souhaitez passer un moment intime, romantique avec un véritable plaisir gustatif, venez diner a la calcina, antre d’André Suarès et du poète Rilke. Le diner et le service ont été impeccables ! la viande délicieuse, le vin parfaitement conseillé ! Petit bémol sur la lasagne au boeuf (un peu rustique et pas très élaboré a mon gout même si c’est probablement une volonté) ! Je précise que nous étions a l’intérieur mais cela n’enlève rien au charme de l’endroit ! l’endroit au calme, éloigné de l’agitation ambiante et une des plus belle vue de Venise en ligne de mire rendent ce moment particulier !
reviews.title: un diner a la hauteur des illustres résidents

reviews.text: Très bonne nourriture que nous aurions pu apprécier sans la horde de pigeons qui envahissent la terrasse, marchent sur les tables et se jette sur les restes des clients à peine les plats finis.
reviews.title: Déception

reviews.text: Très belle salle avec terrasse quand il fait beau. Bon accueil et service impeccable. Belle présentation des plats bien cuisinés. En entré jambon de San Daniele très bien servi. Les spaghettis aux vongole nous ont un peu déçus: pas très parfumés et portions peu généreuses. Bon choix de vins.
reviews.title: Belle salle, service stylé. Bien
