reviews.text: lovely ambience, good window seat. Starters were excellent and then we had the dish of the day. This was a seafood risotto - not much seafood and tough overcooked calamaris. we complained but to no avail, it was rather take it or leave it. Sad as it was my wife's birthday.
reviews.title: disappointing meal

reviews.text:
The restaurant is pleasantly decorated but tables are very close together. We had a table for two, but the adjacent tables were extremely close, there was barely room to pass between our table and that on either side. Consequently it felt as though the people on either side were part of our table and conversation.

Service was quick and reasonably efficient. I had Spaghetti alle Vongole. The food is well prepared and presented, but unexceptional, and as good or better can be found elsewhere in the neighborhood, and probably cheaper.

I had expected better having been here a couple of years ago. On this occasion I was unimpressed, we left disappointed and feeling we had not received a meal which justified the price. This was the only disappointing meal we had during our four night stay in Venice.
reviews.title: Disappointing considering the price

reviews.text: Un restaurante muy bonito, la terraza y la vista preciosa, muy romántico. La comida muy buena. Vale la pena visitarlo.
reviews.title: Muy bien!!!

reviews.text: Au bord de la lagune, un excellent restaurant et un service agréable et efficace. La qualité pour un tres bon rapport qualité prix.
reviews.title: Belle surprise

reviews.text: This restaurant is very nice. The prices are a little bit high but it definitely worth it. The service is extremely bad, but the food is amazing.
reviews.title: Bad service, perfect food.

reviews.text: La Calcina restaurant had excellent preparation of our steak and veal Milanese dishes. The sides of potato and green beans were also good. The main courses were well seasoned. We had bruschette sampling for appetizers- huge lovely setting on the water. Pricey.
reviews.title: Excellent Beef, Veal, Bruschetta

reviews.text:
Excellent food, excellent service!!!
I recommend this restaurant 👌
You have the wonderful view over theGuidecca-canal, from the outside tables
reviews.title: Excellent food, excellent service!!!

reviews.text:
Auf der Suche nach einem Restaurant sind wir letztendlich im La Calcina gelandet. Was absolut kein Fehler war. Die Vorspeise Polenta mit Fischcreme war gut und ausreichend. Als Hauptspeise haben wir uns für Pizza entschieden. Nicht besonders originell, aber ... Italien! Und unser letztes Essen in diesem Land. 
Die Pizzen waren sehr gut belegt, der Teig knusprig. Ein Gewinn für den Magen
reviews.title: Sehr in Ordnung

reviews.text:
Le restaurant est exceptionnel 
Il y a les habitués qui sont des italiens 
Cela prouve que c est un bon restaurant 
Les plats sont exceptionnels 
Une très bonne adresse
reviews.title: Formidable

reviews.text:
Two years ago, in September, 2018, I finally returned to Venice after a long absence. On my first evening I happened to find La Calcina and had a late glass of Prosecco in the bar area in front of the hotel. I enjoyed the atmosphere so much, the hustle and bustle of the Canal di Giudecca, where one never gets tired of watching what is going on on the water and beyond, breathtaking sunsets included, and therefore returned two days later for a great fritto misto. --- And I returned and returned, and now, after my third stay since then, the number of my visits have accumulated to quite a number. But not the sheer number is what counts, but the wonderful memories I now connect with La Calcina and make me think back often and always with a big smile and a feeling of gratitude.

Unfortunately, I have to deal with health issues not allowing me to opt freely from the menu, but with the kind help of the team we never failed to find something appropriate to make me very happy eater. For their special efforts in this respect and their warmness I would especially like to thank Signora Vera and Signor Kazi.

I will be back in December until after Christmas and already look forward to eating out at La Calcina again, this time certainly not on the ponton, but in the cosy dining room. Thank you for many special and unforgettable times, and for running a place which, in my eyes, is tailor-made for true Venice lovers. To find the very same team there every year again speaks for itself.

Mille grazie di cuore!
Angelika da Vienna
reviews.title: Venice at its best

reviews.text: Abbiamo scelto questo splendido ristorante per il nostro pranzo di matrimonio. Una sessantina fra parenti e amici gli ospiti. Corrado, il direttore, ci ha saputo consigliare nei migliori dei modi cibo (menu sia carne che pesce con ben due primi), Vino, impostazione dei tavoli, fiori e quant' altro. Complice una magnifica giornata di sole, una terrazza curata con vista mozzafiato e un servizio impeccabile tutto si è svolto nei migliori dei modi. Grazie infinitamente. Valentina e Mattia
reviews.title: SUPER PRANZO DI MATRIMONIO

reviews.text: Das Essen war sehr gut, das Personal auch ausgezeichnet, lange keinen so ordentlichen Service mehr bekommen. Die Lage am Wasser ist auch wirklich toll man kann wirklich viel sehen. Kann man für das schöne Abendessen mit der Freundin uneingeschränkt empfehlen.
reviews.title: Sehr gut, ausgezeichneter Service und Essen.

reviews.text:
My husband and I ate dinner at La Calcina twice during our 5 day stay in Venice in July and loved both meals. 

First their location is beautiful - - dining over the water with views of Giudecca island.  Watching the sunset while enjoying a lovely white wine was a perfect way to wrap up a great day of sightseeing.

Second, everything we ordered was truly delicious.  In particular we loved the linguine and clams and squid ink pasta.  I found their prices in line with the quality of the food and the beautiful location.

You won't be disappointed
reviews.title: Outdoor dining, Beautiful view, Wonderful Food

reviews.text: Oh wow . . Delicious fresh food, friendly staff, very accommodating without a reservation. If you want a sunset to die for whilst you eat, then you need to come here. I must add we sat out on their terrace over the water.
reviews.title: Came here for the sunset and to eat and drink . .

reviews.text:
Un très joli cadre avec une terrasse sur l'eau. Des mets qui sortent de l'ordinaire. 
En revanche, nous avons renoncé au café qui tardait à venir.
reviews.title: Un très bon repas

reviews.text: Siamo venuti a cena in questo locale attirati per lo più dalla bella posizione. Molto romantici i tavoli posti sulla zattera galleggiante. Bel panorama. Il personale è gentile ma un po distratto a volte (ci hanno portato un riso del giorno che non era quello descritto). I prezzi sono accettabili per Venezia e la posizione. Il cibo non era abbondantissimo ma ok. Ho provato un risotto ai frutti di mare, zafferano e zucchine.
reviews.title: Romantica cenetta

reviews.text: Très bon restaurant de poissons. Les anti pasti sont excellents et copieux. Les sardines in soar en particulier. Le filet de thon est exceptionnel. Le personnel est attentionné. Rien à redire. Il faut y aller.
reviews.title: Une très bonne surprise

reviews.text:
We booked this restaurant after visiting it earlier in the year. We wanted somewhere with a beautiful setting for a family meal after our Venetian wedding. I emailed them and had no problems reserving a table on the outdoor terrace. Unfortunately we were late arriving for our reservation but i called and they held the table for us, if not it would have ruined our wedding evening. For this i couldn't thank them enough :) 
Food is fantastic, especially the fillet steak. Service can be slow but it's still worth a visit. We will definitely return!
reviews.title: Wedding Meal

reviews.text: We stopped here after finding the restaurant recommended by our hotel was closed and I am glad that we did.  The atmosphere was lovely.  We enjoyed the sunset on the canal, watching the boats go by.  The wine list was great and all six of us enjoyed our dinners - especially the pasta with pesto and tomatoes. The parma ham and melon appetizer and the cheese plate were also delicious.  The service was prompt.  We definitely would return!
reviews.title: Beautiful canal-side location

reviews.text: enjoyed a late lunch in the sun as a group of 8, lots of superb fresh fish and chilled prosecco. service good.
reviews.title: lovely option waterside for lunch

reviews.text: La Calcina . Best location ever, but the food has no taste and flavour at all.  Risotto seafood was really bad. The fish was not fresh the shrimps overcooked and the taste disgusting. I did not eat it at all, no excuses - nothing.
reviews.title: Mediocre food

reviews.text: Beautiful location by the water with nice atmosphere. Wonderful service with helpful waiters. The food was excellent! Would definetly visit again!
reviews.title: Great resturant

reviews.text: Sur le DORSODORU , voilà une terrasse qui attire l'œil pour sa vue sur le canal de Giudecca et son trafic incessant . On essaye et nous sommes conquis . Excellent accueil ,nous avons goûté les fameuses " SARDE IN SAOR" ,  spécialité vénitienne et de bonnes " spaghetti alle vongole " accompagné d'un Pinot grigio . Une belle carte de dessert clos ce bon repas . On passerait des heures a siroter un limoncello en guise de digestif tant le spectacle est captivant . Vraiment marcher jusque ici , car tout vaut le coup . Je recommande .
reviews.title: DINER AVEC VUE

reviews.text:
This restaurant is worth a visit for its excellent location with tables fronting right onto the lagoon. We had no issues with the service which was pleasant enough. 
The glass of rosé/Spritz were good, the bread fresh and my spaghetti with clams very nice. My partner had a veggie lasagne which he said was “ok but not great”. We shared very decent ice-cream for pudding and had a coffee each. The bill came to €69 which is not cheap for pasta and ice-cream but reasonable for the setting. I’d come back for the view as this was a very lovely final meal before we had to rush off to the airport!
reviews.title: Great view!

reviews.text: Such a shame great views but not a clue about service or food. Given a great table but halfway through the meal along came an enormous thunderstorm and the waiters rushed to clear up all the cushions that were going to get wet. Er hello what about all the paying guests still eating who had to move tables themselves. The cost of our meal €200 for two would have paid for all the silly cushions. Come on guys get real you do not deserve to last.  As for lobster spaghetti with more pink peppercorns than lobster who trained the chef on flavours?
reviews.title: Oh dear

reviews.text:
Dîner dehors sur une terrasse en face La Giudecca, un vrai bonheur ! Il est préférable de réserver à l’avance et de demander une table en bordure de l’eau. 
Bonne cuisine et service souriant
reviews.title: Quelle vue ! Bonjour

reviews.text:
Parece un lugar de perfil bajo al lado de los grandes y carísimos hoteles principales de Venecia pero este hotel y restaurante es verdaderamente exquisito, elegante y encantador.

Todas las veces que voy a Venecia, en mi vida habré ido unas 10 veces, Trato de ir a comer al menos dos veces por estadía.

La atención es extremadamente cordial y profesional. La cocina es excelente. Su terraza sobre el canal impactante pero también su restaurante en interiores tiene una decoración encantadora. Siento que ese es mi lugar. Me dan ganas de llegar pero no me dan ganas de irme. Por el nivel de la atención y de su cocina su precio es muy razonable y accesible.

Está fuera de toda la mediocridad que se puede ofrecer al turista en Venecia. Éste lugar es sin duda para Quienes conocen Venecia en profundidad.

Cada vez que voy a comer, me prometo que la próxima vez también me alojaré en su hotel. Quiero poder hacerlo y espero que sea por muchos días, porque sé que no voy a querer irme . Hay una señora que entiendo tiene una función especial pero también sirve en las mesas que veo año tras año y esta vez conversando con ella le dije que la próxima vez sería un huésped del hotel. Será un privilegio
reviews.title: Mi Restaurante preferido en Venecia

reviews.text:
Visited here with my husband for our 10th wedding anniversary.
Staff were absolutely amazing and a lovely lady really looked after us. Even putting blankets on us as it was quite chilly sitting outside.
We had a 3 course meal and every course was delicious.
Price was fair for the amount we ate and drank.  Highly recommend!
reviews.title: Romantic meal

reviews.text: Arriving very tired from a day of travel I decided to eat in the restaurant after checking in. I had an delicioust meal starting with an Aperol spritz and caprese salad. My main course was spaghetti with clams...all excellent! The service was very good except at the end when I ordered a tiramisu and mentioned to the waiter I wanted to finish my dessert in my room....he said it wasn't allowed! Wow, really? I also want to mention that I feel the restaurant is a bit over-priced.
reviews.title: Delicious Dinner!

reviews.text:
La terrasse est magnifique, face à la Giudecca et à l’une des plus belles églises de Venise, celle du Rédempteur !
Déjeuner ou dîner face à Dieu ce n’est pas rien !
Déjeuner ou dîner à la suite des Philippe Sollers, ce n’est pas rien non plus ! 
Tout ici s’efforce d’être parfait. C’est déjà pas mal !
Je vous recommande la « novelita » de juin 2019 : huîtres et verre de vin blanc associés !
reviews.title: Face au Rédempteur !

reviews.text: Nous avions posé nos valises pour la semaine à la residenza 818, juste à côté de La Calcina. Il était donc logique que nous essayions ce restaurant. Nous avons tellement aimé que nous y avons pris tous nos repas du soir. Nous avons visité toute la carte sans jamais être déçus. Bons produits, bien cuisine et bien présentés. Quand il fait beau, on peut s’installer sur le ponton servant de terrasse. Le couché de soleil sur le canal de la Giudecca et le Redentore est magnifique. Romantisme absolu! En bref tout y est pour passer un moment inoubliable. Une référence à Venise!
reviews.title: Une référence à Venise

reviews.text: We stayed in the hotel and booked dinner at this charming restaurant. The food was average but the view spectacular. Unfortunately,  my request for a table by the waiter was met with the rudest treatment, verbally and physically, I have ever experienced by wait staff. Having a waiter on staff who is so rude to your customers is a way to lose business fast. I approached the manager on the other side of the restaurant and we were seated by the waters edge. No tip and I will never return (We recently moved to Trieste and expect to bring our visitors to Venice from time to time)
reviews.title: Disappointing

reviews.text:
At 9.15p.m. 9 tables free. We were waiting for 5 Minutes without any attention. After asking for a table for two. Surprisingly the answer: no tables free!
We were clothed in formal leasure.
reviews.title: No recommendation

reviews.text: Und noch so ein Lokal in venedig ... ich hatte reserviert und würde trotzdem noch mal gefragt ibbich wirklich allein bin. Und bekam dann den (angeblich) und einzig freie Tisch in der hintersten Ecke. Man sitzt sehr schön am Canale und die Qualität des Essens ist auch ok. Allerdings sind die Preise nicht ganz gerechtfertigt. Amerikanische Gruppen bezahlen dies und dominieren das Lokal zu 90%. Wenn man Schiffe schauen will und Geld weniger wichtig ist, dem kann man die Plattform des la Calvina empfehlen.
reviews.title: Na ja ....

reviews.text: Diciamo la verità: il ristorante lo abbiamo scelto per la bellissima posizione e per l'elegante zattera con tavolini che si affacciano sul Canale della Giudecca. Però la sorpresa è stata che le pietanze ordinate (a prezzi accettabili per la posizione a Venezia, che non è certo una città cheap) erano presentate benissimo e gustosissime.
reviews.title: Ristorante favoloso

reviews.text: Excellent chef and kitchen. Nice atmosphere and very good service. When weather permits one can dine on the canal. Fantastic!
reviews.title: Very good food and excellent servcie

reviews.text: The food choice is excellent and produced with skill and flair.  There is a comprehensive wine list which will not break the bank.  The staff are completely on top of their game.  Best to book as it is a popular spot, especialy with the artisitc types.
reviews.title: Top quality and very professional

reviews.text: Отличный вид. А так, не плохо, не хорошо - никак. Причём не зашло с первых минут. Кушать мы там  не захотели. Выпили, сыр и пошли дальше гулять. По едем сказать ничего не могу, проще впечатление - 3.
reviews.title: Так-себе

reviews.text: Cibo di livello ,cucina molto curata ,prezzi al di sopra della norma ma come del resto su tutta Venezia ,servizio ottimo
reviews.title: Ottimo meno fantastica posizione
reviews.userLocation: Province of Monza and Brianza, Italy

reviews.text: Il primo maggio a Venezia rovinato dal pranzo. Il ristorante come cucina(abbiamo mangiato solo primi) nella media, ma manca totalmente il fattore igiene, le tovaglie monouso messe sopra la tovaglia di tessuto nn vengono cambiate se non presentano le macchie evidenti... il personale sprepara il tavolo e toglie eventuali briciole dalla tovaglia monouso  utilizzato tovagliolo  del cliente precedente. Il ghiaccio per  le bevande viene messo dentro i bicchieri con le mani... rimangono perfino le posate del cliente precedente se non sembrano usate... il pane messo nei cestini con le mani di personale che prima porta via piatti sporchi ..., aggiungo che per nostra sfortuna il tipo tossiva di continuo su tutto. Concludo -vergognatevi.
reviews.title: Attenzione nn cambiano nemmeno tovaglie

reviews.text: Having been recommended to visit here we were excited to visit. Unfortunately it did not live up to expectation. The surrounding inside was a nice old fashioned style hotel restaurant. The food was mediocre. The starters were nice and tasty but the huge portions were off putting.  The duck was rubbery and inedible. The pizzas were fine but noting special. Unfortunately our waiter was particularly  rude and made us Feel u welcome. I will not return.
reviews.title: Very disappointing restaurant in a beautiful setting

reviews.text: Elegantly stylish and romantic inside, with attentive but unobtrusive waiters. Well presented, delicious food, including seafood risotto, venetian style liver and onions (with a gorgeous glass of Barolo) and Vin Santo & biscotti to finish. Molto buona! Grazie mille!
reviews.title: Romantic dinner to celebrate our 30th anniversary

reviews.text: Au bord du canal de la Giudecca  sur les Zattere cette pension de famille qui fait partie de l'histoire de Venise est devenu un hotel ou il fait bon séjourner.Meme s'il n'y a pas d'ascenseur les étages sont facilement accessibles et les chambres surtout celles avec vue sur le canal sont très confortables.Bonne literie..L'hotel a été repris par un investiteur français et le niveau accueil et la salle de restaurant ont été revus et c'est une réussite.ambiance chaleureuse .La terrase extérieure du restaurant sur le canal est fabuleuse.Très bonne cuisine un des meilleurs risotto au fruits de mer que j'ai jamais mangé. Bref une très bonne surprise que cette ancienne Pensione!
reviews.title: Une très bonne surprise digne d,un 4 étoiles

reviews.text: We had heard good things about the hotel, and booked lunch as part of our whirlwind 36 hours in Venice.  We were rather too early in the season to enjoy the pontoon tables but we had requested an outdoor table in case the weather was good, and it was a balmy 20 degrees and wonderful to sit outdoors under the canopy, which staff lowered a little more for us.  Sardine saor (delicious) was shared between three of us; delicious prosecco; and spaghetti a la vongole to die for.  Flavoursome, nicely proportioned dishes, served beautifully.
reviews.title: Perfect spot; perfect lunch

reviews.text: We arrived to Venice today and spited the place on the way to the hotel. Atmosphere is very relaxed and quite, no bright lights. Service is great. Food and wine are great. Tried spaghetti with calmi, melagnese and for desert tiramisu and panna cotta, with local wine. Prices are reasonable 100€ for 2 people. Would recommend this place for quite romantic dinner.
reviews.title: First impression of Venice food

reviews.text: A pesar de q fuera marzo, sol, vistas a la Giudecca, buen servicio, precio bastante contenido (esto es Venecia) y buena calidad de la comida (ensalada Caprese, Lasaña, y Pizza Diavola)  y para finalizar un café rico . Con este cocktail de terraza .... que se quite el Florián
reviews.title: Comida agradable con vistas

reviews.text: We had a great meal at this restaurant. Food was full of flavour and great sized portions. Service was excellent. Yes it’s not the cheapest place to eat but it’s worth the extra cost in my opinion. We ate inside the beautiful restaurant with it being March but will definitely try the terrace in summer.
reviews.title: Wonderful evening

reviews.text:
We had spent a week in Italy tasting the very best cuisine in Florence and Venice.
The look and spot of this restaurant catches the eye immediately, so excitedly we got a beautiful spot looking out to the Laguna....Unfortunately the view did not mirror the poor service and tasteless food. 

The lasagne looked like baby food with no taste, I had one mouthful and couldn’t eat anymore, it was dreadful. The waitress came and took plates, I said it was not good! I got a shrug, no apologies and still got charged.

This was the only bad meal and bad service we had in Venice. Do not eat here!
reviews.title: Disappointed

reviews.text: Ein offensichtlich liebevoll eingerichteter Speiseraum hat uns eingeladen. Leider waren sowohl das milanese wie auch die lasagne von sehr mittelmäßiger Qualität, sodass wir das Lokal, zumindest abends nicht empfehlen können - tagsüber auf der Terrasse über dem Kanal sicher nett...das Personal war sehr nett und aufmerksam
reviews.title: Tolles Ambiente

reviews.text: A great terrace close to the water. Good to drink a cocktail but definitely not to eat because of the bird that invite themselves to eat with you. Service not very good...
reviews.title: Nice view

reviews.text: Genoten van het rustgevend uitzicht op het terras tijdens de lunch. Lekker gegeten. Vriendelijkheid personeel kon wat beter.
reviews.title: Prachtig terras!

reviews.text:
We hebben twee keer bij La Calcina geluncht. Beide keren hadden we (51 en 56 jaar) ruim voldoende aan een antipasto, een pasta en dessert (wij sloegen dus het hoofdgerecht, de secondo, over).
Wij waren enthousiast over de antipasto van mosselen en schelpen, de risotto met saffraan, de spaghetti met schelpen, de radicchio salade met spek en over klassiekers zoals de spaghetti met tomaat en basilicum en de tiramisu met Siciliaanse  accenten (sinaasappel...).
Als je binnen eet, bij regen of kou, raden we je aan om van te voren een tafel aan het raam te reserveren. Wanneer de zon schijnt moet je echt buiten op het terras zitten en de zilte zeelucht ruiken wanneer je een spaghetti alle vongole eet.
De bediening is vriendelijk en attent en hebben plezier in hun werk. Klasse!
reviews.title: Prima restaurant voor vis en schaaldieren op een schitterend terras

reviews.text:
Σε μια πολύ ομορφα διακοσμημένη αίθουσα με πολύ ευγενικό και διακριτικό προσωπικό απολαύσαμε δυο υπέροχα γεύματα .
Πολύ ωραία θαλασσινά και τέλεια ψημένα κρέατα σε νορμαλ τιμές Βενετίας .
reviews.title: Όμορφος γευστικός χωρος

reviews.text: Le très gros atout de la Calcina est sa terrasse ouverte été comme hiver. Vue superbe sur le canal de la Guidecca, le Redentore. La cuisine est très correcte sans être de la gastronomie. Les prix ont pas mal augmenté comme partout à Venise. Compter pas loin de 60 € pour deux : des pâtes, un verre de vin, un café. Pour un repas complet on doit dépasser les 100 €. Mais la vue est exceptionnelle. Très agréable lors d’une balade sur les zattere. J’y vais une fois à chaque séjour.
reviews.title: Vue exceptionnelle et cuisine correcte

reviews.text: Expérience très agréable: déjeuner au soleil en janvier sur la terrasse de ce restaurant: bon accueil, mets de qualité (risotto de la mer, spaghetti aux palourdes), vin agréable... c’est le restaurant de l’ancienne pension Russie...
reviews.title: Très bon restaurant sur les Zattere

reviews.text:
Annesso alla pensione da cui prende il nome questo.piccolo ristorante ha il suo punto di forza in un pontile estivo attaccato alle Zattere ma anche in inverno,  cenare nella sua accogliente sala, è  piacevole. I tavoli sono un po' piccoli e  vicini e il locale non è  arioso a causa del soffitto piuttosto basso e alle tappezzerie scure  pero' si sta benone.
 I camerieri sono cortesi e il menu' offre piatti tradizionali piuttosto buoni. Stonano sul menu' dato la pretesa  chic del locale,  le pizze e le insalatone che proporrei solo nel menu ' a pranzo. 
Fegato alla veneta , tagliolini al nero di seppia, 2 calici di vino , 1 dolce , 77 euro. Non economico ma a Venezia nulla lo è  .
reviews.title: Piacevole

reviews.text: Quelques amis, l'heure du thé, à la découverte du petit salon de cet hôtel. Nous avons demandé des chocolats chauds et, en Italie, il y a peu de risque de se retrouver avec une boisson médiocre. Or, sacrebleu, quelle surprise désagréable, on nous a servi du "chocolat" chaud d'aéroport, à savoir de l'eau chaude délavée passée au travers d'une machine industrielle mélangée à une poudre produite par un grand groupe agroalimentaire, sans cacao bien entendu - ou juste ce qu'il faut pour ne pas être traîné en justice - et en revanche pleine d'arômes, exhausteurs de goût et autres abjections. Les tasses n'étaient pas hyper clean, ça rajoute à la déception. De plus, la baie vitrée semblant en excellent état mais laissant passer l'air extérieur, il y avait un fort courant d'air froid à certains endroits du salon... Salon fort joli au demeurant, d'aspect hyper cosy et accueillant, et c'est pourquoi c'est bien dommage !
reviews.title: Quelque peu déçue

reviews.text: Nous nous sommes arrêté par hasard pour notre repas de midi. Nous avons pris un risotto aux fruits de mer et safran ainsi qu’un Tiramisu. Les produits sont de qualités, savoureux et le service très agréable.
reviews.title: Enfin un bon restaurant

name: Farini
address: San Polo, 379, 30122 Venice Italy

reviews.text: Farini is absolutely a great value for mooney! Very delicious pizza, pastries and coffee. Highly recommended!
reviews.title: Very delicious!

reviews.text: Sehr gutes Croissant und Brioche, fertige, leckere Salate auch zum Mitnehmen, die Pizzastücke sehen richtig gut aus. Alles konnten wir leider nicht probieren 😊. Latte Macciato kostet nur 2 Euro , alles sauber, man kann auf Barhockern Platz nehmen und das Leben beobachten.
reviews.title: Sehr gutes Croissant und Brioche,

reviews.text:
Pizza gourmet ottima e varia
È possibile sedersi e gustarsi, oltre la pizza, ottimi dolci o un buon drink. Consigliatissimo
reviews.title: Buonissima

reviews.text: Hungry? No time? Want to have choice? Go to Farini and get one of their delicous pizzas!!! I adored: hot, tasty, lavish!!!!
reviews.title: Pizza on the go

reviews.text:
Tato fast food pizzerie nám zapadla do oka, když jsme v dopoledních hodinách opouštěli Benátky a chtěli jsme si někde dát pořádnou nálož kalorií před odletem. Už zvenku bylo zřejmé, že se to vevnitř hemží hladovými Italy.
Sednout si můžete jen na barové židle k vysokým stolečkům, ale zase naše kufry pod tím stolem nikomu nepřekážely.
Objednali jsme si dva druhy pizzy, kterou vám obsluha ohřeje a nakrájí na čtverečky tak akorát do ruky, zapíjeli jsme to čerstvým pomerančovým džusem a k tiramisu jsme usrkávali výtečné cappuccino. 
Trávili jsme to ještě v Praze)
reviews.title: Vydatné, chutné a tak trochu na stojáka

reviews.text: Certainement des boulangers à l origine, ils vendent ausdi du pain, très bonne pâtes. Seul inconvenient, C est petit et il faut prévoir d aller ailleurs pour déguster sa pizza
reviews.title: Très bonne pizzeria

reviews.text: Très bonne parts de pizza et pas cher, parfait pour manger sur le pouce entre deux visites. Je recommande!
reviews.title: Parfait pour manger sur le pouce

reviews.text:
Leider schließen die wann immer die möchten. 
Wir stehen vor geschlossenen Laden obwohl es noch offen sein sollte.
reviews.title: Öffnungszeiten

reviews.text: Great place to pick a snack. They warm up the slices and ours wasn’t really hot. The Pizza it self was ok
reviews.title: Pizza wasn’t hot - nevertheless it was good

reviews.text: Pizza decisamente buona, cotta bene, fatta  con prodotti di qualità e ampia scelta... in centro a Venezia direi che è il locale adatto per fermarsi anche per la pausa pranzo!!!
reviews.title: Pizza decisamente buona, cotta

reviews.text:
Nous y sommes allés pour manger sur le pouce. Cela remplit le cahier des charges, mais les pizza ne sont pas les meilleures qu'on puisse manger, bien qu'on s'y attende. 

Etablissement propre, et personnel accueillant.
reviews.title: Bon mais sans plus

reviews.text: Ci siamo fermati per uno spuntino veloce e sarebbe stato da rimanere molto di più per poter assaggiare tutti i tipi di pizze al trancio offerte. Prodotti molto buoni.
reviews.title: Pizza eccellente

reviews.text: produits de très bonne qualité que ce soit pour le petit déjeuner ou pour manger un bout sur le pouce à midi afin d'éviter de perdre du temps dans les restaurant et de pouvoir continuer de visiter la ville
reviews.title: parfait pour manger sur le pouce

reviews.text: Really delicious pizza and pasta.  Was skeptical of the microwaved lasagna but it was really well done and the pizza was of top quality.  I have low expectations of Venice food without a lengthy search but just coming across this place and stopping in, I was more than happily surprised and very impressed.
reviews.title: Didn’t know good food existed in tourist areas

reviews.text: Delicious food, good staff and cozy atmosphere! There is a coffee and breakfast corner and one for pizza, pasta and salads! We had all different stuff and everything was very tasty❤️
reviews.title: All time favorite

reviews.text:
I’ve eaten in here 3 times so far in Venice and each time I have enjoyed the food. Absolutely beautiful pizzas and reasonably priced. 
Tables could do with a more frequent wipe down between customers but I cannot fault the food.
reviews.title: Best slices of pizza

reviews.text:
En nuestra estancia hemos ido a comer en varias ocasiones, hemos probado otras pizzas pero como esas ninguna, la masa está deliciosa al menos para nuestro gusto.
Precios asequibles y ricas pizzas.
reviews.title: Masa de pizza buenisima

reviews.text:
pour faire une pause  rapide  assisse dans un endroit moderne mais qui offre des parts de pizzas  ou des plats a rechauffer   
c est plutôt bon   
rapport qualite prix assez bon pour venise ou il est difficle de manger pas cher sans se faire avoir
reviews.title: pour un repas sur le pouce

reviews.text: Pizza molto buona, qualche posto a sedere, prezzi onesti . Valido sia per uno spuntino veloce che per un aperitivo diverso.
reviews.title: Pizza

reviews.text: Βρεθήκαμε τυχαία εκεί, η πολύ όμορφη βιτρίνα με τις πίτσες και το περιβάλλον εσωτερικά, μας έκανε να καθίσουμε για ένα γρήγορο φαγητό εκεί. Ενθουσιαστήκαμε με την ποιότητα, το μέγεθος των κομματιών της πίτσας αλλά και τις τιμές. Όλα ήταν πολύ ωραία. Φεύγοντας πήραμε και πακέτο για το βράδυ!!
reviews.title: Πολύ καλή φρέσκια ποιοτική πίτσα!

reviews.text: The coffee, the pizza, the ladies. Everything here is great, fast, clean and prices are reasonable. We'll be back for heavenly pizza.
reviews.title: Best pizza in toen

reviews.text: Na výletě v Benátkách jsme na doporučení na internetu zašli sem na obed. Je to takove rychlé bistro, které nabidne výborně espresso za 1 € a pizzu s vynikajícím těstem a přímo před námi byl i kuchař, který pizzu tvořil 👍. Jediné mínus byly špinavé wc. Sem prostě musíte.
reviews.title: Výborná pizza

reviews.text:
Tante pizze e focacce da scegliere.
Molto ben esposte e in un locale ordinato e pulito.
Personale veloce e gentile .
Per che va di fretta o vuole risparmiare mi sembra un buon compromesso .
Qualità buona.
Anche alcuni posti a sedere. Cosa non da poco a Venezia
reviews.title: Per chi ha fretta

reviews.text: Pizza increíble masa muy buena las ces al pasar y tienes que entrar a probarlas pero cuando las pruebas alucinas lo buenas que están
reviews.title: Pizza increíble masa muy buena

reviews.text: المكان حلو وكبير وتتوفر فيه جلسات ... البيتزا عندهم متنوعه ... والاسعار مناسبه ... الخدمه ممتازه ... والموظفين ودوين ... واهم شي البيتزا الي عندهم لذيذه لذيذه ..
reviews.title: بيتزا ولا اروع

reviews.text: Some of the best pizza I have eaten! But don’t mistake Farini as just a pizza place. It is a bakery that excels at filling (sic) hungry sightseers and by the look and sound of the clientele, the locals too!!
reviews.title: A bakery that fulfils

reviews.text: In love with Farini. Had the best pizza in my entire life there. Good food with really cheap prices.
reviews.title: Best pizza

reviews.text: Went here for breakfast one morning during my visit to Venice. Staff were very friendly, and food was delicious. We got the pizza which was average compared to other places but still nice, then a chocolate croissant which was delicious, the nicest one I had in Venice! Also the orange juice is natural and is a must try!
reviews.title: Delicious food, with even better croissants!

reviews.text:
trés abordable
avions pris une part de différente sorte qu'ils nous ont gentiment découpé en deux pour que chacun puisse y gouter
pâte et garniture excellentes
reviews.title: parfait pour un repas sur le pouce

reviews.text:
ヴェネツィア旅行中、通りすがりにモダンな雰囲気の気軽なピザ屋さんがあるなぁと気にしていたお店。

お昼にピザが食べたくて、2店舗あるうちのこちらのお店へ。サンマルコ広場から徒歩10分くらいでしょうか。

たくさんの種類のピザやパニーニが並んでおり、店員さんは忙しそうにしていますが優しいです。指定したピザをあたため、トレイに乗せて提供してくれます。
イートインスペースも十分あり、入れ替わりも早いので座れました。
肝心のお味は、シンプルながらやはり素材の良さを感じさせる素晴らしいものでした。中でもチーズたっぷりのピザが美味しかった！ 生ハムもとても美味でした。また行きたいです。
reviews.title: ピザが食べたくて

reviews.text: Фарини есть в Милане и в Венеции и мы каждый раз не можем устоять и первым делом идём сюда. Супер вкусная пинса, выпечка, салаты, брускетты, кофе. Но, это не ресторан, это чисто перекусить. Локация в самом центре. Рекомендую
reviews.title: Уже не в первый раз

reviews.text: Πολύ νόστιμη πίτσα και μεγάλα κομμάτια..είναι λίγο ακριβό το κομμάτι βέβαια ..μας το σύστησε ο ξενοδόχος λέγοντας μας ότι είναι ποιοτικό
reviews.title: Ακριβή αλλά καλή πιτσα

reviews.text: Accueil souriant, prix raisonnable. La pâte de ces pizzas est excellente. Très bonne adresse à découvrir, qui sera incontournable pour nous lors de notre prochaine visite à Venise.
reviews.title: De très bonnes part de pizzas

reviews.text: We grabbed a quick bite to eat at Farini after a long day of walking around Venice. I liked this little place, because it was a quick and easy place to grab something to eat without wasting time. The prices were really cheap, the staff was really nice, and the pizza was really good. I would recommend this place, and I would go back if I were to visit Venice again.
reviews.title: Good pizza

reviews.text:
tasty panini, good lasagna,,and super important: friendly, efficient service.

only women serve behind the counter, i wonder maybe thats why the service is so great :)
reviews.title: great place overall

reviews.text: Pour les amoureux des pizzas un excellent rapport qualité prix un cadre agréable un très bon accessible, beaucoup de choix
reviews.title: touristique

reviews.text:
Stumbled upon this place as we walked by and their window with all the fresh looking food was enticing... We decided to try it for lunch the next day... Very good food pizzas, pannini, desserts... You can pick up and go or grab a stool and eat in. Well worth the prices which were not expensive...
Go to place for next visit!
reviews.title: Yummy!

reviews.text: The only place I will eat pizza in Venice, very cheap and fresh and you can get a drink as well. Large oven serving up delightful crusty pizza with great toppings. Just easy to get lost in the neighborhood
reviews.title: Fresh fresh pizza

reviews.text: Good for family snacks of bread,pizza and cake.We enjoyed several  visits to refuel our meanderings around this beautiful city
reviews.title: Good quality and choice of food and drink

reviews.text: Ottimo locale nel cuore di Venezia per uno spuntino a pranzo con pizze di qualità. Personale gentile.
reviews.title: Ottimo

reviews.text: De passage devant, nous avons été alléchés par les pizzas et avons décidé d’en acheter quelques parts. Elles sont excellentes avec une bonne pâte bien gonflée. Nous y sommes retournés à plusieurs reprises pour le déjeuner de midi. Je recommande la mozzarella
reviews.title: Pizza à emporter top

reviews.text: Het cafe zit tussen rialto en san marco, heerlijke koffie. Bestelling plaatsen bij toonbank en je kan zitten zo der extra te betalen. Verse broodjes en gebak. Heerlijke koffie thee
reviews.title: Lekkere koffie betaalbaar schoon

reviews.text: Charcoal Pizza Base was delicious and the rest of the pizza we ordered was superb! Great coffee as well.
reviews.title: Delicious pizza but no chairs to sit on.

reviews.text: Très bon ! Pratique pour un lunch rapide avec 1 verre de vin ! Les pizzas et repas sont délicieux.  Pas trop cher.
reviews.title: Rapide et délicieux

reviews.text: Pain frais pour le petit déjeuné, ou bien croissants, pas loin du rialto cette boutique était très bien située pour nous, nous y avons même pris une salade pour un après midi léger en prévision d'une longue sortie.
reviews.title: Pratique pour le petit déjeuner

reviews.text:
Die Pizza in diesem Laden ist sehr gut und für alle Freunde der Thekenpizza einfach nur empfehlenswert.
Knuspriger Teigboden + frische Zutaten =  sehr lecker
reviews.title: Sehr gute Pizza

reviews.text: Отличное место для быстрого и вкусного перекуса! Цены вполне доступные от 3,80 евро за большой кусок. Нашли случайно и не ошиблись с выбором) Нас обслуживали две русскоговорящие девушки. Все чисто, вкусно, вежливо и приятно!
reviews.title: Вкусная пицца!

reviews.text: Just dropped by for a pizza slice, completely loved everything! Delicious and big slice, complete experience when they cut it with scissors.
reviews.title: PIZZA

reviews.text: Stumbled across this while in Venice. Fast service, delicious pizza and Aperol Spritzers. Great value and highly recommended.
reviews.title: Great find

reviews.text:
Locale molto grande , moderno ed elegante .
Grande assortimento di pizze e focacce molto invitanti , belle da vedere ed ottime da gustare .
reviews.title: Stuzzica l'apperito

reviews.text: Farini adalah jaringan kafe dan toko roti di kawasan wisata Venesia, dengan konsep toko modern. Dengan pilihan aneka roti klasik dan harganya yang terjangkau, toko ini hampir selalu diramaikan oleh antrian pengunjung.
reviews.title: Kafe dan toko roti

reviews.text:
Dans quartier, rialto, tres touristique, en s éloignant, d une centaine de metres, on trouve farini ( street food), pour petit dej, dej et diner ( les 2 derniers sur le pouce, car une dizaine de place en salle ). Vous pouvez manger de généreuses et variées part de pizza, à la découpe pour 3,80€ ( elles sont vraiment bonnes, bien garnies ).
On peut trouver de bonnes salades 7€/9€ (trop peu de choix) avec ingrédients de qualités ( boulgour ou poulet  ) et non grasses.
On retrouve aussi des lasagnes, de tres bonne facture.
Il y a aussi une planche de cichetti a decouvrir, mais un peu plus onéreuse.
Bref, pour des budgets plus serrés, vous mangez pour moins de 10€, avec la boisson et de qualité.
Sur la même rue, qqs metres plus loin, je vous conseille une patisserie fait maison avec canolli 1€, strudel 2,7€ pour votre dessert ( adresse de venitiens ).
reviews.title: Tres bon rapport qualité/prix

reviews.text: Situado muy cerca de Rialto, este el típico sitio de tomar algo para descargar un poco y seguir viendo Venecia. El local es pequeño y tienen 2 mesas altas con taburetes. Puedes tomar unas porciones de pizza buenísimas, pasteles, o sentarte (si tienes suerte) y tomar un cafe. Los precios están muy bien (para ser Venecia).
reviews.title: Parada obligada

reviews.text:
Sehr leckere Pizzen und Kuchen in einer super netten Atmosphäre! Die Lage in der Innenstadt bot sich außerdem super für eine kurze Pause an!
definitiv einen Besuch wert! 😊
reviews.title: Lunch

reviews.text: Très bonne pizzas  délicieuses ainsi que le spritz pizzas fraîche avec de bon ingrédients faite devant vous très grande choix de pizzas dommage que l endroit soit un peu petit car avec un peu de chance vous trouverez un petit bout de table et un tabouret pour vous assoir mais très sympa quand on veut un repas pas trop cher sur Venise à refaire !!!
reviews.title: Sympa efficace pas cher

reviews.text: Pizza a taglio molto gustosa, fruste di pane con le olive croccanti e ancora tiepide e croissant friabili e gustosi: un ottimo forno per un pranzo veloce
reviews.title: Pranzo veloce e buono

reviews.text: migliore organizzazione e prezzi rispetto alla media, consigliato per un pasto veloce come spesso fai a Venezia in qualità di turista
reviews.title: migliore organizzazione e prezzi rispetto alla media, consigliato

reviews.text: Après une journée bien éprouvante où l’on a beaucoup marché on s’est fait une halte fast-food à farini. Parts de pizzas et spritz sur le pouce un vrai bonheur. Pate excellente et produits frais. Accueil sympa. Par contre c’est un peu exigu il faut un peu de chance pour avoir une table. Mais ça vaut le coup pour un repas rapide.
reviews.title: Sur le pouve

reviews.text: Provei a pizza de presunto, vale a pena para lanche rápido em Veneza! paninis, pizzas e focaccias. Preços entre €3,80 e 4,50.
reviews.title: Ótima pizza

reviews.text: In questo locale diverse e gustose pizze al taglio. Senza dubbio ottime le farine per la loro composizione. Soffice e medio alta. Andrebbe migliorato il condimento che sembra appena sufficiente di quantità. Qualità buona. Cucina a vista.
reviews.title: per un pasto veloce

reviews.text: Todos os sabores são maravilhosos! Custam em média 3,50 euro, o tamanho é perfeito! Não deixe de provar a zucchine com Parma!
reviews.title: A melhor pizza de veneza

reviews.text: We kept walking passed here & saying how yummy the pizza's looked in the window. So one night we decided to give it a try. Excellent pizza's. A few different options to choose from. Order by the slice. Portions are decent with a nice thick base.
reviews.title: Delicious!

reviews.text: Petit endroit très conviviale très bon sprtiz et accompagnements seul problème vite remplis par les habitués.
reviews.title: GENIAL

reviews.text:
En un ambiente moderno y con mucha calidez de atención se encuentra este hermoso lugar donde se puede probar Pizza ( la mas rica que he probado en Venecia ) y pasta ( excelente calidad .
Tiene la opción por la tarde de tomar un aperitivo acompañado de una tabla de pequeñas degustaciones.
El precio es accesible y sin duda volvería .
El día que lo conocimos almorzamos y cenamos .
Se encuentra muy cerca del Rialto a 300 mts.
No se lo pierdan !!
reviews.title: 100 % recomendable , imposible de que se lo pierdan !!

reviews.text: We found Farini whilst walking back to the Rialto bridge. They have a great selection of pizza/ ciabatta sandwiches, salads, pastries and drinks. Its not just your average cafe. We visited several times as the price was really reasonable and service was extremely quick!
reviews.title: Great place for a quick bite

reviews.text: I was really pleased to stumble across this! Affordable slices of pizza, great tasting and lovely service. I also enjoyed sitting inside, it has a great vibe and appears to have a nice selection of drinks including beer, wine and cocktails.
reviews.title: Fantastic find!

name: Trattoria da Denis
address: Salizzada dei Greci, 3305, 30122 Venice Italy

reviews.text: Siamo rimasti davvero soddisfatti sia dei piatti di pesce, sia del fegato alla veneziana! Tutto veramente gustoso!
reviews.title: Ottima cena

reviews.text:
Excellent ,très belle expérience avec un accueil très sympa ,le poisson est très bien cuisiné et les assiettes sont généreuses 
Merci à toute l équipe
reviews.title: Excellent ,très belle expérience

reviews.text: Il cibo davvero ottimo, i prezzi leggermente sopra la media ma non eccessivi come ci si aspetta da Venezia.
reviews.title: Cena a Venezia

reviews.text:
Y avons été deux soirées : la première par hasard, le deuxième par choix !
Des plats délicieux pour un prix raisonnable (un menu à 20€ hors dessert et boissons)
personnel accueillant et efficace
un cadre typique 2 rues derrière le grand canal
Que demander de plus ?
reviews.title: Bonne surprise

reviews.text:
Good food,good service . The mussels and clams were delicious, the sardines in saor were good and the lasagna lasagna were very good.

Prices are acceptable.
reviews.title: Good little place not far from San Marco

reviews.text: Ottima cucina, personale cordiale, tipica trattoria dai piatti buonissimi e dall'ambiente piacevole . Non si tratta del solito ristorante"acchiappaturisti" ma di un vero ristorante di cucina locale e italiana. Complimenti
reviews.title: Cene a Venezia

reviews.text:
With a family of four, we spent a great and relaxing time. Customized service with tips for the visit of Venice. 
Very fresh fish of the day, linguine with sea food huge and varied, spicy pasta just as it should be. 
Quite street with great music atmosphere.
reviews.title: Perfect Sunday lunch

reviews.text: After some bad experiences with food in Venice, this place was a great find. Reasonably priced, friendly and prompt service, GREAT food. They were really helpful dealing with a dairy allergy too and remembered our order when we went back. Would really recommend!
reviews.title: Fair pricing in this great little find!

reviews.text: After a few days trying different restaurants in Venice, discovering this restaurant was a god send. Great Italian food by Italians.
reviews.title: Best local ITALIAN restaurant!

reviews.text: Découverte par hasard, cette trattoria située à proximité de l’hôtel s’est révélée être une petite merveille gustative. Tout y est bon de l’entrée au plat sans oublier le dessert. C’est le meilleur restaurant dans lequel j’ai pu manger à Venise. Je le recommande vraiment.
reviews.title: Une petite merveille.

reviews.text: Das Essen war sehr gut und frisch zubereitet. Pasta auf den Punkt gekocht und auch der Fisch war sehr gut. Aufmerksamer und freundlicher Service. Preislich ok. Kommen wieder
reviews.title: Essen sehr gut

reviews.text:
Volendoci allontanare un po' dai clamori di Pzza San Marco, abbiamo trovato questa trattoria perdendoci tra le calle limitrofe. Menù del giorno a 20 euro con 4 scelte di primi e 4 secondi. Noi abbiamo optato per spaghetti alle vongole e calamari fritti. Porzioni abbondanti e molto gustose. Abbiamo aggiunto anche un antipasto misto di mare, con diverse ottime proposte calde e fredde. Grand finale, tiramisù cremoso e fatto in casa.
Servizio accogliente e caloroso di un ragazzo gentile. Acqua e coperti, totale 58€. Consigliato!!!. Saluti da Elena ed Elisa
reviews.title: Cibo e servizio eccellenti!

reviews.text: Situé dans le quartier du Castello on s'éloigne des restaurants a touristes qui entourent le quartier San Marco. Service de qualité et tarifs raisonnables. Côté assiette nous avons pris des tagliatelles aux fruits de mer délicieuses. Les produits sont de qualité.
reviews.title: Bonne adresse à l'écart de San Marco

reviews.text:
Ein perfekter Abend: hervorragender Gastgeber, freundlich, aufmerksam und witzig. Fantastische traditionelle Küche mit frischen Zutaten leckerer gekocht ohne schnick schnack zu einem sehr fairen Preis (Menu del giorno 19 €).
Super empfehlenswert
Terrfic traditional Italian food at a very fair price brought to you by superfriendly staff. If you're into seafood, try the special of the house. But also the fairpriced menus of the day 19 € are delicious
reviews.title: Geheimtipp - a hidden gem

reviews.text:
La cucina divina di Denis è assolutamente meravigliosa.personale ottimo e cortese.
Da provare anche in famiglia
reviews.title: La cucina divina di Denis

reviews.text:
Mi sono imbattuta in questo piccolo locale durante la mia visita a Venezia. 
Che dire.... Tutto delizioso! Abbiamo preso come "antipasto" una saltata di cozze da dividere in due (da provare!) e successivamente un fritto misto.
Due mezzi litri di vino bianco della casa (9€ l'uno) per un totale di un pranzo di 70€ in due... Consigliato!!
reviews.title: Le cozze saltate.... Un gourmet 😋

reviews.text: Ho letto molte recensioni positive quindi avevo buone aspettative. invece..posto orribile, cibo decente a malapena e conto SALATISSIMO. Per un antipasto diviso in 2, 2 porzioni di pasta, 1|2 prosecco della casa, 1/2 rosso della casa (pieno di fondi) e 2 sorbetti 100 euro. Considerando che le quantità sono abbondanti ma a scapito della qualità e che il posto è veramente trascurato e sporco 100 euro sono veramente te esagerati!! MAI PIÙ
reviews.title: Da evitare

reviews.text:
Ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo e spritz generoso.
Gentili e disponibili in location perfetta 
Da rifare
reviews.title: Ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo

reviews.text: I have been to Venice a half dozen times and have always ended up eating at the touristy joints with pictures of food on the menu.  This time I had an apartment a stone's throw away from Trattoria da Denis and enjoyed dinner there my first night so much that I went back the next two nights. All of their food is wonderful.  The service is friendly and helpful.  The beer and wine selections are solid.  Definitely a place to go back to any time I return to the city!
reviews.title: My favorite place to eat in Venezia

reviews.text: We have eaten here a couple of times during our stay in Venice, they really have amazing food! From pizza to pasta, whatever we have tried was yummy. The staff always made us feel welcome and greet us with a smile. They also offer gluten free options. Cannot wait to go back 😊
reviews.title: Amazing food, friendly staff

reviews.text: Nous y sommes allés deux fois pour y diner et à chaque fois c'était très bon. Excellent accueil (le serveur nous a offert plusieurs liqueurs à goûter). Excellent rapport qualité/prix. Je ne comprends pas les commentaires négatifs. Recommandé chaudement.
reviews.title: Très bon

reviews.text: Wir waren schon vorbeigelaufen als die junge Meute Hunger anzeigte - sehr deutsch mittags um 12.00 Uhr. Wir waren die ersten und wurden sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend aufgenommen. Später füllte sich der Laden an diesem Werktag mit Arbeitern und Angestellten der Umgebung. Das günstige Menü für 18 Euro hängt nur draußen und ist es wert. Alle waren zufrieden, und wir haben den Laden mit einem guten Gefühl verlassen.
reviews.title: Mittagsmenü mit Familie gut und günstig

reviews.text:
Petite  tratorria  légèrement éloignée de  la  place st marc 
Plutôt resto de  locaux 
Tout est  bon   bien cuisine le  personnel est sympa 
L addition aussi
reviews.title: Apres la  place  st  marc

reviews.text:
Excellent food! Great service!
אוכל ונציאני טיפוסי, טעים מאד! דגים ופירות ים טריים ועשויים מאד טוב.
Had a great dinner! Fresh fish and sea food prepared in typical Venezia style
reviews.title: Excellent food! Great service!

reviews.text: Брали menu del giorno. Вкусно, но цены выше, чем обычно в Венеции для обеденного меню, а порции меньше
reviews.title: Есть места получше

reviews.text: Nous avons mangé dans cette tratorria en dehors des heures classiques, nous avons été chaleureusement accueilis et servis. Saint Jacques, bresaola et risotto le tout arrosé d une bouteille de prosecco bio. Très bon sans chichis simple et goutu. Addition toute douce aussi alors qu on est à peine hors du cœur touristique. Endroit à visiter.
reviews.title: Chaleureux et bon !

reviews.text: Had a fantastic dinner. Only 18 euro for two courses. Superb waiter and house white wine was lovely and very reasonable. I would highly recommend this restaurant. Been twice last year and went back again today. Beautiful atmosphere and loved it!!!
reviews.title: Had a fantastic dinner. Only

reviews.text:
C'est un peu à l'écart de la San Marco, mais pas trop loin quand même et c'est surtout fréquenté par des habitués qui connaissent les bonnes adresses.

On a beaucoup aimé leurs pâtes bien relevées, bien cuisinées avec encre de seiche et fruits de mer.
reviews.title: Denis, Venise

reviews.text:
I found this lovely restaurant on my last evening in Venice.

I had decided in advance that I was having Pizza, however the menu looked amazing. I overheard a vegetarian diner extolling the virtues of his dish.

It is about a ten minute walk from S. Marks Square. It’s worth the walk.
reviews.title: I found a lovely restaurant

reviews.text: Comida típica, excelente y buen servicio. Tienen pasta sin gluten!!!!!Muy cerca del centro sin que te asalten en la puerta para que Comas en su restaurante, es el restaurante ideal !!! Tranquilo, gente local y os recomendaria la Tagliata!!! Espectacular! La pasta tambien y de Postre Tiramisú!!! De los mejores! De verdad q vale la pena.
reviews.title: Comida típica, excelente y

reviews.text:
We were meandering along looking for a place for lunch and came across this busy trattoria. I’m always happy to go somewhere busy, because it usually means the food is good.
It was! And plentiful-portions are enormous, so if you don’t have a big appetite, order one plate between two.
We ordered a plate of Italian cheeses to share, which probably would have fed four and included a delicious ginger-flavoured jam accompaniment.
My husband had prosciutto and burrata and I had cod brandade (which had lovely fish mousse topped crostini and slivers of grilled polenta)
All in all, the food was really good. We were watching steaming plates of pasta going past, as well as giant rounds of freshly cooked pizza.
I would highly recommend.
Prices fair
reviews.title: Lovely local Restaurant

reviews.text: 2 spritz. Senza patatine olive o arachidi. Niente select. 12 euro. Rifiutato il pagamento con carta di credito. Non ci siamo
reviews.title: Aperitivo indigesto

reviews.text: We chanced upon this hidden gem by accident and came back every evening for the rest of our stay. Close to our hotel, small, cozy with a great choice of menu. Generous portions at reasonable prices for Venice. Fish of the day is one of the best we’ve eaten. Staff are friendly and welcoming. We saw the same visitors coming back on several occasions as we did, all agreeing how fantastic it was.
reviews.title: Fabulous discovery
reviews.userLocation: Willaston on the Wirral, United Kingdom

reviews.text:
Можно заказать всё, что угодно и это будет очень вкусно. Особенно морепродукты.
Всё очень гармонично: интерьер-обслуживание-еда-вино, картинка складывается как паззл.
Мы остались очень довольны и с ощущением, что наши ожидания превзойдены.
reviews.title: Очень вкусно!

reviews.text: As we were wandering past, we spotted this place and it looked cosy and more genuine than some of the touristy restaurants we had passed. We just popped in for a couple of pizzas which were very good. It was busy enough and there were locals eating here too. Staff were friendly and efficient. Recommended.
reviews.title: Popped in for lunch

reviews.text: Locale piccolo ma carino, camerieri gentilissimi e professionali...piatti dalla cucina ottimi con prezzi onestissimi!!!
reviews.title: Tutto ok!!!

reviews.text: ristorante piccolino, non molto turistico, molto buona la pasta. abbiamo prenotato con the fork usufruendo dello sconto. camerieri molto discreti. rapporto qualita/prezzo adeguato. consigliati i tagliolini neri con capesante e olive taggiasche
reviews.title: molto buono

reviews.text: Gustato piatti veneziani in locale informale. Rapporto qualità-prezzo onesto. Non la classica trappola per turisti.
reviews.title: Buon cibo in ambiente easy

reviews.text: Eravamo di passaggio ed ho chiesto se si poteva consumare un caffè al banco e ci è stato risposto di sì. Caffè molto amaro perché l’ho pagato due euro a tazzina in piedi vicino alla cassa, non mi è mai successo a Venezia neanche in posti più blasonati. La furbizia non paga, perché sarà un posto che eviterò in futuro.
reviews.title: Caffè salato

reviews.text:
Mi colpiscono i 2 € di coperto, quando a Venezia ci sono posti molto più raffinati nell’ambiente e nel modo in cui presentano il tavolo che mettono il coperto a 1,5€. 
Poi il menù dovrebbe essere meno equivoco: i piatti che si preparano x min. 2 persone riportano sempre il prezzo totale, qui invece il risotto x min. 2 persone viene marcato a 16€ e solo quando paghi ti rendi conto che si intendono a persona. Una bottiglia d’acqua 4€ mi sembra davvero caro. Il personale è cortese ma chi ci ha servito sembrava venisse dalla luna: non capiva il concetto di acqua effervescente naturale, di pinta e di un’altra cosa che adesso non ricordo ma che fa parte del vocabolario italiano come le altre due ed io e mia moglie ci siamo chiesti se non ci stesse prendendo in giro. Detto questo, il cibo è buono, il posto carino ma l’esperienza in generale è stata deludente rispetto ad ogni altro posto dove siamo stati e non ci tornerei, anche perché si spende mi mica poco.
reviews.title: Cibo buono ma non tornerò

reviews.text: This lovely little restaurant was close to our hotel and we had dinner there 5 times in a week. We took our American friends there and they asked to go back again as the food and service was much better than their 4* hotel. There's a good variety of dishes on the menu, even though neither of us can eat fish. Every day they had special offers, which were exceptionally good value and very tasty. Sam and Fridi are both superb waiters, with Sam being very helpful explaining dishes as he served us every time we went in there. All the dishes are cooked to order and the liver cooked Italian style is amazingly tasty so I ordered it on two occasions! Shame this lovely little restaurant isn't near where we live in England as we'd be in there on a very regular basis!
reviews.title: A hidden jem in a quiet area with excellent service.

reviews.text: Recommended by Marco at my hotel, this place was welcoming, busy, a simple menu with lots of local choices. I chose grilled fish, just wanting a light meal. It was a huge plate of fish and shellfish, absolutely delicious, fresh, a great house red washed it down, less than 50 euros, which isn't bad for Venice!
reviews.title: Delicious!

reviews.text: My daughter and I ate lunch here on our first day because it was the first place we came to and we were hungry. It was so good, we came back for dinner last night. Really friendly service and great food. What more do you need? Well, good wine, lovely location, Billie Holliday in the background, 5 mins from our apartment. Great place to eat - unpretentious & good value.
reviews.title: Good food, good value, lovely service

reviews.text: On a mangé leur spécialité de fruits de mer avec un petit vin italien très sympa. Service très agréable même si un petit peu long. Plat un peu épicé mais supportable et goûteux. A faire et refaire!
reviews.title: Très très sympa!

reviews.text: my wife a i went there twice because it was a great  experiance for us: the different plates we took (both times) were very tasty, ther staff was very nice, helpfull and proffecional,the price was more than fair and the atmosphere  of the area was cosy.
reviews.title: a real pleasure

reviews.text: Das Essen war super lecker, der Service super nett. Wir waren 3 Abende hinter einander hier. Sehr zu empfehlen.
reviews.title: Lecker

reviews.text: Excelente cocina. Magnífica atención. Buen sitio. Muy concurrido. Nos comimos la mejor lassagna que jamás hemos probado.
reviews.title: Excelente

reviews.text:
Mi era stato consigliato dal Direttore del mio Hotel, e sono passata di persona a prenotare un tavolo al
Mattino, x verificare la
Location ( dovevo organizzare 3 pranzi cn gruppi di giornalisti tv e operatori della Rai, in una trattoria della zona ) ed essendo con la mia famiglia con un bimbo piccolo ho chiesto un tavolo lontano dalla porta x evitare a cena di far prendere freddo a mio figlio! Ho specificato l'orario e il tavolo che desideravo, e il cameriere mi ha assicurato che tutto era confermato! Verso sera passo davanti al locale x rientrare in hotel e vedo che il tavolo era occupato e mancava poco piu' di mezz'ora! Chiamo il ristorante per chiedere rassicurazioni sul fatto che alle 19.30
Il tavolo fosse libero per il ns arrivo, il ragazzo che mi risponde al telefono mi conferma che il tavolo verra' liberato ma che l'orario della prenotazione era alle 20, peccato perche' mio figlio piccolo cena sempre vs le 19-19.30.... comunque mi rassicura che alle 20 il tavolo sara' disponibile!!! E invece....al ns arrivo il tavolo era ancora occupato e indovinate dove ci hanno spostato con il tavolo? In quello all'ingresso con la porta aperta, e anche se la chiudevano ogni volta che entravano o uscivano i clienti mio figlio avrebbe preso freddo...
Per tutta risposta uno dei cameriere mi dice: Signora sono dalle 18 che sono qui! 
Affari vostri! Se non avete la capacita' e la professionalita' di saper gestire tavoli e prenotazioni 
Non immaginate il disagio!
A mai piu'.......
reviews.title: Professionalita' pari a zero

reviews.text: On the last night of our stay,went here for a lovely meal,we was not disappointed, food and service excellent, staff friendly and helpful, will definitely use again, lovely atmosphere..
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.text: We were recommended to this excellent little trattoria by the reception manager at our hotel and he gauged our needs perfectly.  Set a few streets back from the bustle of the main tourist areas, the welcome is polite and friendly and the food is uniformly delicious and excellent value for money.  We were perfectly happy with the quality of the house wine and agreeably surprised by our final bill.   indeed, we were all so impressed that we found ourselves back there for dinner again a couple of nights later!  Thoroughly recommended.
reviews.title: Recommendation was absolutely "spot on"!

reviews.text: Trovato casualmente con alcuni amici. Limitati coperti in ambiente tipico con personale cortese e professionale. Menu a base di piatti locali fatti come conviene ad un prezzo più che ragionevole. Il locale era pieno, meglio telefonare.
reviews.title: Piacevole sorpresa

reviews.text: Abbiamo preso il menù turistico a 20 euro . Spaghetti alle vongole buoni anche se le vongole sono le lupine e non le veraci. Fegato alla veneziana ottimo. Mezzo litro di vino della casa 9 euro forse un po’ eccessivo. Acqua da un litro 4 euro forse un po’ troppo come il caffè 2 euro e il tiramisù 6 euro. Nel complesso buon cibo . Da provare
reviews.title: Qualità ok , prezzo bevande e dolci un po’ meno

reviews.text: Non è la solita trappola per turisti, tutto eccellente. Porzioni abbondanti, ricche e saporite. Due primi, spaghetti alle vongole e tagliatelle gamberi e zucchine. Secondo: seppie al nero e come dessert tiramisù. Davvero tutto eccellente. Prezzi nella media per Venezia ma almeno mangi prodotti di qualità. Consigliatissimo.
reviews.title: Ottimo ristorante scelto per caso

reviews.text: Trattoria molto carina. Le linguine alla scogliera sono state veramente ottime e il servizio eccellente. Ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo. Lo consiglio
reviews.title: Una bella scoperta

reviews.text: Meine Frau und ich haben das Lokal über tripadvisor entdeckt und ausprobiert und waren begeistert. Wir sind am nächsten Abend gleich wieder mit drei Freunden hin, die fanden es ebenfalls toll.  Alle Speisen sehr gut, wir hatten unter anderem Spaghetti Vongole, venezianische Leber, Spaghetti, diverse Fischgerichte.  Ein sehr tolles Angebot ist das zweigängige Menue, das am Eingang hängt, aber nicht nochmal extra in der Karte steht: zwei vollwertige Gänge für 16€, sehr gut.  Die Bedienungen sehr nett, aufmerksam und witzig.  Beim Bezahlen gibt es immer ein Getränk aufs Haus.  Wir kommen wieder nach Venedig und wir werden wieder hier einkehren.
reviews.title: Hervorragendes Essen, zuvorkommender Service, einfach Klasse!

reviews.text:
Restaurante muito agradável, atendimento sensacional e o prato da casa foi eleito como melhor comida da viagem 
SENSACIONAL 
VALE A PENA DEMAIS !!!
Conexão Brasil-Portugal
reviews.title: Férias  com amigos

reviews.text: Nicht allzu teures Lokal, wenn man davon absieht, dass Pastaspeisen unter 16€ eine Seltenheit sind. Das Service wirkt bemüht und die Qualität ist in Ordnung - nicht aufregend, aber auch kein Nepp.
reviews.title: Bemühtes, günstiges Lokal

reviews.text: Primi piatti superlativi, anche se io e la mia famiglia abbiamo preso dei piatti di pesce in genere costosi li abbiamo pagati due spicci. Alta qualità del pesce e servizio da ristorante di lusso. In sala c'è sempre musica anni 80'' ma non da fastidio lo consiglio a tutti😁😁
reviews.title: Sbalorditivo

reviews.text:
Accueil très sympathique, conseils avisés quand au choix des plats, et de merveilleuses saveurs dans l’assiette ! Adeptes de crustacés et fruits de mer, le fish mix est à tomber. 
Une parfaite soirée 👌🏻.
reviews.title: Meilleure trattoria de Castello

reviews.text: Half of the time, the food is quite bad in Venice at all these tourist trap. However, we were pleasantly surprised that this place actually served some edible food on our last night in Venice. We ordered bigola with anchovies, plain pasta pomodoro and chicken escalope Milanese which were decent. Service was also good, and pricing as expected in Venice.
reviews.title: Didn't expect to have decent food here.....

reviews.text: Dans un beau quartier de Venise, trattoria où l’on est accueillis avec des grands sourires et malgré le va et vient incessant des touristes on ne se considère pas comme tel avec le staff de ce restaurant qui est aux petits soins ! Merci pour ces bons moments passés chez vous et pour tous les conseils de visite. Arivederci !
reviews.title: Accueil exceptionnel

reviews.text: We had dinner here on our last night in Venice celebrating a birthday. Excellent food, very charming service. We wish had tried the place sooner.
reviews.title: Excellent!

reviews.text: Just off the beaten path, a gentle cosy restaurant inside and outside. Frequented by locals. The staff were friendly and helpful. And knowledgeable. Great pizzas and GF pasta. Enjoy
reviews.title: Lovely relaxed lunch

reviews.text:
Это тот случай, когда все настолько хорошо, что хочется никому не рассказывать.)) Очень и очень классное место - начиная от персонала, цен и заканчивая качеством блюд. Невероятно вкусная паста, пицца и морепродукты! Ещё очень вкусный лимончелло! (Пробовали и в других городах Италии, но именно тут самый вкусный) всем советуем! 

The best place to eat great Italian food: pasta, pizza, seafood! Best service! And we’ve tried the best limoncello here)) definitely recommend for everybody!  

Mr. Pasha, Ms. Nastya :)
reviews.title: Best Venice trattoria

reviews.text: La trattoria è accogliente, il personale gentile. Il rapporto qualità prezzo è buono per gli standard di Venezia, il cibo è ottimo e le porzioni grandi. Le scaloppine con vino bianco e limone erano ottime e la porzione generosa, inoltre era compreso un contorno di verdure, io ho preso i fritti di verdure ottimi anche essi, ho avuto un po' di difficoltà a finire il tutto. Ho assaggiato anche la pasta allo scoglio ed era buona anche essa, forse la porzione un poco ridotta ma sempre sufficiente.
reviews.title: Eccellente!

reviews.text: I had a great lunch here! I ordered the menu of the day. They had different typical Italian options, but I opted for the Venetian option. I got a pasta with clams and it was a healthy portion and the polenta with calamari was flavorful! I ate alone, but was welcomed by the friendly staff. I greatly enjoyed eating my meal outside while I people watched. I recommend this location for the friendly staff, decently priced meal, and quiet atmosphere.
reviews.title: Quiet location with flavorful food

reviews.text: Super restau. Accueil et accompagnement présent mais discret. Cuisine faite maison top  on peut manger dans la rue
reviews.title: Petit restaurant italien  un vrai

reviews.text: I was reffered to this restaurant by my hotel concerirge. Best traditional italian food on my trip to italy so far. Service was amazing
reviews.title: Amazing experiance

reviews.text: Un petit restaurant au bout d'une rue de Venise près d'un canal... La cuisine est très savoureuse, nous y avons diné deux fois et nous sommes régalés. L'accueil est par ailleurs très sympathique et l'ambiance est tranquille et chaleureuse.
reviews.title: Délicieux !

reviews.text:
Restaurante agradable, en barrio tranquilo, fuera de la aglomeración turística. Los camareros fueron amables y simpáticos. Servicio lento. Los mosquitos y el calor nos hicieron incómoda la cena en la terraza.
Respecto a la comida, las pizzas nos decepcionaron. Sin embargo, disfrutamos de dos platos de pasta deliciosa, una con sepia y otra con frutos del mar.
reviews.title: Calidad irregular

reviews.text: Durante la nostra permanenza a Venezia abbiamo cenato più volte in questo ristorante. Personale giovane e gentile, cucina ottima. Menù che comprendeva un primo e un secondo (consiglio fettuccine alle zucchine e gamberi e calamari fritti) al giusto prezzo.
reviews.title: Da provare

reviews.text: This was one of the first places we went to on a 2 week trip to Italy and it was good enough to stand with places 4x more expensive in Rome as one of our favorite places to eat.  Highly recommend
reviews.title: Great place for a meal!

reviews.text:
Ottimo ristorante non molto lontano da Piazza San Marco! Locale accogliente e servizio veloce e molto gentile. Piatti veramente squisiti, consiglio i tortelli ripieni di spigola, ottimi. Porzioni più che sufficienti. Prezzo onesto, noi abbiamo prenotato questo posticino con TheFork e non abbiamo riscontrato nessun problema per usufruire dello sconto. 
Super consigliato!
reviews.title: Non è la solita trappola per turisti!! 😉

reviews.text: Ristorante carino, personale gentile e vivo ottimo. Abbiamo mangiato del baccalà mantecato e del baccalà alla vicentina straordinari, capesante ottime, una frittura di pesce e dei ravioli ripieni di branzino buonissimi . Conto nella norma. Da consigliare assolutamente
reviews.title: Assolutamente da consigliare

reviews.text: Had our last meal in venice here and it did not disappoint. Great service and quality food away from the chaos of the main square👌
reviews.title: Great food

reviews.text: Consiglio vivamente questa piccola  trattoria Cibo eccellente molto fresco e servizio ottimo.da ritornare .
reviews.title: Fantastico

reviews.text: Personale attento e simpatico, cibo ottimo e abbondante. La frittura tenerissima, le linguine squisite. Consigliatissimo per qualità e prezzo
reviews.title: Eccezionale

reviews.text: Abbiamo prenotato una cena su the fork per le 21.30. Abbiamo atteso 10 minuti per accomodarci visto che tutti i tavoli erano occupati. Non sappiamo se ci fossero dei problemi in cucina o forse perché era sabato sera, dall'evasione della comanda ci hanno portato l`antipasto dopo circa un'ora. Il cibo era comunque squisito quindi nonostante l'attesa lo consigliamo vivamente. Rapporto qualità/prezzo ottima e personale molto cortese.
reviews.title: Buona cena peccato per l'attesa

reviews.text:
This restaurant was near our accommodation and we almost didn't go due to the last review calling it a tourist trap!  Can't understand it.  The food was authentic and delcious. Home made pasta and great wine.  All at a reasonable price.
The staff were all lovely. If you are in the area do give it a visit.  We visited for dinner in June 2019.  Some people have called it a hidden gem, I would agree.
reviews.title: SO NOT A TOURIST TRAP!

reviews.text: Locale accogliente e personale gentile. Cibo molto buono e porzioni veramente abbondanti! Consigliatissimo!
reviews.title: Delizioso!

reviews.text: Piatti cucinati in modo delizioso e curato (anche tipici), ben bilanciati da ogni punto di vista. Tavolini esterni sulla calle che dà sul canale. Siamo stati benissimo anche grazie all'arietta che tirava e alla cameriera gentilissima davvero, sempre sorridente e non invadente come oggi è difficile trovarne. Bagni puliti, conto super ok.
reviews.title: Piatti ottimi, prezzo ottimo, personale ottimo

reviews.text: Frequentatore assiduo di Venezia in una giornata piovosa butto l'occhio nel locale. Andiamo al sodo:  anche se la gestione NON è Veneta (cosa quasi introvabile a Venezia....purtroppo) il cibo è di buona qualità (la polenta pure...quindi molto bene).  Il locale è piccolo ma ha la piacevole sorpresa di avere delle toilette ampie e pulite (cosa quasi introvabile a Venezia).  Servizio al tavolo molto buono come le porzioni (abbondanti) e di buona qualità.  Sicuramente consigliato visto che si trova nel cammino tra (il retro) di San Marco e l'Arsenale....a due passi dalla meravigliosa chiesa dei Greci e dalla squola Dalmata del Carpaccio
reviews.title: Promosso

reviews.text: A solo 5 minutos de la plaza San Marcos encontramos este restaurante con un menú de 18 euros, con varios platos de buena calidad (ver fotos) y bastante cantidad. Una suerte salir de toda la aglomeración de turistas y encontrar un sitio donde se come mejor y sin la inflación de precios de otros lados. El servicio muy bueno también.
reviews.title: Buena comida fuera de la aglomeración turística

reviews.text:
Nous avons découvert par hasard ce petit restaurant situé dans une petite rue, accueil sympathique et avenant. Menu à 19€ très très bien.
Ne pas hésiter.
reviews.title: Bonne adresse souriante et accueillante

reviews.text: Accueil souriant mais pas collant. Du choix mais pas trop. Menu à 19€. Nous avons pris des spaghettis aux clams et des tagliatelles aux gambas et aux courgettes, puis escalope panée frites et calamars frits avec tempura de légumes. Tout très bon !
reviews.title: Bon et accueillant

reviews.text: Venezia ci ha accolto con una giornata molto piovosa e come per volerci ricompensare ci ha fatto notare una lavagnetta dove venivano indicati dei piatti molto invitanti. Siamo entrati e la ricompensa è stata ampia, all'interno ci aspettava un ristorante molto carino gestito da due ragazzi molto gentili e sorridenti. I piatti erano molto belli e ancor di più buoni. Siamo rimasti molto soddisfatti e appagati.
reviews.title: Una bella sorpresa

reviews.text: Come al solito ci hanno trattato divinamente; cordialissimi, disponibili, sempre attenti. Piatti ottimi, freschi, cucinati benissimo e porzioni più che abbondanti. E poi, prezzi giusti!!! Sempre consigliatissimo.
reviews.title: Cena di Pasqua

reviews.text: Siamo stati a pranzo in questo locale e purtroppo i piatti non ci hanno soddisfatto. Le pizze e anche i primi piatti sono surgelati. Il personale è molto gentile ed il locale curato. Peccato per i piatti.
reviews.title: Personale gentile ma piatti surgelati

reviews.text:
Rien de surfait dans ce restaurant à quelques pas du tumulte de la Place Saint Marc. Déco très simple certes, mais l’important est ailleurs : vous serez accueillis et servis pas un jeune couple très souriant et gentil au possible ! J’avais opté pour un bar (entier) excellent et mon conjoint pour le foie de veau à la vénitienne. Le tout très bien préparé et servi avec le sourire. 
2 plats, 2 desserts, 2 bières et une bouteille d’eau : 63 €. Du coup, nous y sommes retournés une seconde fois pour dîner durant notre week-end de 3 jours.
Service peut-être un peu lent en effet, mais c’était le soir et on avait le temps : on était en vacances !!
reviews.title: Perfetto !

reviews.text: Despite the friendly service and nice looking decoration don’t get fooled. The fried calamari were average at best, but my partner ordered a pizza and what they served us was an industrial precooked something vaguely resembling a pizza, exactly the same stuff you would buy frozen from the supermarket. Really shameful. They really took us for a granted.
reviews.title: Proper tourist trap. Avoid

reviews.text: WE came across this restaurant as it was very close to our hotel . The young male waiter was very helpful , welcoming and pleasant and helped us with the menu on the 1st visit . The food was delicious , the ambience welcoming and comfortable .. we were not rushed to leave once we had eaten and were given time to finish our drinks .. . Its very reasonable in price and we enjoyed it so much we returned on our 2nd eve. I would definitely recommend a visit . ( its also had plenty of locals eating here .. good sign )
reviews.title: Evening meals

reviews.text:
Thank you so much for such excellent hospitality and gorgeous food.   The standard as always unbeatable.  
We were so lucky to have found you on our first visit to Venice in 2017, from a recommendation.  So to arrive for Carnevale and visit you again was a real 5 star treat.  Nothing like being spoilt ....thank you!
Looking forward to our next visit .....
reviews.title: Absolutely superb...again!!

reviews.text:
Nous cherchions un restaurant éloigné des parcours touristiques et nous avons découvert par hasard ce restaurant.
Espace clair et aéré. Personnel souriant et à l'écoute.
Plats goûteux avec des prix raisonnables.
Nous vous le tecommandons si vous cherchez un peu de calme dans cette ville effervescente lors du Carnaval de Venise.
John
reviews.title: Surprise

reviews.text: Très bien accueillis et très bien servis. Les plats sont excellents et le restaurant est très bien situé dans une ruelle à quelques minutes de la piazza San Marco. Je recommande
reviews.title: Je conseille vivement

reviews.text: Happened to find this great restaurant while mooching around Venice.  It is in the quieter area Castello close to San Marco, Inhabited by locals which is always a good sign I had the lunchtime fish set menu 2 courses and a coffee (20 Euros). Food was excellent and service by the young waiting staff great too. A caraf of vino Bianco della casa (9 Euro). Great food, great prices.
reviews.title: Superb great value lunch

reviews.text:
Comimos platos sencillos, pero muy bien hechos, muy ricos, y postres también muy buenos.
El precio, bueno, teniendo en cuenta que está en el Sestiere de Castello y, por aquí, los precios no son bajos.
A destacar el personal, extraordinario, amable y cordial.
reviews.title: Disfrutar cenando

reviews.text:
Bon service personnel agréable. 
Assiette de jambon cru généreuse partagée à 2 en entrée suivie d'un risotto aux fruits de mer. Simple et efficace. 
Vin blanc, pinot grigio, bien aromatique.
reviews.title: Bonne adresse

reviews.text:
Di ritorno dal giro delle comunità minori dei Dalmati un'ottima soluzione per un pranzo veloce e di qualità con tanti spuntini e di gusto.
Consigliato
reviews.title: Un'ottima soluzione

reviews.text:
Fuimos cuando estaba casi todo cerrado, pasamos por delante y vimos que había menú por 18 euros el de carne y 20 el de pescado. Entramos y pedimos los dos el de carne, de primero espagueti a la carbonara, muy buenos y caseros o lasaña. La mejor lasaña que he probado en mucho tiempo.
De segundo higado que no probamos ninguno y escalope con salsa de vino blanco. Muy rico también, venía acompañado con unas patatas fritas industriales, pero obviando ese detalle, delicioso. Pedimos también de postre panacota con mermelada de fresa. Muy muy rica.
