Das empfohlene Menü außerhalb der Karte zeigte sich als gute Wahl, wenngleich zu gehobenen venezianischen Preisen (3 Gänge plus kleine Gazpacho, 3 Getränke 117.-)
Nette Ober beherrschen ihr Metier.
reviews.title: Willkommene Auszeit vom Rummel

reviews.text: La Linea d'ombra dipone di un locale al chiuso e di una piattaforma sull'acqua dalla quale si gode una vista mozzafiato su San Giorgio e La Giudecca. Già questo giustifica la scelta. In più, la cucina è molto curata, con piatti mai banali. Pesce cotto alla perfezione. Personale gentile e semplice. E' un locale costoso, ma il prezzo è del tutto adeguato a quel che offre. Ideale per una serata da ricordare.
reviews.title: Collocazione splendida. Cucina raffinata

reviews.text:
*we had dinner at Lineadombra for Redentore so this review might not be indicative of the experience on other days

The location is spectacular and ideal to watch the Redentore fireworks. The service was nice and efficient. The price is high (EUR 350 per person) but includes drinks and, again, a view that is second to none. 

The food that evening was ok but really nothing to call home about.

We already look forward to visit again to sample the burrata people are raving about.
reviews.title: Amazing location. Average* food.

reviews.text:
Right over the guidecca canal; a great spot to watch the world go by and very romantic.

We had a fabulous meal with great service.  Pricey but good.  Would recommend to friends.
reviews.title: Fab location

reviews.text:
Nous y sommes arrivés par hasard pour nous abriter car la pluie est soudainement tombée avec renfort de grêlons sur les coups de 18h30 ! L’equipe mangeait et acceptait que nous nous abritions avant le service en nous offrant un apéritif ! 

Nous y avons donc mangé et nous ne furent pas déçus ! Très bon et bon rapport qualité prix ! 
Bonne adresse sur Venise avec un service de grand qualité
reviews.title: Excellent !

reviews.text:
Junto á Dogana e Santa Maria de la Salute um belo terraço sobre o canal da Giudecca. Uma boa escolha para o final do dia. Não é barato, mas o padrão é alto. Excelente serviço, com opções vocacionadas para o mar. Carta de vinhos estilo catálogo extenso, bem elaborada.
Comida com qualidade e saborosa. Preços ajustados para ocasião especial.
reviews.title: Belo final de visita

reviews.text: Linedombra did not disappoint.  We had arrived from Canada that day and I chose Lineadombra because of it's great reviews and because it was only a 10 min walk from our hotel (SINA Centurion Palace).  It is beautifully situated on the Guidecca canal.  I reserved over a month in advance and requested a corner terrace table to have an uninterrupted view.  We were given our table - which was greatly appreciated.  The service is excellent and low key.  The food was delicious.  The wine selection and their recommendations were excellent (WS Awards for 8 years!) The interior design of the restaurant and washrooms is very modern, clean and cool.  We could not have asked for a better first evening!  We will return for sure.
reviews.title: An absolutely wonderful first night in Venice

reviews.text:
The burrata was sublime. Nothing else matters now. Nothing matters at all. 

Although I must say I didn’t like the pineapple on the tiramisu. Maybe that matters.
reviews.title: The burrata....holy moly artichokey

reviews.text:
It’s a beautiful stroll from the main island, across the Academia Bridge, to the restaurant. It can also be reached by water taxi. Once there the view is incredible and truly relaxing. 5 stars on that front all the way. 

The food is excellent in most cases and in others just good-very good. All in all I would rate the food a 4 1/2. There is no reason to be in a rush with a view like this. Still, the service could be a little more focused. Some folks have viewed the restaurant as overpriced. Considering the location and quality I would not agree but it’s also not a great value. 

Many exceptional aspects and an excellent evening but overall a 4 of 5 rating.
reviews.title: Magical Setting Outside the Crowds

reviews.text: My second time to visit Lineadombra - i made a point of going back after a 5 year absence. I was not disappointed.  The food is fresh, service low key, and setting was beautiful (even though we had to eat inside the restaurant because it was raining).  I'll go back upon my next trip to Venice.
reviews.title: This should be #1

reviews.text: Nous avons attendu une heure entre les hors d'oeuvres et le plat principal, et quand les plats sont arrivés, ils étaient tièdes! Deux clients italiens qui sont arrivés après nous, ont été servis nettement plus rapidement: il y a à l'évidence une discrimination en faveur de certains clients. Le patron, auquel nous avons fait la remarque, s'est immédiatement énervé, devenant très désagréable. Un endroit à ne pas recommander.
reviews.title: Trop cher pour la qualité globale du service et de la nourriture

reviews.text: La vue sur la Guidecca est fabuleuse et le ballet des bateaux enchanteur. La cuisine est raffinée et les produits remarquablement frais. Le service est particulièrement attentif. Mais pourquoi de tels prix déraisonnables pour les vins ? Une énigme. On y reviendra quand même.  Bravo.
reviews.title: MAGNIFIQUE

reviews.text:
This restaurant offered beautiful views and delicious food .
The service was outstanding ! We had the pasta and scorpion fish with lemon , it was the perfect flavor in every bite .
reviews.title: Beautiful Views !

reviews.text:
Le meilleur restaurant de Venise que nous avons testé. 
Un très beau dîner aux chandelles au bord de l’eau ou même ... sur l’eau ! La gastronomie vénitienne majestueusement coordonnée dans l’assiette ou les goûts sont multiples. 
Très belle soirée 
Nous regrettons simplement l’arrogance du manager qui nous a directement refusés le premier soir alors que la terrasse était vide. Visiblement nos shorts ne lui ont pas plu.
reviews.title: Exquis

reviews.text: Estuvimos comiendo el 6 de junio, 46 aniv. de boda. Tuvieron el detalle de traernos un pastelito con dos velas. Buena comida y fantástica atención. Restaurante muy recomendable.
reviews.title: Buen restaurante y magnífica ubicación

reviews.text:
Cuisine fine et recherchée , légère et diversifiée
Très belle carte de vins également
Personnel charmant et attentionné , professionnel également
reviews.title: Un moment de sérénité et de calme en fin de jour ee

reviews.text:
Cet endroit est absolument magnifique. La terrasse se trouve au dessus de l’eau et la vue est grandiose sur la rive opposée du ‘Canale Della Giudecca’. Au soleil couchant c’est enchanteur.. 

La nourriture y est excellente et le service parfait. En revanche pas accessible à toutes les bourses. 

La carte des vins est énorme mais la également, pas donnée.. 

Somme toute à recommander. Nous y retournerons à notre prochain passage.
reviews.title: Ou comment terminer votre journée en beauté?

reviews.text: We were looking for a restaurant for a romantic dinner in Venice.  The atmosphere, location, views, tale and wine all met my expectations.  We had just sailed up the Dalmatian Coast and have been eating fish for a week, so wanted a traditional Italian pasta restaurant.  Unfortunately, this was not it.  We thought about leaving, however before doing so I shared with the waiter what we were looking for...  they totally accommodated our wishes for a rocket salad + pasta that was not on the menu.  It was all very good.  Their Somm guided us on a great bottle of red wine and we had a wonderful romantic dinner.  In the end it was also priced economically for what we ordered...
reviews.title: Excellent Service, Views, Wine and Listened to our Request!

reviews.text:
The location offers an alternative view of Venice from the pontoon. Even on less favourable days the interior is welcoming and comfortable.
The food is seasonal and a different interpretation on produce available locally. The prices reflect the care and attention to detail in each dish. 
Wine available by the glass is high quality and offers a rare opportunity to taste regional wines. Diners can be guided by the staff to food and wine matches outside of the norm in Venice. 
The staff are knowledgeable and provide the right balance of information and attention to the solo diner to make the experience memorable.
reviews.title: Indulgence

reviews.text: Llegamos a este restaurante por casualidad, ibamos sin rumbo en una ciudad repleta de gente de carnaval. Al ver la terraza nos quedamos encantadas y decidimos comer allí. Sabíamos que iba a ser caro pero el sitio nos encantó a primera vista. Todo cambió cuando nos sentamos y nadie nos hizo caso en casi media hora. Pasaban, nos miraban, asentian con la cabeza y seguian su camino. Nos trajeron las cartas, pedimos y a esperar de nuevo....tanto con los entrantes como con los platos. La comida escasa y no vale lo que pagamos por ella...que fue mucho.  No volveremos jamás.
reviews.title: Fatal.

reviews.text: Recommended by our hotel,  this is the best restaurant we found in Venice.  We LOVE good food and great wine, but not extravagant pricing.  The Lineadombra has a fantastic wine list.  (Wine Spectator Award of Excellence Winner)  Many times a restaurant with this vast scope of wine inventory will have thought out wines at the lower price points.  (Alas not always!)  This was the case here.  I ordered a great bottle of white wine from the Veneto region recommended by the sommelier for 40 Euro.  They had excellent wines by the glass as well.  The food was OUTSTANDING!  This is a predominantly seafood restaurant, and both my wife and myself had 4 fish dishes that were exemplary.  There were other non nautical selections on the menu, we just did not sample them.  We did have both a red wine and white wine by the glass that were very very good.  All of our meals in Venice this trip were very good, not our usual experience.  We also enjoyed Osteria da Fiore which we always enjoy when in Venice.  It too is excellent, but Lineadombra is our new favorite.  Dinning right on/next to the Giudecca Canal was a beautiful plus.
reviews.title: Best Restaurant We Experienced in our Wonderful Week in Venice!

reviews.text: Découvert par hasard au détour de la Pointe de Dogana, l'emplacement nous a séduit : terrasse en bois posée sur l'eau face à Guidecca à l'ombre parfaite des parasols. Le restaurant n'est pas donné, mais on en a pour son argent. Cuisine très soignée tant dans la présentation que pour les papilles. Service très attentionné  sans être du tout pesant particulièrement agréable et sympathique. Une adresse plaisir à recommander.
reviews.title: Un moment de plaisir

reviews.text:
I had big expectations of this restaurant but unfortunately we all (4 persons) didn't like our meals (each of us had a different meal). So unfortunately for us it was first a long walk to this restaurant and then the food was not good and it was also too pricey.
The service and the view from the terrace was however excellent.
reviews.title: Didn't like the food

reviews.text:
Ho pranzato oggi per la prima volta in questo ristorante. La terrazza sulla laguna è veramente bella.
Antipasto di pesce crudo buonissimo e branzino al sale perfetto. 
Il personale è gentile e disponibile.
Da provare!
reviews.title: Vista meravigliosa

reviews.text: Certainement parmi les plus belles terrasses à Venise....bien située. Accueil chaleureux et sympathique. La prise de la commande est très rapide et c’est après que ça se gâte.... Le temps d’attente est hallucinant....dommage car les plats sont excellents. La durée de l’attente n’est heureusement pas proportionnelle à la cuisson des pâtes qui sont délicieusement « al dente ». En dehors de cet inconvénient, l’endroit est à recommander.
reviews.title: Molto buono, terrazza bella....ma lento lento....

reviews.text:
Being in Venice for my partners birthday week, we had passed this restaurant several times, not till the last day did we explore and book for our last night's dinner.

A very good choice, wonderful almost magical atmosphere, sitting on a pier jutting out into the  Giudecca waterway, as the light failed, with the water traffic still plying by, we were treated to a superb meal, served well by very friendly, very well trained staff.

We shared a starter of Globe Artichoke with Burrata, a soft Italian cheese, topped with black truffle and a tomato and paprika condiments. Our mains were a shared whole turbot, expertly filleted while we watched.

A very extensive wine list, though be warned, I did see one bottle marked up at 11000 Euros, yes 11 thousand, not a typo. Crème Brulee, which was delicious but the Tiramisu was disappointing. Two glasses of a really nice Eiswein and then two double expresso coffees finished the evening and our holiday.
reviews.title: What a purfect way to end a birthday weeks holiday

reviews.text:
Très jolie cadre, paysage de rêve.
Plat bien présenté mais prix exorbitant.
155€ pour 2 plats, 1 bouteille de Prosecco. 2 desserts et 2 café, 
Personnel très charmant et souriant 
Bonne adresse mais trop cher
reviews.title: Bon produit mais très cher

reviews.text: I came to Venice for a few days to celebrate my 50th birthday and this is where we ate on our last night.  It was absolutely wonderful.  All the staff were superb - attentive without being over bearing and the food was absolutely fantastic.  I had scallops to start, then ravioli and finally liver and onions, my husband had mackerel, ravioli and then a veal chop.  It was all delicious and whilst the portions were not huge we were more than full by the time we had scrapped our plates clean.  We were sat at a corner table of the terrace with an amazing view along the canal.  It was a beautiful spot and a perfect end to our holiday in Venice.  The restaurant was only about 50 yards from our gorgeous hotel (Ca Maria Adele) which made rolling back to the room very easy.  I would not hesitate to recommend this restaurant to anyone staying in Venice - it is a magical spot.  Also whilst it is not cheap, we are from London and it was certainly no more expensive than eating out there.
reviews.title: A Perfect End to a Perfect holiday

reviews.text:
Oui, bien sûr c'est cher: on approche facilement les 100€ par personne. Mais on le sait avant d'entrer, en lisant la carte. 
Mais... Le lieu est superbe (je parle de la terrasse sur l'eau, table au bord). L'île de la Giudecca, éclairée par le soleil du soir, puis ses lumières, les bateaux... 
Et aussi... Le service au petit soin et très sympathique 
Et encore... Les plats (pas très copieux mais corrects) sont raffinés, avec des saveurs subtiles.
Bref, nous étions venus il y a 5 ans, et nous reviendrons encore!
reviews.title: Cher, mais nous reviendrons !

reviews.text:
Having a stroll around Venice can be daunting with the number of places to eat to choose from , but i can highly recommend a little walk outside of the normal tourist area to come to this place .
It is a little restaurant but has an amazing large outside space over looking the waters and on a sunny day is perfect.
The staff are friendly and welcoming and the menu although small has an amazing selection you just want to try everything
Great place to go have an Aperol Spritz and plates of good food and watch the world walk and float past ...depending on your view lol
reviews.title: A little gem of a place

reviews.text: une très jolie carte, - poissons parfaits, de même pour la viande, noix de veau rosée au coeur - les mets sont très correctement apprêtés, le service impeccable. Le sommelier nous invite à boire une bouteille locale, Bressan, monocépage Schioppettino, délicieux, vin très épicé, avec des arômes de poivre. Je conseille ce flacon de 2012, 50 euros. L'addition n'est pas légère, 160 euros pour deux.
reviews.title: Une valeur sûre

reviews.text: We stayed there on recoomendation of our hotel....Unfortunatley the weather was bad with lots of rain and cold temperature, so we could not enjoy the outdoor water front terrace which makes this restaurant a great place to be. The choice on the menu card was limited, whereas the wine card was almost 100x bigger as the menu card. The quality of the food was excellent, the wines overrated in price...Good place to be on warm sunny evenings and on the terrace.....
reviews.title: Great food, slightly overrated

reviews.text:
Cadre intérieur moderne, cuisine raffinée, serveurs au top, terrasse extérieure très agréable par beau temps avec vue superbe dans un quartier calme
Je recommande +++
reviews.title: Restaurant

reviews.text: I went to this place with another person last Sunday. Pasta all'astice was awful. But, even more disappointing, the price of this dish was not listed on the menu. I discovered it when they gave me the bill: the pasta costed 45 euros!! I still have my receipt with me. I feel they have stolen my money!
reviews.title: Awful experience - I feel like they have stolen my money

reviews.text: The terrace is on the Canale della Giudecca facing the Guidecca. A wonderful place where you can eat one of the best raw fish in Venice, tatars, carpaccios....and a delicious pasta with lobster (astice).It is a lovely to go after a visit at the Punto della Dogana
reviews.title: Fantastic view and delicious raw fish plates

reviews.text:
Pranzo di domenica, location particolare dietro la chiesa della salute con vista sulla giudecca. In giornate più calde c’è anche una terrazza all’aperto (ieri era freddino ed era chiusa).
arredamento moderno che si distacca completamente dalla maggior parte dei ristoranti veneziani, servizio ottimo e sempre gentili. Menù sofisticato e carta dei vini di alto livello. Porzioni buone per un ristorante di questa categoria (ossia alta).
Il conto riflette la qualità del cibo proposto e la location, quindi non per tutte le tasche.
Menzione particolare per i paccheri neri e le sarde in saor. Tradizione e tanta innovazione, da provare per un’occasione speciale.
reviews.title: Ottimo ristorante

reviews.text:
Sicuramente la “sfortuna” di aver trovato una serata fredda non ci ha permesso di mangiare all’esterno dove il panorama era pazzesco! 
Ma anche all’interno il locale è ben curato e raffinato. Il personale è cortese e sempre presente, la cena molto molto buona. Non perdetevi l’ombrina e il guazzetto perché erano eccellenti. Carta dei vini ricchissima, noi siamo andati sul classico vi conviene sennò farvi consigliare! Tutto perfetto...
reviews.title: Cena romantica riuscita!

reviews.text: 夏の日にランチでお邪魔しました。幸運なことに一番水際の席で、水鳥を眺めながらのんびり午後のワインを楽しみました。スタッフの応対もとても気持ち良かった。お値段はちょっぴり高めでしたが全く納得の範囲でした。
reviews.title: 水辺で最高のアフタヌーンワイン！

reviews.text: le ciel était bleu et la chaleur suffisante pour déjeuner dehors, service un peu lent. (mieux vaut ne pas être pressés) mais repas plaisant
reviews.title: entre amis

reviews.text: Location meravigliosa ma la differenza la fa lo chef e tutto lo staff !! Professionalità e cortesia per una serata piacevole ...prezzi nella norma ! Carta vini da far invidia a chiunque!!!
reviews.title: Super Top

reviews.text: Pour déjeuner le midi, c est un lieu génial. Les serveurs sont très professionnels et gentils. Les plats sont délicieux. Ce n’est pas donné. Mais quelle belle vue! Quel bon moment!
reviews.title: Excellent endroit

reviews.text: 風景非常美的餐廳，價格也不算太便宜，一道菜基本上都要二三十歐元，但可以點個義大利麵簡單吃，一邊看風景即可。
reviews.title: 美景

name: Ristorante Giorgione
address: Via Giuseppe Garibaldi Castello 1533, 30122 Venice Italy

reviews.text: Con la mia signora abbiamo preso un piatto di spaghetti alle cozze e una lasagna, dove nel menù era specificato fatte in casa. Gli spaghetti erano conditi con un pomodoro vecchio e bruciato allungato da un olio soffritto e un bel cucchiaio di prperoncino per coprire il tutto. Le lasagne erano sommerse in un brodo di besciamella e mozzarella acquosa fusa. Il tutto accompagnato da 1/2 litro di vino in caraffa, definito come "vino della casa" al prezzo di 9 euro. Metto due stelle solo perché è in una bella posizione.
reviews.title: Tipico ristorante per turisti di passaggio

reviews.text: la paura di non avere clienti per il corona virus è già passata.. accoglienza e servizio tornati alla maniera veneziana: i turisti, almeno una volta li avranno sempre... prezzi sproporzionati (1/2 litro vino alla spina 9 euro) cibo pessimo (era da un pò che non mi trovavo nel piatto 8 spaghetti ancora attaccati alla cima.....) dosi minime (4 acciughe, un quadrato di pesce 2x2, qualche anello di totano,....). io vi ho avvisati.....
reviews.title: il ritorno alla normalità - sigh!

reviews.text: Ottimo pranzo con menù turistico, con circa 20 euro a testa abbiamo mangiato primo,secondo e contorno tutto di pesce,cucinato bene. Poco turistico,da consigliare
reviews.title: Ottimo pranzo

reviews.text: Vous voulez manger vénitien avec des vénitiens ? Écouter Lucio pousser la chansonnette typique vénitienne ? Alors il faut y aller. Les plats sont très bons et pas cher. Une excellente expérience.
reviews.title: Fantastique

reviews.text:
Adresse à retenir,cuisine familiale et typiquement vénitienne 
Pour les gourmands ,je vous conseille le tyramisu 
J’y suis revenu et j’y retournerai 
Merci
reviews.title: Ambiance familiale et musicale

reviews.text: Avis un peu mitigé. Nous avons apprécié les pâtes,poulet milanaise un peu moins et tiramisu aussi.dommage que la serveuse soit pas agréable mais qui étais rattrape par pépé et son guitare. Le vin en carafe était bon
reviews.title: Mitigé

reviews.text: Ambiente molto accogliente, caldo...personale gentile affabile e alla mano...pietanze davvero buone , con ingredienti di qualità, ben impiattati...un piacere per il.palato e per la vista...prezzo adeguato...sicuramente ritornerò
reviews.title: Una bella sorpresa

reviews.text: Après un long voyage nous voici devant cette petite tratoria . On voudrait manger un peu et on rentre. C est vrai l hôtesse  n est pas tres agréable: elle ne peut nous servir un Spritz car elle est seule ! .Mais elle nous accueille avec gentillesse : on a une fête vous voulez manger ds la salle plutôt  ds une salle plus tranquille. " On décide de participer à la fête: musique live ce soir le patron qui adore  chanter est avec 2 copain , une table de 10 veneziennes fêtent on ne sais quoi ! Alors que la fête commence dans l assiette des fruits de mer goûteux et un risotto a tomber  accompagné  d un vin de ribolla gialla inoubliable .Bref le bonheur de vivre !Et puis les chanteurs nous régalent de chansons vénitienne et napolitaine. Si le bonheur existe il est ici!!!
reviews.title: Inoubliable soirée

reviews.text: Bel ristorante in via Garibaldi, non lontano all'Arsenale e dalla Biennale. Cibo buonissimo e personale gentile. Varia la scelta e alta la qualità.
reviews.title: Un ottimo posto per mangiare bene a Venezia

reviews.text: Trattoria tipica in tutto per Venezia: locali piuttosto angusti, servizio disponibile ma ... piatti con poca fantasia, vino sfuso caro come se fosse in bottiglia, buoni i dolci e ... conto salato. Purtroppo ormai Venezia non si smentisce più: conta sul turista che non rivedrà mai più e bada a fare soldi. Che tristezza!
reviews.title: Medio per Venezia

reviews.text:
Arrivati tardi(22:00), chiediamo se possibile cenare, dopo riunione dello “staff”,ci fanno il favore.
Camerieri maleducati, spocchiosi e poco professionali, si lamentano dell’orario di lavoro(incolpando noi) dalla cucina senza curarsi del fatto che eravamo da soli in sala e sentivamo tutto.
Per quanto riguarda il cibo.... abbiamo passato la notte in bianco, non credo ci sia da aggiungere altro.
Peccato, basterebbe un po’ di amor proprio sul lavoro
reviews.title: Aberrante!!!!

reviews.text:
Essen schmeckte gut. Personal ganz nett und einfach. Hatten sogar kurz Livemusik durch einem Guitarristen.
Feines Blätterteigdessert!
reviews.title: Einfach, aber gut

reviews.text: Pranzo a mezzogiorno il 07/10 pizze e frittura ... le pizze nella media, ma la proprietaria ci aveva avvisato che non era la loro specialità e che le facevano nel forno elettrico (avviso che ho apprezzato), comunque senza lode ne infamia e ben farcite. La frittura mista molto asciutta, in senso positivo, e variegata con diverso pescato con lisca accompagnato dalla tipica polenta bianca. In 5 con 4 pizze farcite, frittura, 2 bottiglie d'acqua e 2 caffè 80€ circa. Personale gentile e disponibile .
reviews.title: Pranzo durante una gita a venezia

reviews.text: Cela pourrait être bien, mais ... le cerbère qui fait l’accueil, une femme mal aimable dont le réflexe est plutôt de refouler le client gâche tout ! Dommage car quand on passe ce premier barrage les plats sont classiques et bons et les chanteurs sympathiques
reviews.title: Accueil consternant !

reviews.text:
Dined here on two separate evenings.   The staff is very friendly and attentive.
The food, pasta and pizza both excellent.   This is why we love the food in Italy
reviews.title: Venice Favorite

reviews.text:
Don’t waste your time. The food is average and the service less than average. My boyfriend and I ordered polenta and octopus for antipasti. I have not had more plain food than this, tasteless.  Pasta with langoustine for the main course was ok. The server was dragging her feet, making noise with her sleepers, chewing gum or food, and not showing interest.
There’s a sandwich shop few meters away, go there, save yourself some money and frustration. 
Thank you for your attention.
reviews.title: Don’t waste your time
VENERDÌ 20.09 DA GIORGIONE È ANDATA IN ONDA LA MATTANZA

reviews.text: Cena con gruppo di amici e famiglie. 30 persone. Mangiato poco, maluccio perché ci siamo fidati del "faccio io del proprietario" e pagato una pazzia, ma veramente tanto, oltre 45 euro a testa. I gruppi non sono per questo posto. Non consiglio.
reviews.title: Peccato aveva una buona nomea

reviews.text:
Cela pourrait être un bon moment...mais, car il y a un mais, incarné par cette petite dame acariâtre qui donne immédiatement le tempo.
Elle sourit en se brûlant c'est sur, et elle traite les clients comme les pigeons...qui la dérange...aussi.
Le repas quand à lui, sans reliefs, mais pas mauvais, c'est déjà ça.
reviews.title: Bof

reviews.text: Polenta e schie, super. Folpetti e spaghetti al nero, ottimi. Molto buoni anche i calamari fritti. La pizza è per turisti stranieri, non male. Aggiungi due bottiglie d'acqua, un quarto di tocai e un caffè. Totale 80 euro. Posto accogliente, servizio cortese, tempi d'attesa più che buoni. Consigliato!
reviews.title: Ci torneremo!

reviews.text:
Voilà, il faut faire attention... Nous nous trouvons entre Arsenale et Giardina. Il y a une rue qui est moins touristique qu'au centre de Venise... Et il y a un restaurant après l'autre. Certains sont pleins, d'autres sont vides... Cherchez pourquoi!
Giorgione est excellent. La terrasse est pleine, donc réservez à l'avance... Les serveurs sont efficaces quoiqu'ils sourient trop peu pour des Italiens... Mais la nourriture est délicieuse, et le chef ou le  patron qui ne déride pas, s'éclate à la guitare. Il ne fait pas l'aumône, il ne demande rien mais adore chanter. Je recommande hautement les plats "fait-maison", la meilleure lasagne du siècle... Le vin est simple et bon, les desserts également.
reviews.title: un des derniers endroits vénétiens

reviews.text:
Das war die schlechteste Pizza Italiens die je gebacken wurde. Geraspelt Karotten ist ein no go.
Getränke ohne Gläser...
reviews.title: Langes Warten Pizza hart

reviews.text: Vi spiste aftensmad her den sidste aften i vores ferie og spiste kalvekød i vinsauce og hertil grillede grøntsager og tartufo is til dessert. Vi drak en halv flaske mousserende hvidvin af husets samt en flaske vand til en samlet pris af 70 euro, hvilket er en rimelig pris i Venedig. Maden var velsmagende og der var en hyggelig stemning. Ejeren kom ud på aftenen ud og spillede guitar og sang til så alle sang med :-)
reviews.title: Hyggeligt autentisk italiensk køkken

reviews.text:
We came here for lunch two weeks ago and for dinner tonight. I can confirm that the fish risotto is amazing!! We also had an “antipasto” plate with boiled fish and it was delicious. Fish is fresh. 
Highly recommended!!
reviews.title: Best fish risotto in town

reviews.text: Una cena fantástica con actuación musical incluida. Una pasta muy rica, tanto los spaghetti alla busara con scampi (con langotinos y una salsa de tomate con un ligerísimo toque picante) como los spaghetti carbonara. Ambos los acompañamos con una cerveza y 1/2 litro de vino blanco, y de postre tiramisú. Todo por 50 euros. Además la cena amenizada con un señor (creemos que el dueño) cantando con su guitarra. Una cena muy agradable y un lugar totalmente recomendable
reviews.title: Cena y música

reviews.text:
Bonne cuisine familiale et super ambiance dans un quartier authentique loin du tourisme de masse.
Nous avons pris un menu à 15,50€, bon et copieux! Les serveurs sont très sympas et efficaces et le patron et la patronne ont chanté, guitare en main ainsi que des clients, super ambiance vénitienne authentique! Nous avions déjà apprécié hier et cette soirée a confirmé notre première impression. Nous reviendrons avec grand plaisir! Bravo et merci! Gracie mille!
reviews.title: Extra! Excellent rapport qualité-prix!

reviews.text: Non è la prima volta che ci vado. Si è confermato come uno dei posti con miglior rapporto qualità/prezzo a venezia. I piatti veneziani sono perfetti, come da ricetta tradizionale. Materia prima fresca, ottima esecuzione. Il baccalà mantecato non l’avevano, perché lo fanno al pomeriggio. L’antipasto era ottimo (i folpetti in particolare!). Il risotto di pesce super! Il prezzo, onesto. Racconandato.
reviews.title: Risotto di pesce perfetto

reviews.text: In Venedig gut essen ist sowieso schwierig. Also bin ich milde gestimmt. Aber ein Restaurant ohne Weinkarte ... die Speisekarte so wie hunderte Speisekarten in Venedig halt sind ...
reviews.title: ... geht so.

reviews.text: Not the best place to eat...when me and my mom went to sit down outside (we were the only ones there) they didn't want to serve us because we only wanting a drink and when we went to leave they said it was fine. We did go ahead and order a cheese platter with our wine, which was very good and quick but service was poor! We weren't in a hurry but when asking for the check our waitress said she'd be back in 2 minutes but that turned into 20, of her walking around smoking or shopping. Then she didn't give us the correct change back on a bill she had already added the tip on but we didn't say anything because we just wanted to leave at that point. Though the cheese platter and wine was good, service and attitude makes us not want to eat here again nor recommend this place.
reviews.title: Good food, bad good service

reviews.text: We had dinner with the family at that place. ordinary tourist food, bad wine. We will never come back.
reviews.title: Never again

reviews.text:
Si proprio una serata spensierata!
Tutto ok, buono il cibo, buono il servizio, buona la compagnia!
Tutto accompagnato da della buona e bella musica veneziana, cantata dal vivo dal proprietario e amico.
Hanno cantato anche una delle cameriere e una ragazza che era li, bravissime.
Bravi continuate cosi ci torneremo certamente
reviews.title: Serata spensierata

reviews.text:
Spettacolo nel vero senso della parola..  Buon pesce,  piatti locali,  e canzoni venete cantate divinamente da Lucio! 
Se volete passare una bella serata in compagnia e divertirvi,  andate in questo ristorante. 
Al lato pratico: piatti non troppo raffinati(si predilige la bonta all'occhio), pesce buono e saporito(nello specifico sottolineo la pulizia delle vongole come eccellente).  Risotto gustosi. Primi in generale buoni! 
Andate!
reviews.title: Un vero spettacolo!

reviews.text: Una sola stella perché meno non è possibile.... Si mangia male e si beve peggio... Un vino della casa proposto come prosecco, servito nella brocca... caldo....imbevibile... 18 euro!!!! Un antipasto misto mare mediocre, senza sapore, non cucinato... 16 euro!!!!!!!! Uno spaghetto al nero di seppia scotto.... 15 euro!!!!!!!!!!! Si salva solo la location, ma in via Garibaldi ogni altro locale è sicuramente meglio!!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.title: Peggio di così......

reviews.text: sono stata il 2 giugno a pranzo, finalmente un ristorante con la vera cucina tipica veneziana. Ogni cosa aveva il suo sapore, e tutto era squisito. Non vedo l'ora di ritornare
reviews.title: una piacevole scoperta

reviews.text:
Restaurant avec une décoration sympa. 
Les plats ne sont pas excellents (même pour des pâtes) et ils sont surtout chers. 45€ pour deux plats de pâtes ainsi qu’un spritz et 25cl de vin blanc ...
reviews.title: A éviter

reviews.text: Qualité moyenne, prix élevé. Les pâtes étaient certes bonnes mais plus de 16€ le plat, pour seulement des pâtes il ne faut pas non plus exagérer.. A éviter, surtout quand l'on se rend compte qu'un "turistico menu" est proposé. Clairement attrape-touriste
reviews.title: Prix élevés pour une qualité moyenne

reviews.text: My wife and I first went here for dinner 8 years ago and loved the guitar playing. this time around it was busy but cozy. The staff were great and the food outstanding.
reviews.title: A truly lovely place

reviews.text:
Ambiente semplice ed accogliente, familiare. Cucina casalinga  buona che rispetta la tradizione veneziana.  Personale simpatico e sorridente, professionalità alta.
 Titolare extra e...cantante trascinante.  Bravissimi Lucio e Chicca!!!  
 Il costo è giusto.
reviews.title: gita di gruppo user

reviews.text:
Un ristorante a via Garibaldi senza troppe pretese che offre una buona e semplice cucina veneziana a prezzi onestissimi.
Abbiamo cenato in questo ristorante prenotando per 20 persone, ci siamo trovati benissimo. Il personale  è stato sempre molto disponibile, ci ha proposto il menù a base di Spaghetti alle vongole, per secondo buona frittura di pesce con la polenta. Da consigliare assolutamente!
reviews.title: lo spaghetto alle vongole migliore di via Garibaldi e non solo

reviews.text:
Premesso che a Venezia essere truffati, ahimè, è praticamente garantito.
Quando trovi un locale che sa fare una dignitosa frittura mista (calamari e scampi) e delle sarde in saor più che buone, devi sentirti fortunato. Capisco le recensioni negative ma non si può non considerare il contesto di Venezia (che è un posto folle dove locali indegni possono fare incassi da capogiro solamente per il numero incredibile di turisti).
Dunque, questo locale dove vanno ancora i veneziani e che fa alcuni piatti più che apprezzabili a me è sembrato un oasi nel deserto. Simpatico anche il gestore che prende la chitarra e canta con passione. Forse però abbiamo apprezzato perché lui era dentro il locale e noi fuori.
reviews.title: A Venezia ... sei fortunato se trovi un posto così

reviews.text:
The trattoria looks very traditional from the outside, which attracted us to it. Initially it was a very quiet restaurant with only a few couples in there, but then a large tour group arrived and it was packed. 

The food was ok, but could have been better. The serving staff were neither attentive or friendly. Prawns were not as fresh as they should have been.
reviews.title: Not bad, but had better

reviews.text:
Pâte sans intérêt, trop salee
Milanese caoutchouteuse

Patron et serveuse pas sympa, toujours sur notre dos

Pourtant m'avait été recommandée par une vénitienne !
reviews.title: Pas terrible

reviews.text:
Das Essen toll, das Ambiente nett und der Service zuvorkommend. Ein unvergesslicher Abend mit Musik und Tanz.
Diesen Abend am 29.3 kann nur als einmalig beschrieben werden. Zufällig ergab es sich, das drei Gäste Geburstag
hatten. Sig. Lucio würdigte eine jede auf seine Weise! Mit seiner Gitarre und seiner Stimme. 
Auch ohne Fest kommen wir gerne wieder!
reviews.title: Ein tolles einmaliges Fest

reviews.text: Poor. Mediocre food. Over priced and charged for items either not received or not asked for. Exactly the kind of place we were warned about. Thankfully other more positive eating experiences meant this didn't tarnish the whole Venetian experience for us!
reviews.title: Over charged.

reviews.text: Siamo a Venezia per un breve soggiorno.. viste le buone recensioni abbiamo deciso di provare questo ristorante.. 3menu turistici.. io e mio marito spaghetti alle vongole, frittura e patate..tutto squisito! Il bimbo spaghetti al pomodoro e cotoletta, davvero ottimo! Il tutto per 15,50 euro a persona. Ambiente piacevole e personale cortese.. con musica dal vivo anni 80..consiglieremo con piacere il Vostro ristorante a amici e parenti! Grazie!
reviews.title: Che bella serata!!

reviews.text: Salve a tutti volevo dire che fare un pranzo o una cena in questa trattoria e sempre una esperienza unica oltre al buon cibo si ha la possibilta di fare anche una buona cantata in compagnia del titolare ed amici lo consiglio vivamente.
reviews.title: Pranzo con colleghi ed amici

reviews.text: locale coinvolgente molto.... ci sono artisti veraci..... ottimo per farsi amici anche tra gli altri clienti!!!!!!
reviews.title: una volta....... Napoleone

reviews.text:
Sur la via Garibaldi, loin du flot touristique, cette trattoria aujourd’hui déserte propose: petites entrées de la mer, pasta, poissons
Anguille sentant l’ammoniaque (20€), légumes grillés secs
Lasagnes caoutchouteux
Patron bougon
Dommage. L’endroit pourrait être sympa
Passez votre chemin
reviews.title: Dégueu

reviews.text: Qualità del cibo non delle migliori, ma proporzionata al prezzo. Servizio rapido e informale( affabile). Personale cordiale e attento al singolo: vedi titolo.
reviews.title: Ragzza sbocca, la aiutano

name: VinoVino Wine Bar
address: Ponte delle Veste, 2007/a, 30124 Venice Italy

reviews.text: We ate there 3 times during our stay in Venice, as it was around the corner from our hotel and the food was fabulous.  The merangue dessert with amaretto is my new favorite dessert!  The staff was attentive an the atmosphere in the garden and out front are both lovely.
reviews.title: Wonderful place, great food, reasonable prices.

reviews.text:
Un déjeuner agréable. 
Dans une petite cours à l’arrière du restaurant, très au calme, agréable avec de la vigne pour parasol. Donc de la verdure sous le soleil de plomb. Déjeuner poissons du jour en petite friture avec des légumes. Très bon . Salade de poulpe, très bon , poulpe tendre . Très correct pour cette petite halte .
reviews.title: Un déjeuner agréable.

reviews.text: Tivemos um jantar muito agradável. Pedimos pizza e estava muito boa. O atendimento foi muito bom também.
reviews.title: Jantar muito agradável.

reviews.text: We hebben hier heerlijk gegeten, buitenkant lijkt het heel klein maar binnen hebben ze o.a. een schitterende binnen tuin. Veel ambiance lekker eten ! En lekkere lambrusco 😍
reviews.title: Lekker eten

reviews.text:
A warm welcome from lovely staff. The food was stunning and a good price. Beautiful setting and atmosphere and great service. We were attracted to the restaurant by the entrance from Teatro La Fenice side. See photos of how beautiful it looks.
The beer was good as were the Bellini's. The desserts were incredible also.
reviews.title: Loved it! Would definately re-visit

reviews.text: The prices posted on menu outside the door compared to neighboring restaurants were far more reasonable.  We entered off the Piazza and went to the inside patio.  I ordered the fish it was Fantastic.  Our waiter was very efficient and friendly though not overly chatty.  Another older waiter seemed to be entertaining a large group on the patio and anyone else who would listen.  Other reviews complained about the wait to get the bill though we specifically asked and it came quickly both visits.  Our second night we came in through the alley/ walk way and were seated inside did not recognize it as the same restaurant until we walked around a corner. (Quite a large place) the inside is cozy, dark woods and red curtains.  Again the food was good one pasta one beef meal though not memorable as the fish was a couple nights prior.  We didn't have any mystery charges. Small gratuity was added but it is marked on the menu.
reviews.title: Two entrances - inside and outside seem like different restaurants

reviews.text:
We have been to Venice on many occasions.. mostly all in January simply because we like the winter quiet of Venice ...
We got in from Amsterdam late and we’re on our way to another restaurant but my husband was tired and said ..why don’t we just go in here ... ok ..bad move! 
Waiter and manager were somewhat uninterested in the fact that we were customers! Once seated our waiter ..upon thinking we just wanted wine became even less interested...but after understanding that we wanted dinner was slightly more attentive. 
We ordered: mixed salad which came with a gelatinous dressing , then my husbands red sauce on his pasta had some unrecognizable spice which I had never had in all my Italian travels! My pasta  with cream sauce, ham and a few mushrooms was edible .. 
we paid our bill and left . 
There are so many really wonderful restaurants and places to eat on any type of budget in Venice I’m SURE anyone can find someplace better with a more welcoming attitude than this establishment!
reviews.title: Skip this place

reviews.text: the food was delicious the service wasn’t great. not very friendly the waiter that we had. the atmosphere was nice.
reviews.title: good

reviews.text: Average food, no service and mystery charges that almost double your bill.  Cover charges in Venice are for food, bread and/or service - this place offers none of these.  We waited 15-20 minutes just to get our bill.  With 1000 places to eat in Venice, anywhere is better than here.
reviews.title: Avoid - rip off!!

reviews.text:
披薩非常好吃，莫扎瑞拉起司用料很實在，可能因為淡季的關係，麵包無限供應，請店主把找回的零錢當小費留著，他還是拿回來給我

店內氣氛很好，也很乾淨，店的外觀也很有中世紀氣息
reviews.title: 披薩美味

reviews.text: We went for drinks, staff so rude and we left. So disappointed as we walked a long distance to try this place based on the reviews on here. We waited minutes to even be asked what we wanted to order and once we said we wanted just drinks we were asked to move. We were made to feel uncomfortable and the whole experience was terrible.  We walked around the corner to Al Theatro and they were so lovely,  welcoming and friendly
reviews.title: Just went for drinls

reviews.text: Excelente, preço justo, bons vinhos e lugar aconchegante. Recomendo demais indo a casal com família e equipe atende super bem .
reviews.title: Super recomendo

reviews.text: Nella norma, ha un potenziale alto con location al lato del teatro la fenice, in un quartiere super figo di Venezia...ma a parte il cameriere molto gentile e professionale per il resto tutto nella norma, senza exploit di piacere e emozione che un buon locale potrebbe dare. Manca di cura dei dettagli
reviews.title: Ok......

reviews.text: La comida correcta. La camarera un poco seca. El problema es que cuando estábamos ya pagando, se le calleron unas consumiciones  de limoncello encima de mi padre. Le caló el jersey, pantalón y cazadora y ni se disculpó correctamente. Dijo lo siento y siguió sirviendo como si nada. El jersey era muy delicado y ha quedado estropeado.
reviews.title: Malas formas

reviews.text:
Good service, fine wine, tasty food in a location fairly close to the opera house.

Fairly informal setting
reviews.title: Great dinner location

reviews.text: This was recommended by our hotel.  Solid Pizza and delicious wines at very good prices!  We ate here twice!
reviews.title: Pizza Pasta Prosecco!

reviews.text: My husband and I spent our 5th anniversary at this fantastic restaurant in Venice. Extremely friendly service, the server Marco made our night! The sea bass and lamb chops are out of this world. Marco paired our wine perfectly. The tiramisu was the cherry on top!
reviews.title: Wine and dine!

reviews.text:
Un restaurant recommandé par l'hôtel qui est sans grand interêt quand aux plats communs proposés qui de surcroit n'apportent pas le rendu attendu par rapport au prix.
En clair c'est cher pour ce qui est donné dans l'assiette même si le cadre à l'entour et le théâtre de la Fenice sont agréables.
Les sarde in saor, qui est le plat vénitien proposé par excellence, ne m'a pas séduit, ni même le foie avec la polenta, voir le poulet au curry (étrange).
Un bon point toutefois pour le Baccala mantecato tés équilibré et agréable en bouche pour des saveurs intéressantes.
Autre avantage choix de vins au verre trés bien fourni
reviews.title: Plutôt touristique

reviews.text:
We found this in passing but happy to recommend to fellow travellers. It’s tucked away down a side street and you simply wouldn’t find it by walking past. We looked at the menu of the more formal and far more expensive other side if the establishment, and the Maitre D saw our grimace and said to check out the other side. Walking through to the walled garden was a great surprise.  The garden is beautiful with some interesting features. 

We had a a huge salad with a wonderful dressing, and bowls of pasta. I had the best spaghetti carbonara I’ve ever had! The pizzas at the next table looked delicious and not a morsel was left.
reviews.title: Fabulous lunch

reviews.text: We ended up eating here twice which is quite unusual as we like to try out new places. Excellent lasagne and generous portions of delicious food in a truly lovely tranquil setting. Open late after the La Fenice performance too!
reviews.title: Beautiful garden

reviews.text: We ate here twice during our stay.  The food was wonderful and the service was great.  The lasagna was amazing and the pizza was delicious
reviews.title: Amazing food in the wonderful garden room

reviews.text: Lugnt ställe trots närheten till turiststråket. God pasta funghi och gratinerad aubergine. Det föreslagna rödvinet utmärkt och vänliga servitörer. Den dam som tog betalt hade däremot en lite sämre dag , kanske pga vi ville betala med kort!
reviews.title: Lunch

reviews.text: This restaurant serves authentic Venetian food. Highly recommended. If you’re lucky you may hear people being serenaded on a Gondola!
reviews.title: Guytravellers

reviews.text:
フィレンツェからベニスに小旅行に来た際、鐘楼に登る時間まで1時間ちょっとしかなかったので、サンマルコ広場から近いところで良さげなランチのお店を探していたところ、入口付近に立つ中年のお洒落なおじさんに呼び止められ、入店しました。
時間があまりないことから、私と妻がそれぞれシーフードリゾット、娘がラビオリ、そしてマルガリータピザ、スパーリングウォーターをオーダーしました。いずれも水準以上の美味しさで、値段も手頃だったことを考えると、偶然入ったにしては当たりのお店だったと思います。支払額は合計で50ユーロちょっとだと思います。
お店のサービスの方も片言の日本語で娘に話しかけてくれるなど、この時は中年男性ばかりのサービス陣でしたが、気持ち良く食事が出来ました。
日本人の味覚に合う料理とベニスにしてはリーズナブルな値段であることから、気軽に食事するにはいいと思います。
reviews.title: 偶然入ったのだが…当たりでした

reviews.text: Nous avions réservé par un intermédiaire. Notre réservation stipulait avec vue sur les gondoles, ce qui est complètement faux. Nous étions 2, nous avons mangé 2 lasagnes en entrée et du 2 fromages immangeables sur aubergines grillées avec 1 verre de vin par personne, cela pour 110 euros. C'est la seule fois de notre séjour où une telle chose est arrivée. Partout ailleurs, tout était bon avec des prix raisonnables. Donc, méfiez vous de ce restaurant
reviews.title: Non seulement moche à l'intérieur mais nourriture infecte.

reviews.text: I have visited VinoVino twice while I was in Venice and I was trying the best carbonara! All salads and other dishes were also very tasty. It is a nice restaurant in the heart of Venice. Staff is excellent and very friendly.
reviews.title: Best carbonara - Lovely dinner!

reviews.text:
Looked up this place on the web as it was near our hotel and it was one of the best.
The staff were friendly and helpful and the food and wine was great.
Definitely recommend this place.
reviews.title: Lovely dinner

reviews.text:
Nous regardions la carte en façade que nous trouvions fort chère et le maître d’hôtel voyant que nous partions nous a dit de regarder à côté. Il s’agit du même établissement et en rentrant nous découvrons un jardin tout à fait charmant.
Un accueil parfait. Notre serveur était moyen. Service correct mais contact peu agréable.
Les pizzas étaient très bonne, les desserts aussi: coupé de fruits des bois avec meringue et une coupe de glace avec des fraises bien servis.
Une bouteille de Bardolino Chiarretto, soirée très agréable
reviews.title: Dîner dans une cour

reviews.text: Arrivée au restaurant à 22h45 après l’opéra. Le restaurant est certes ouvert mais la carte est très limitée. Pas de pizza, pas de viande,... On nous place sans nous le dire. Donc surprise au moment de la commande. Bonsoir Cuisine correcte sans plus par rapport à d’autres restaurants
reviews.title: Pas conseillé tard le soir

reviews.text: I had clocked this place as I walked past it earlier in the day and registered that it was open until late (11.30) and advertised itself as having an outside space to sit in. Perfect, I thought, I'll go there after the opera tonight. I arrived at 10.50 and was met with something close to an eye roll from the maitre d', who also said it was not possible to sit outside at this hour. I deliberately chose and ordered fast, and chose dishes I knew could be prepared and served quickly. Melon with Parma ham followed by spaghetti carbonara. The food arrived quickly and was tasty - and in just the right quantity. The female staff member who brought me my food did her best to be friendly, but seemed to be going through the motions. I decided to skip dessert and coffee and just have an after dinner drink and the bill. The lady said that to use my card I had to come with her to the cash desk. She seemed to think 'now' but agreed that could finish my drink first. 30 seconds later a male colleague appeared and tried to take me to the cash desk. I asked if I could finish my drink first. By now it was just about 11.30. He pretty much said OK through gritted teeth and then hovered conspicuously, watching me have my drink. At one point he disappeared to switch off the music, before coming back. As I was paying, I couldn't help but notice that in the upmarket sister restaurant in the next room, people were still lingering, some of them still seated outside. I guess you get what you pay for, and money buys you a friendlier experience. If they were that pressed for time, I would rather they said, sorry we're closed (and didn't advertise a late closing time), in which case I would have got a takeaway pizza from my friendly local bar and taken it back to my hotel's terrace. It's a shame because the food was good, and, for this part of Venice, reasonably priced!
reviews.title: Good food, good value, let down by poor service

reviews.text:
Als voorgerecht at ik aubergine-parmigiano. Dit was erg lekker.
Als hoofdgerecht koos ik voor risotto met zeevruchten. Dit gerecht was een afrader: flets van smaak met amper zeevruchten.
De tuin was erg gezellig en de bediening was correct.
reviews.title: Doorsnee maaltijd in gezellige omgeving

reviews.text: Just been here.. lovely food (pizza, sorry Venice!)... we were hungry though... straight from the airport.... staff great and nice atmosphere... we shall return!
reviews.title: Tasty Find
reviews.userLocation: East Riding of Yorkshire, United Kingdom

reviews.text: Estávamos passando próximo ao local quando fomos abordados por um senhor muito gentil nos convidando para entrar em um restaurante onde os pratos eram todos de frutos do mar, e que era a especialidade da casa. Como eu e minha esposa estávamos focados em comer massa, agradecemos o convite mas informamos de nossa preferência. Ele prontamente nos levou a porta ao lado e nos informou que havia uma outra oferta de menu, mas com mais massas típicas italianas. Grata surpresa, nos sentamos em um jardim externo, fomos atendidos por um garçom muito educado e cordial chamado Roman, que se esforçou ao máximo para nos ajudar. Recomendou desde o vinho até os pratos. O melhor jantar de despedida que poderíamos ter, desta cidade inesquecível chamada Veneza.
reviews.title: Excelente surpresa!

reviews.text:
A l'écart des rues touristes dans une petite ruelle adjacente, pro he de la place saint marc le restaurants avec ses petites salles sympathiques ambiance  façons Osteria.
Bone cuisine italienne variée a un tarif raisonnable pour Venise.
Service rapide et personnels aimables.
Attention  beaucoup de clients
reviews.title: Bonne adresse a venice

reviews.text: The service here was lovely, right next to our hotel, hotel del opera, however we only ate here once as we loved exploring to find new places to eat :) xoxox
reviews.title: great service

reviews.text: Veloci e organizzati. Si mangia bene niente di eccezionale con portare di media grandezza. Il locale è carino stile veneziano. Sembra piccolo ma all’interno presenta parecchie stanze.
reviews.title: Normale

reviews.text: first meal in Venice (for the third time) this is a lovely restaurant, food great and local specialities e.g. liver very tasty and in large portions. Only very minor gripe was the wait between courses could be a little long, as I noticed locals come and go while we were still there! But overall a great place and if I return to Venice I'll be going back.
reviews.title: well cooked local fare, lovely atmosphere

reviews.text: 不知道是不是因為看我們是亞洲人，墨魚麵居然是用中式的麵條！不誇張的說，是我這次義大利行中吃過最難吃的一餐，服務生的服務態度也很差，總之非常不推薦！
reviews.title: 非常不推薦

reviews.text: This restaurant was recommended to us by our Hotel and we were not disappointed. A traditional restaurant with a nice atmosphere. We had the shrimps and melon starters which tasted delicious and fresh. I then had the lamb ribs ( 4) off the specials menu and my wife had the pasta and meatballs. A nice bottle of Pino Grigio ( 32 euros ) The whole experience was wonderful .
reviews.title: An enjoyable meal

reviews.text:
Nous y avons été par hasard. Nous souhaitions manger des pizzas.
L'accueil a été très chaleureux avec un chef qui parle un peu français.
Les pizzas étaient excellentes.
Le prix était très correct.
On pourrait y retourner.
reviews.title: Restaurant typique, un peu à l'abri des regards

reviews.text: Très bon restaurant, une belle décoration style vénitien des années 20. Personnel très gentil et polyglotte.
reviews.title: Très bonne adresse

reviews.text: Este lindo lugar está muy cerca de la Fenice y después de gozar de una velada en esté teatro, es un buen restaurante para recuperar energías. Los gamberetti, El formaggio mixto, y la cáprese para empezar, están buenas y obviamente unas pastas , al ragú, o a la arrabbiata, fueron excelentes, también el salmón estaba muy sabroso. Todo acompañado por unos chardonnay del Friuli, conformaron una muy buena cena en un agradable lugar aledaño a un canal.
reviews.title: Cena

reviews.text:
abbiamo prenotato questo ristorante su indicazione della guida. 
situato accanto alla Fenice nel cuore di Venezia, locale molto bello e particolare, atmosfera rilassante con personale molto gentile e professionale. Menù vario con le pietanze ben cucinate, ottime.
buono anche il rapporto qualità/prezzo
decisamente consigliato
reviews.title: pranzo con amici

reviews.text: L'accueil est charmant, la carte intéressante mais les vins très chers.Quand on ajoute le couvert et le service, on arrive vite à une addition un peu trop élevée. ..Dommage...
reviews.title: Bonne cuisine

reviews.text: This place is a lot more reasonably priced than other ristorante in this high priced shopping location. Chianti is 5 euros and tasted good.
reviews.title: A cozy place to eat and drink wine

reviews.text: Petit restaurant sans prétention, avec des plats classiques autour de 15/20 euros. Vaut surtout pour son choix de vins, notamment un soabe délicieux.
reviews.title: Ouvert de 11.30 à minuit, pratique après la fenice

reviews.text:
2018年の暮れにヴェネツィア訪問の際に勘で入ったお店です。
”アタリ”のお店だったのでランチとディナーに訪問しました。
ランチには豆のスープ（小さパスタ入り）と野菜のラザニアを食し、ディナーは前菜とプリモとセコンドを各1人前。
味付けも日本人向けだと思います。量はそれなりのイタリアンサイズですので皿数に気を付けて下さい…(;^_^A
本日のおすすめメニューは必ずチェックして下さい！美味しそうな料理が多いです。
スタッフも親切で居心地よく安心して食事ができます。
reviews.title: 気軽な食事に最適★居心地よく安心して食事ができます

reviews.text:
Es un pequeño restaurante estilo "clásico" italiano muy cerca del Teatro de la Opera de la Fenice. Muy buen ambiente, y típica comida italiana. La lasaña es excelente así como los raviolis.
La carta de vinos algo cara, como el resto de la zona en comparación con España. Aunque son de muy buen calidad.
El precio medio por persona 40€. Normal en el centro de Venecia. Bonita velada para parejas tanto por la comida como por la ciudad en sí.
reviews.title: Coqueto restaurante al lado de la Fenice

name: L'Alcova Restaurant at Ca' Sagredo Hotel
address: Campo Santa Sofia Cannaregio 4198/99, 30121 Venice Italy

reviews.text: Wir waren gestern in diesem wundervollen Restaurant Abendessen und es war mehr als exquisit. Das Personal sehr bemüht und zuvorkommend, das Essen eine wahrhafte Gaumenfreude. Ob Vorspeise Hauptspeisen oder das extrem leckere Tiramisu als Abschluss- alles in allem 5 Sterne gerecht. Wir kommen sehr gerne wieder
reviews.title: Exquisit und Hervorragend!!!

reviews.text: Niente da dire sulla location, completamente incantevole. Infatti è stato scelto per un pranzo molto speciale. Questo però non vuol dire che il servizio o cibo può andare in secondo piano. Il nostro pesce era completamente blando e addirittura uno del gruppo ha dovuto mandare indietro il suo piatto visto che al interno il pesce era completamente crudo. Può succedere. Quello che non deve succedere però è che uno si trova davanti il cameriere che riporta il piatto dicendo che doveva essere così! Ma stiamo scherzando? Solo perché stranieri, non vuol dire che le persone non sanno mangiare. Si trattava pure della sposa! Non c'è stato nessuno sforzo a rendere un po' speciale questo pranzo nonostante tutto l'iter precedente. Anzi! Ed eravamo solo in quattro! Un gran peccato.
reviews.title: Totale delusione

reviews.text: We got married in Venice and chose this restaurant for our intimate wedding lunch due to its good reviews and its location, right on the Grand Canal. I booked weeks in advance and was required to provide my credit card details to secure the booking. When we arrived, the waiter didn’t seem to be expecting us, but feigned knowledge of the booking. We were not told that they were only serving a set lunch menu rather than a la carte, so choices were rather limited. My husband & I both chose fish for our main course - his was cooked, mine was not. When I pointed this out and asked for a replacement, the waiter took it away and apologised. The Head Waiter then came out and insisted that mine was cooked- it was not. I refused it and eventually they brought me an alternative meal which I ate long after my guests had finished theirs. We were given free coffees but, given that this was a special occasion and that they were not even very busy, the quality of the food and service was extremely disappointing. I could have chosen any other restaurant in Venice for my wedding lunch; I chose l’Alcova, but they didn’t seem to care. This spoilt what should have been a very special occasion.
reviews.title: Very poor service

reviews.text: Went here for special birthday dinner. We got the 3 courses for €50 special dinner. Most of the food was absolutely delicious however a couple of dishes were just ok and I’d say we’ve eaten better in Italy. Service however was excellent and the location was beautiful! The Bellini's were also excellent however €16 each so beware! 😳 Definitely worry it though!
reviews.title: Very good but perhaps not as excellent as we were expecting

reviews.text: This really is a hidden gem. 6 of us had a superb lunch here having been on a 3 hour tour around the islands. The food was superb, the service was excellent and the location on the GC was spot on. Really can't praise the place enough. Give it a go.
reviews.title: Superb Food and Seating on Terrace on Grand Canal

reviews.text:
Il posto è meraviglioso, unica la vista sul Canal Grande.
Perfetta la cucina di pesce che esprime le eccellenze del territorio con la giusta fantasia. Il fritto, i primi piatti, lo scorfano al forno, tutto realizzato alla perfezione. Carta dei vini di livello e prezzo adeguato anche rispetto la location strepitosa. Perfetto il servizio. Una cena in questo ristorante non la si dimentica. Bravi
reviews.title: Eccellente

reviews.text: Splendida location sul Canal Grande, in uno splendido palazzo di una antica famiglia nobile veneziana...i Sagredo. Visita al palazzo, autentico scrigno di opere d’arte da mozzare il fiato. Prosecco in terrazza con vista sul Canale. Cena in veranda a pochi metri dalle gondole. Esperienza sublime in tutte le sue forme, non ultima quella gastronomica. Tutto perfetto...veramente una serata da favola.
reviews.title: Come in una fiaba...

reviews.text: ho cenato due sere, buone la pietanze ,il locale e raffinato e accogliente , sei ne relax più completo
reviews.title: ottimo ristorante

reviews.text: Цена не соответствует качеству. Качеству не соответствует 5 звёздам отеля, мясо готовить не умеют. Хотите хорошо покушать, перейдите Реальто.
reviews.title: Цена не соответствует качеству.

reviews.text: The food here is excellent. You can sit outside on the side of the Grand Canal or inside at elegant tables. If you want to sit outside you do need to book as there are not many tables and it is very popular. The food and wines were very good. We particularly enjoyed the fish. It was simply presented and cooked perfectly. The breads are made by the chef and were interesting. They were the best breads we had anywhere in Venice.
reviews.title: Wonderful seafood and views

reviews.text:
Service so helpful and kind, food taste is simple, fresh, amazing!
If you have a wish, just ask at the staff and they will do it for you.
reviews.title: Yes Yes Yes

reviews.text: In diesem tollen Hotelrestaurant, das seine Terrasse direkt am Canal Grande hat und zugleich sehr ruhig liegt, kann man hervorragend speisen. Vor allem das Thunfischfilet ist zu empfehlen!
reviews.title: Feines Restaurant mit direktem Blick auf den Canal Grande!

reviews.text: La nourriture y est délicieuse. Moi qui suit d'origine italienne, je me suis retrouvé dans les gouts de la cuisine de ma grand-mère à chaque plat. Le cadre est parfait au bord du Grand Canal. Les prix sont un peu élevés comme souvent dans les gastros, entre la quantité dans l'assiette et le nombre sur la note. Mais le service est irréprochable et le choix des plats parfait.
reviews.title: Cuisine locale façon gastro

reviews.text:
We ate here on our last night. Very good service, if a little over attentive. Portions are small but very well presented and delicious.
Slightly feel you are being unsold all the time but we found that all over Venice
reviews.title: So romantic

reviews.text: The food on display form the chef was simply wonderful. The freshly baked bread was crispy but soft, and the scallops were cooked like a master.
reviews.title: Squid ink pasta does not come better than this

reviews.text: A restaurant located in a five star hotel, L’Alcova will not disappoint. Apart from its delectable meals, L’Alcova offers multi-sensory experiences for visitors who want to immerse themselves in Italian cuisine, such as visiting the Rialto market with the chef, a tailor-made cooking class and eating and helping out in the kitchen. For those visitors who would prefer to enjoy a quiet meal, L’Alcova offers a beautiful terrace with incredible views and an equally spectacular dining room. Their dishes are both meat and fish-based and naturally there is no shortage of pasta.
reviews.title: Delectable meals

name: Planet Ristorante
address: Calle de Casselleria Castello 5281 Castello, 30122 Venice Italy

reviews.text: Bel Locale con personale attento. I piatti sono abbondanti ed avendo prenotato tramite the fork abbiamo pagato una miseria. Lo consiglio
reviews.title: Bel locale

reviews.text:
Il locale è molto bello, siamo stati accolti molto bene e con allegria. Il cameriere è stato gentile e disponibile, tutti i ristoranti dovrebbero avere un cameriere con il suo carisma. 
Ho preso una pizza vegetariana. MOLTO BUONA!!! Prezzi bassi per essere a venezia. Limoncello offerto e tante risate.

Lo consiglio assolutamente a tutti!!
reviews.title: Bella serata!

reviews.text:
All' arrivo accolti bene, con sorriso e cordialità. Il menù di 40 € prevedeva tris di antipasti, poi grigliata mista di pesce  1 kg circa, acqua, vino e dolce.
Antipasto abbondante ed erano 4, polenta con baccalà, gamberetti in salsa cocktail, salmone affumicato e sardine in saor.
La gragliata comprendeva 1 branzino( pulito al tavolo dal cameriere) 2 scampi, 2 gamberoni e 2 filetti di platessa da dividere in 2 persone.  Come contorno un insalatina mista a testa.
 Tutto molto buono e porzioni adeguate.
In fine un tiramisù sublime a completare  
l' opera.
Sicuramente lo consiglio anche perché non dimentichiamo che siamo in centro a Venezia ed in 2 a 40€ mangiare pesce seduti al tavolo bevendo vino vi voglio vedere....
reviews.title: Groupon

reviews.text: Excellent pizza. The owner is extremely nice and kind. Highly recommend going here for some wine or prosecco and a pizza. Always quick.
reviews.title: Excellent pizza!

reviews.text: Personale cordiale,piatti buoni e ben curati,molto bella la sala grande,prezzi bassi per essere a Venezia

premetto che abbiamo beccato la serata con la partita della Juve di conseguenza era pieno di persone che si trovavo lì per vederla. 
l’attesa per i piatti è stata molto lunga, dopo 20 minuti che ci siamo seduti sono venuti a prendere le ordinazioni e dopo 40 abbiamo ricevuto i piatti. la qualità del cibo è buona, peccato per l’attesa. i prezzi sono ragionevoli.
reviews.title: poteva andare meglio

reviews.text:
tutto ottimo , locale frequentato dei residenti,  staff simpatico,  prezzo amico , caffè ed amaro offerto .
 due passi da San Marco
reviews.title: spritz + cibo

reviews.text: L'arrivo al locale è un po' sconcertante ma la sala interna è carina. Peccato che il menù servito non corrisponda per niente: come tris di antipasti ci hanno portato due fettine di salmone e tonno affumicato con 3 gamberetti scongelati al momento (erano caldi!) con una malmessa striscia di maionese (doveva essere salsa rosa). Quindi niente crostini di baccalà né insalata di mare. Poi dovevano portarci 2 kg di grigliata invece ci hanno portato 2 gamberi, 2 scampi, 2 orate medie e 2 branzini di pesatura media... Il tutto da dividere in 4!!! Purtroppo eravamo di corsa, abbiamo mangiato e siamo andati via senza stare a questionare... Ma mai più! Una esperienza davvero pessima! Locale da non avvicinarsi neanche senza coupon!!!
reviews.title: Arrivati qui con Coupon pessimo trattamento

reviews.text: Went here after getting lost in venice streets and it was amazing. From the outside it just looks a bit gloomy but from the inside it was great. The staff were incredible. Only 4 tables were filled when  we went. You could tell everyone was very happy with the service. The food was incredible, I recommend the ravioli and mixed seafood from the set menu. The complimentary bread was clearly baked that morning (im not sure if they baked it or bought it but I dont see that as a problem). This place was great and I 100% recommend.
reviews.title: amazing!!!!

reviews.text:
Cenetta simpatica in questo ristorante a pochi passi da piazza San Marco.
Ambiente cordiale e ospitale, personale alla mano e super gentile.
Ristorantino pulito e ben organizzato (anche se si desidera vedere delle partite di calcio)
Piatti buoni e ben presentati.
Consigliato.
reviews.title: Gioiosa cenetta
reviews.userLocation: San Casciano in Val di Pesa, Italy

reviews.text:
Pessimo, menù di pesce cucinato malissimo. Mai mangiato così male in un ristorante. 
Mio figlio ha preso la pizza ed era abbastanza buona ma la cucina è da rivedere....
reviews.title: Cena offerta....ma era meglio rifiutare!

reviews.text: Locale carino, a 5 minuti da Piazza San Marco e dal Rialto. Buona la pasta, ho ordinato con the fork
reviews.title: Buono

reviews.text: Un bel localino, un po' nascosto, ma vale la pena andarci. Menù a base di carne, di pesce o pizza, solo l'imbarazzo della scelta, ma a prescindere, tutto ottimo! Personale gentilissimo, disponibile e alla mano. Sembrava di essere stati accolti in famiglia. In più, si trova a pochi passi da Piazza S. Marco ed è anche possibile vedere le partite di calcio. Cosa chiedere di più? Darei 10 punti potendolo fare!
reviews.title: Una tappa obbligatoria!

reviews.text: Bel locale appena restaurato e pulito, personale simpatico e professionale ti fa sentire a casa, ottimi antipasti ho mangiato la tagliata rucola grana e porcini piu buona in assoluto. Rapporto qualità prezzo giusto. Consigliatissimo
reviews.title: Mangiare a Venezia senza dissanguarsi

reviews.text: Ho cenato con mia moglie con promozione groupon. Personale disponibile e affabile. Buono l'antipasto con tre assaggi. Abbiamo scelto la grigliata di pesce: 1 scampo discreto, 1gambero discreto,  1 filetto di branzino discreto ma 1 filetto forse di merluzzo immangiabile.tiramisu' buono. Prezzo basso ma ....
reviews.title: Pesce si ma nella norma

reviews.text: Ottimo ristorante dove si può mangiare carne, pesce e anche pizza. Il personale è molto efficiente e ti sa consigliate nel migliore dei modi. Prezzi più che onesti e servizio di qualità. A pranzo c'è il menu lavoro e la sera si possono vedere le partite...
reviews.title: Cena

reviews.text: ho cenato qui con Groupon pagando 15 euro a testa per un menù di pesce, il cibo era abbastanza buono e il cameriere è stato molto cordiale quindi potrei dare la sufficienza però devo dire che potendo scegliere tra tante alternative a Venezia non lo consiglierei perchè il ristorante è annesso a un pub di livello medio-basso, si mangia con la musica ad alto volume, la vista è su una vietta molto stretta quindi non adatto a turisti che vogliono mangiare con una bella vista essendo in una delle città più belle del mondo, la pulizia lascia molto a desiderare quindi non lo consiglierei, neanche al prezzo pagato, in quanto la location è molto triste e il livello del servizio non adatto a un ristorante di Venezia. Alla fine anche con Groupon paghi il prezzo che vale (ovvero poco), non si può fare pubblicità ingannevole dicendo che stai vendendo un menù da 100 euro perchè evidentemente non li vale proprio e attiri la gente con inganno che altrimenti andrebbe (giustamente) altrove
reviews.title: forse dovrebbe rimanere solo pub, non adatto a turisti

reviews.text:
Non do 5 stelle anche se abbiamo mangiato bene. IL coupon però da noi acquistato era decisamente e diverso e ci aspettavamo quello da noi acquistato. 
Comunque il cibo ottimo.

Però il titolare molto gentile. 
Il cameriere molto educato
reviews.title: Groupon diverso?!?!

reviews.text:
Service très très très lent. 
Plats vraiment mauvais trop salé et très chères au vue de la quantité 
A l addition on nous arnaque de +60€ 
Passer votre chemin il y a sûrement beaucoup mieux ailleurs !
reviews.title: A éviter !

reviews.text: ツアーでの昼食場所でした。イカ墨スパゲティーとサラダ・イカリング・エビとめざし？フライ、ティラミスというメニューでした。日本人のツアー客や大人数の日本人以外の人々でごった返していました。料理はまずまずです。トイレが男女一か所ずつで、かなり待ちました。
reviews.title: ツアーの昼食

reviews.text: Abbiamo cenato ieri sera io e mio marito, antipasto e grigliata di pesce, molto buono molto fresco, personale molto gentile... ci torneremo sicuramente
reviews.title: Ottima cena!!

reviews.text:
Abbiamo cenato ieri sera in questo locale, prendendo due pizze due birre. 
La qualità della pizza è buona così come il servizio, veloce e cortese.
Abbiamo prenotato con the fork e il prezzo, quindi, è stato conveniente.
Notevolmente migliorato rispetto alla gestione di anni fa.
reviews.title: Piacevole

reviews.text: Ristorante senza molte pretese, in posizione centrale, personale cortese, ambiente tranquillo, cibo tutt'altro che eccelso, prezzo alto per quello che mangi.
reviews.title: VENEZIA........ A BASSO PREZZO ??????

reviews.text: Abbiamo prenotato in questo locale tramite groupon per la sera del 31/12 dato che il sito mi dava la disponibilità,peccato che quando ci siamo presentati lì per cenare il personale in modo per niente cortese ci ha detto che per quella sera avevano annullato tutte le prenotazioni!loro dicono di aver mandato una mail ma noi non l’abbiamo ricevuta,così ci siamo ritrovati alle 20,30 del 31/12 senza un posto dove poter cenare!per di più non sono stati nemmeno così accoglienti da dirci che volendo ci avrebbero trovato un tavolo..perché pubblicizzate il vostro locale su groupon se poi riservate questo trattamento??Evitate!!
reviews.title: Maleducazione

reviews.text: We visited Planet on reccomendation and our family group of 10 from Australia we're the only diners the night we were there. The service was excellent, the staff friendly and the food was simple but delicious and particularly satisfied the youngsters in our group. The bar and restaurant had a very local feel and was entirely unpretentious. We would visit again if our stay in Venice was longer.
reviews.title: Friendly Service/ Simple Food

reviews.text: We were greeted and welcomed by very friendly staff. The restaurant wasn’t too busy and the food was really nice. We weren’t left waiting for a long time for food and we were impressed when we got it. Overall it was a really nice experience and I definitely recommend it to anyone in the area.
reviews.title: Review for Ristorante Planet

reviews.text: Il nome Planet mi lasciava un po’ interdetto e pessimista. Invece il pranzo mi ha sorpreso in maniera positiva. Pesce ben curato e fresco. Antipasto veneziano veramente eccellente. Il primo di ravioloni al pesce ti stimola le papille e la frittura con triglie e passerini è da urlo. Il prezzo è molto contenuto. Servizio celere e gentile.
reviews.title: Sorprendente

reviews.text:
Da quando abbiamo scoperto questo ristorante non lo abbiamo più lasciato!
Ristorante, pub, pizzeria....ogni loro cosa è buona e preparata con voglia e passione! Servizio buono e qualità davvero ottima del cibo dalla pizza ai primi, secondi, antipasti, tutto! Pesce o carne tutti e due pazzeschi! Vino buono e il pane pizza che accompagna il pasto è squisito! 
Lo consiglio vivamente a tutti, sia alle famiglie con bambini che cercano un posto accogliente in cui stare tranquilli sia alle coppie che hanno voglia di bere un buon vino mangiando cose tipiche del luogo.
reviews.title: Dove ci si sente a casa:)

reviews.text: Decisamente più che soddisfatti sia dalla qualità che dalle quantità. Pur essendo un ristorante turistico, defilato rispetti ad altri, ma comunque vicinissimo a a Piazza S. Marco, abbiamo goduto di una cucina espressa, dove i piatti, cucinati sul momento, hanno saputo soddisfare palati esigenti. Indubbiamente un ristorante da freguentare indipendentemente dalle promozioni di thefork. Servizio conteggiato a parte... come fossimo negli USA :-(
reviews.title: Percentuale di servizio a parte...

reviews.text: Out last night in Venice, the restaurant wasn’t recommended.  It’s very casual and friendly. Six of had starters and mains and a fair bit to drink.  The football was on and it was fairly full.  The waiters interacted and we even benefitted from a bit of spontaneous desert preparation. Great night and even better as we booked through Fork and got 50% off.
reviews.title: Great evening and great hospitality

reviews.text: Personale cordiale e accogliente, pizza veramente buona. Antipasto di qualità. Prezzo giusto. Da ritornare
reviews.title: Allegria

reviews.text: Personale cortese, menù turistico (Primo, secondo e contorno) con porzioni adeguate a un ottima qualità prezzo. Super consigliato!!!
reviews.title: Pranzo ottimo

reviews.text: I took their card and wrote "bad" on it. That about sums it up. We did not enjoy the food, service or ambiance. Keep looking.
reviews.title: Nope

reviews.text: Pizza buonissima ! personale gentile e simpatico! Abbiamo preso una pizza è davvero la pizza più buona mia mangiata ...Che dire?  Torno sicuramente!
reviews.title: Pizza ottima!

reviews.text: Abbiamo prenotato tramite il Groupon e appena il cameriere ha visto la prenotazione ha cambiato atteggiamento nei nostri confronti. È stato davvero scortese . Grazie al cielo dopo ci ha seguito un ragazzo davvero molto gentile. Purtroppo anche la pizza non è stata per nulla buona. Molliccia e senza gusto. Insomma non lo consiglio.
reviews.title: Semplicemente...NO

reviews.text: Ci fermiamo per una pizza al volo, il locale é diviso in 3 piccole sale ,noi volevamo andare dalla parte un po più carina e riservata ma stavano pulendo e lavando tutto e così ci hanno messo in una sorta di pub comunque ordiamo un antipasto e due pizze ...purtroppo l’antipasto è composto solo da patatine e crocchette fritte con molto olio ...la pizza è buona ma sicuramente c’è di meglio...
reviews.title: C’è sicuramente di meglio

reviews.text: We went based on the hotel recommendation. We had pizza for the kids which was ok and seem light and fresh. Spaghetti bolognese and lasagna was decent baked on other food we had in Venice these couple of days. Prices were good and cold beer.
reviews.title: Good prices and ok for kids

reviews.text:
La comida es buena y los precios son asequibles. Tienen menú a 10, 12 y 15 euros. No cobran por cubierto. Nosotros repetimos varios días.
El menú de 10 euro era de pizza con bebida y helado y el de 12 era de un plato, con otro de ensalada + bebida + helado. El trato del personal fue muy amable y el lugar es muy céntrico y cerca de la plaza de S. Marco.
reviews.title: Buena comida a un buen precio

reviews.text: Trouvé ce restaurant par hasard il y en a pour tous les budgets nous avons très bien manger et un service de qualité.
reviews.title: Très bon rapport qualité prix

reviews.text: Stopped to watch the game one of the only place in Venice to have Sky Sport on multi screen, good priced beers and wines with good service and friendly staff, never had food but what I saw looked good.
reviews.title: Good location for Football and Beers

reviews.text:
Buona la pizza, peccato per il cameriere che ci ha provato per tutta la serata. Sono stata due volte in questo ristorante: una volta con il mio ragazzo e una volta con la mia migliore amica. Inutile dire che la seconda volta è stata imbarazzante e fastidiosa. Cameriere troppo insistente e altezzoso che continuava a fissare e a cercare di essere simpatico.
Ho fatto anch'io la cameriera e ci vuole professionalità!!
Ah altra cosa: chiedere se voglio portarmi a casa i torsoli della pizza mangiucchiati da portare a casa mi fa sentire come se fossi un cane!
reviews.title: Cameriere non professionale

reviews.text: Like many other review contributors, we went here on a recommendation. This was a mistake - read the reviews, nearly 100 “terrible” reviews. The food was not fresh and for a  restaurant calling itself a “Pizzeria”, it was nothing but a contender for the worst pizza we have had in Italy to date. Avoid.
reviews.title: Avoid

reviews.text: Locale poco distante da Piazza San Marco, accogliente, pulito. Alla pizza vegetariana che vedete in foto do la sufficienza, buoni gli ingredienti, ottima la cottura ma un po' troppo crackers al palato
reviews.title: Discreta la pizza

reviews.text:
Sehr unfreundlicher Service, das Essen war eher schlechtes fastfood und nicht günstig, viel zu teuer. 
Juni 2019
reviews.title: ABZOCKE

reviews.text: Económico , buena atención y los menues son muy variados, desde 12 a 20 todos muy completos, incluyen bebida y postre! Se los súper recomiendo!
reviews.title: Muy bueno!

reviews.text:
I had very very bad experience there.  Food too salty and overpriced. i cant even call it service at all. They just try to get your money and that's it.  

DO NOT GO!!!!!!!!
reviews.title: DO NOT GO!!!!!

reviews.text: Abbiamo mangiato a pranzo in questo ristorante situato nei vicoletti intorno a Piazza San Marco.
